1b1(mdo sde): rgyug sgru du/An ma ma na ma na snaH/bo nang du//
1b2(mdo sde): 'grus pa na mchu na kyis kyi ga chen pa meng//ma
1b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'o thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang
1b4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skang bdag gis thos
2a1(mdo sde): /dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das yul ga yA na ga yA'i mgo'i ri la dge slong bdun khri nyis
2a2(mdo sde): stong gi/dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa
2a3(mdo sde): zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab
2a4(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur po rla ba/
2a5(mdo sde): bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba/yongs su zad pa/bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu
2b1(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/chos kyi rgyal po'i/
2b2(mdo sde): sras/sems rnyed pa dang /bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba/legs par rab tu byung ba/legs par bsnyen par rdzogs
2b3(mdo sde): pre/brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa/mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pra shra stag ste/gang zag gcig mu gtogs pa
2b4(mdo sde): ni 'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen
2b5(mdo sde): po dang yang thabs cig ste/thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thog pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/thams
2b6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab po/chags pa med
3a1(mdo sde): pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pa/mngon par
3a2(mdo sde): shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa/sgrib pa dang /chod pa dang /kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang
3a3(mdo sde): bral ba/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cing khyab par byed pa/sangs
3a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/mtshan ma med pa la gnos pa/smon lam la gnas
3a5(mdo sde): po thams cad dang bral ba/sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad li mkhas pa ye
3a6(mdo sde): shes mtha' yas pa sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/sems rgya mtsho ltar zab po/sems ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul
3b1(mdo sde): ba/sems pad+mo ltar ma gos pa/sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su drag pa/sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams la 'di lta ste/
3b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpa lnga dang /lag na rdo rje rin po che dang /lug na phyag rgya rin po che dang /rin po che'i cod pu nu dang /
3b3(mdo sde): gotsug na rin po chu dang /rin po che brdegs pa dang /rin po che 'byung gnas dang /rin po chu'i rtse mo dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /rdo rje'i snying po
3b4(mdo sde): dang /gser gyi snying po dang /rin po che'i snying po dang /dpal gyi snying po dang /dge ba'i snying po dang /dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /de bzhin
3b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po dang /ye shes kyi snying po dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang /pad+ma'i snying po dang /rnam par grol ba'i
3b6(mdo sde): zla ba dang /kun tu zla ba dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /mthu chen thob pa dang /kun tu bzang po dang /kun nis mige dang /pad+ma'i mig dang /dri
3b7(mdo sde): mime med pa'i mig dang /yangs pa'i mig dang /kun tu spyod lam dang /kun tu mdzes dang /kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang /ye shes kyi blo gros dang //
4a1(mdo sde): chos kyi blo gas dang /rgya la da'i phyogs dang /bla ma'i blo gros dang /rdo rje'i blo gros dang /khyad par blo gros dang /seng ge rnam par rol
4a2(mdo sde): dang /s+thAn+dan po dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /snying ga'i sde sgrogs dang /sbyad byungs brjid pa zlab mo sgrogs dang /glos med dang /dri ma sman du la dang /nAdra'i
4a3(mdo sde): dang /nyi ma'i 'od dang /ye shes kyi 'od dang /ye shes kyi dngal+ya ngo /bzang po'i dpalaM dang /zla ba'i dpal dang /pad+ma'i dpal dang /rin po che'i
4a4(mdo sde): dpal dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /bzang skyong la sobyas pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /byams pA la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang
4a5(mdo sde): chub samyos dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams cad dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi la stsogs pa rgya la tshon bzhi'i ros kI lha'i bla rnams dang /lha'i dbang popo
4a6(mdo sde): byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum rIs kI lha'i bu rnams dang /lha'i bu shin+da tu gnod bral la sogs pa gnod bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /lha'i bu kun
4a7(mdo sde): dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan ris kyi lce'i bu rnams dang /lha'i bu shin tu 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
4b1(mdo sde): bu dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po la
4b2(mdo sde): sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang mo'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po
4b3(mdo sde): thags zang ris dang /stobs can dang /nor sbyin dang /de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /gzi can dang /rgya mtsho
4b4(mdo sde): dang /mtha' yas dang /nor rgyas dang /de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang /dpal gyi gzi brji la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya stong du ma
4b5(mdo sde): dang /klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dang /de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang /klu dang /go nod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /num mkha' lding dang /mi 'amo ci dang /
4b6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag dang yang thabs cig go/yang de'i tshe ga yAM na ga yA mgo'i rI'i dpag tshad bzhi khro ra khor yug tu skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang
4b7(mdo sde): gang lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto'i phyi chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis ma
5a1(mdo sde): gang bar gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs sam/bar snang gi phyogs de med do//'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri
5a2(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad gcig/khor khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pi la lho'i gdan brgya stong du ma ni bting /rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas ni bla bre bres/dar gyi lda ldi brgya
5a3(mdo sde): stong du ma ni sbyangs/me tog sil mas ni gtor ba zhig bshoms te/seng ge'i khri de'i kho ra khor yug gi sa'i phyogs de'i ngos rdo rje la yod du 'ong zhing lag mthil ltar
5a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang /chag chag legs par btab pa dang /phyag dar legs par byas pa dang /dri rab tu zhim zhing lho'i me tog brgya stong du ma gtor bar gyur to//bcom
5a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir phyogs de no gser gyi pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/'dam mya brgya stong du ma yod pa/chu ba ni bai DUr+ya snying po ni in+d+ra nI
5a6(mdo sde): la/ze ba ni As+sa ga r+b+ha ste/dri rlob tu zhi mo zhing yid du 'ong la reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to//seng ge'i khri de'i grwa bzhir hA cang yang mi ring /ha tsing
5a7(mdo sde): yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing sed du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/sboms su rgyang grags gnyis kyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so//seng ge'i khri legs par bshams
5b1(mdo sde): pa de la bcom ldan 'das blo ni rab tu rnam par dag/chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni bcom/'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni ma gos la
5b2(mdo sde): mi bsgyings shing mi 'dzem ste/song gi ltar bag tsha ba med pa/mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dad ba/rgya mtsho ltar zab cing gting dpyag dka'
5b3(mdo sde): la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa/zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/klu chen po ltar chos kyi char mngon par
5b4(mdo sde): 'bebs pa/chings pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor mnga' ba/brgya byin dang /
5b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis zhal du bltas shing ma khengs ma dud par bzhugs te/'khor tshogs pa de na lam mo/lhan ne/
5b6(mdo sde): lhang nge'o//bcom ldan 'ongs de ltar lem me/lhan ne/lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya
5b7(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste/de byung bas phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang bar byas te/phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das
6a1(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am btsums par yang mi
6a2(mdo sde): mngon no//'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang ni mkha'i khams kyi gsong phye 'am btsum par mi mngon
6a3(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon no//'di lta ste dper no/bye ma'i phung po la mar
6a4(mdo sde): ram 'bru mar ram/chu zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba'am btsums par mi mngon no//de nas shar phyogs su
6a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa ni/pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de
6a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu
6a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lo 'di lta
6b1(mdo sde): ste/theg pa gcig la brtsams nas chos ston te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing den nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dag dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i
6b2(mdo sde): ming yang med/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med dang /mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra'ang mi grag go//'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems
6b3(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpo' sha stag go//'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang /
6b4(mdo sde): btung ba dang /zas kyi bya ba'ang mi shes so//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zlas
6b5(mdo sde): can dang /chos kyi dga'o ba'i zas can no//de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi
6b6(mdo sde): khams de na zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /gza' dang /skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so//'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten
6b7(mdo sde): byi khams de na rtswa dang /shing dang /bong ba dang /brtsig pa dang /ri la sogs pa'ang mi snang ngo //'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
7a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur pa zhig
7a2(mdo sde): gnas te/de 'od des reg ste bskul nas/rang gi gnas nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan deg lta ba der song ste phyin nas
7a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhon dag kyang
7a4(mdo sde): 'od des rig ste bskul ba dang /rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan ga l-i ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
7a5(mdo sde): 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/pad+ma'i snying po waM so so ci rigs par 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
7a6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba stan las longs nas bla gos phrig pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngo pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'dus de
7a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i 'od
7b1(mdo sde): bzang po dri ma ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa/yid du mchi ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid par byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
7b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu nub phyogs na sangs
7b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/de na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
7b4(mdo sde): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul po'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na
7b5(mdo sde): med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/des 'di bzang po dri mo med pa/rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba/lus dang sems shin tu rnam par dag
7b7(mdo sde): par byed pa 'di phyung ngo //de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
8a1(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can
8a2(mdo sde): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu glang lags/rkyen gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
8a3(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
8a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos
8a5(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog cig ces smon lam btab po//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
8a6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das tso lags/'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/bcom
8a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags//
8b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mi thos sam/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu thos so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
8b2(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang yin la phyir ldog pa'ang yin no//
8b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'ang lags la/phyir ldog pa'ang lags/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal
8b4(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/sems can dri dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon smyos pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog par lung ston
8b5(mdo sde): to//mtshan thos pa de kho nas de ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin te/de bas na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do//
8b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na shing l-i lA'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de/sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la/myu gu skye bo nas rdzogs pa'i bar du
8b7(mdo sde): rkyen rnams yod na rigs kyi bu sa bon de la ji skad ces bya/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o//bka'
9a1(mdo sde): sprul ba/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni ba/
9a2(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan da
9a3(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
9a4(mdo sde): khams de blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la'ang phyag 'tshal ba dang /
9a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /btsun par bgyi ba dang /ri mor bgyi ba dang /bkur stir bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o//de skad ces gsol pa
9a6(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka'
9a7(mdo sde): stsal to//rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song shig/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
9b1(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs
9b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la'ang phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /btsun par bgyi ba dang /ri mor bgyi ba dang /bkur stir
9b3(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' de dag
9b4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la da bab par shes na khyod dengs shig/'jig rten gyi khams der bgi yod par gnas pas gnas par gyis
9b5(mdo sde): shig/de ci'i phyir zhe ni/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang de dag ni rab tu 'dod chags mang ba/zhe sdang mang ba/gti mug myang ba/dge sbyong du mi 'dzin
9b6(mdo sde): pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa/phar mi shes pa/mar mi shes pa chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mang ba/brlang ba/gtum pa/zhe gcod pa/mu tshor smra ba/pho theg ce na/g.yengs
9b7(mdo sde): pa/brkam pa/le lo can/ngan pa'i ngan tshul can/sdig pa'i chos can/phrag dog dang ser snas yongs su dkris pa/nyon mongs pa du mos nye bar nyon mongs par
10a1(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams te/sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to//byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/
10a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das grang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad po lags so//bcom ldan 'das des bka'
10a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/de de bzhin no//rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi rlung na chos ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa
10a4(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu dag gung de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka'
10a5(mdo sde): ba byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci ngo mtshar gyi/gang dag de
10a6(mdo sde): ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang dad pa rnyed pa dang /se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang sangs rgyas la
10a7(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba dang /chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste/
10b1(mdo sde): spyod pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to//de bas kyang gang dag se gol+la gtogs pa srid du'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni
10b2(mdo sde): chos ngo mtshar to//de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
10b3(mdo sde): pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to//byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//de nas sgrib pa thoms
10b4(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu mthun pa'i
10b5(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa 'di mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo //dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
10b6(mdo sde): mchod pa'i phyir la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/'bras bu dang bcas pa chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/la les ni bai DUr+ya'i shing rnams//
10b7(mdo sde): la las ni shol gyi shing rnams/la las ni dpag bsam gyi shing rnams/la las ni gser gyi shing rnams/la las ni me tog gi shing rnams/l-i las ni 'bras
11a1(mdo sde): bu'i shing rnams/la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams/la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnams/lA las ni spos kyi sprin rnams/la lAs ni phreng ba'i sbyin
11a2(mdo sde): rnams/la las ni phye ma'i sprin rnams/la las ni gdugs kyi sprin rnams/lo las ni rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/la las ni sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon
11a3(mdo sde): par sprul to//mngon par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig du mi mjed
11a4(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten khams ga lA ba drir drong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras
11a5(mdo sde): so//kye ma grogs po dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo//de bas na gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog
11a6(mdo sde): gis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas byang chub
11a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sil ba'i ltar mnyan to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
11b1(mdo sde): par bya ba mngon par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang bu dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa/yid du 'ong ba/lus dang
11b2(mdo sde): sems shin tu dga' bur byed pa byung ste/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
11b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang /byol song gi skye gnas po'i lus su gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus
11b4(mdo sde): su gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/bde zhing khro ba dang gnod sems dang yang bral te phan tshun du phra mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang /
11b5(mdo sde): gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar mun pa mun nag gang du nyi ma dang /zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tsha ba 'di ltar mthu
11b6(mdo sde): che ba/'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lam me/ldan na lhung der ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te/gang der skyes pa'i
11b7(mdo sde): sems can dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi ri rnams dang /khor yug go ri chen po
12a1(mdo sde): rnams dang /ri btang gzung dang /ri btang gzung chen po rnams dang /de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa
12a2(mdo sde): dang /blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad/'og tu ni mnar med pa'i sems can chen po yan chad de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang
12a3(mdo sde): yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so//de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ji lta bu rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon
12a4(mdo sde): par byas pas zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas thob/btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni btung ba/gos 'dod pa rnams ni gos/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni
12a5(mdo sde): bzhon pa/nor 'dod pa rnams ni nor thob/long ba rnams ni mig thob/'on pa rnams ni sgra thos/sgren mo rnams ni gos can du gyur/smyon pa rnams ni dran pa
12a6(mdo sde): thob/sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar gyur/sbrum pa rnams ni bde bar bcas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so//de nas sgrib pa thams
12a7(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yul ga ya dang ga yi mgo'i ri gal ba dor nye ba dang /skos bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma
12b1(mdo sde): thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs par kun tu snang ngo //steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i pad+ma'i char mngon par rab tu
12b2(mdo sde): phab bo//lha'i me tog gri sprin rnams dang /lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang /lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang /lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang /lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams
12b3(mdo sde): dang /lha'i phye ma'i sprin rnams dang /lha'i chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tu phab bo//de dag mngon par rab
12b4(mdo sde): tu phab pas sems can gang la reg pa de dag thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri la shring tha mal pa dang /sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de
12b5(mdo sde): dgra thams cad kyang med par gyur par snang ngo //sa phyogs de dag rin po che'i shing rnams dang /dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang /me tog gi shing rnams dang /'bras
12b6(mdo sde): bu'i shing rnams dang /tsan+dan gyi shing rnams dang /a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste/de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to//bar snang las lha'i sil snyan
12b7(mdo sde): dag kyang sgra 'byin cing sil snyen de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo //lum+bi'i tshi la rab mchog tu gang skyes pa//mnyami med gzhar yang nyon
13a1(mdo sde): mongs dbang mi 'gyur//nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du//ri bo mchog rab 'dril bdag cag lcags//byang chub mchogasas
13a2(mdo sde): byang chub shing dbang drung //bdud kyi sde stobs bcom nus sangs rgyas pa//dri myed gzi ldan dri la phyag 'tshal du//ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdug tsog lhags//chos
13a3(mdo sde): tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang //chu zla 'dra bar gang gis rtogs gyur pa//bsod nams zhing rab dri la phyag 'tshal du//ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags//
13a4(mdo sde): chos rnams sna tshogs 'dzi'i dang 'dra ba dang //gar mkhan chen 'dir grang gis rab rtogs pa//myi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du//ri bo mchogar
13a5(mdo sde): 'di la bdag cag lhags//gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por ni//thugs rje'i thugs kyi tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa//dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du//
13a6(mdo sde): ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang //lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin grang mchod pa//gti mug mun bral de la phyag
13a7(mdo sde): 'tshal du//ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags//gang gis mchog gi chos kyi gter brnyes shing //thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang //mnyam
13b1(mdo sde): med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du//ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags//gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid//pad+ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa//
13b2(mdo sde): yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du//ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags//mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku//dpe byad bzang po'i
13b3(mdo sde): 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang //yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du//bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhagaso//tshigs su
13b4(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
13b5(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dri logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos sngon ma mthong
13b6(mdo sde): ba'i snga ltas genga' ba 'di dag su'i lags/de skad ces gsolnga pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//maud+gal
13b7(mdo sde): gyi bu sher na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs
14a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so//'tsho'o//gzhes so//chos ston to//de bzhin
14a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
14a3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang /de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes bu dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
14a4(mdo sde): 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sbrul mo thag tu/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
14a5(mdo sde): ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos
14a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la byi der 'ongs te phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom
14a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do//grags chen shes rab chen po
14b1(mdo sde): pa//thub chen dpa' bo chen po pa//srid pa'i mya ngan rgal ba po//nyon mongs rgal lnga phyag 'tshal lo//thams cad du yang ze le ste//kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs//
14b2(mdo sde): kun nas rnam par grol ba po//phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la//rab tu mi sgrol ri bo bzhin//gting tshod yangs pa rgya mtsho 'dra//mu stegs kun nas mi bskyod
14b3(mdo sde): pa//chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na//gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa//rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi//chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis
14b4(mdo sde): bstan//la la la ni lam yang bstan//la la yang dag nyid la bkod//la la yang dag mya ngon bzlas//la la byang chub lung yang bstan//bag la nyal dang bsams
14b5(mdo sde): pa mkhyen//khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med//de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams//gzigs pas khyod kyi bka' 'grub po//byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na//'dod
14b6(mdo sde): chags zhe sdang gauti mug dang //dri ma sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyang //khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs//rgal nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing //grol nas skye dgu
14b7(mdo sde): sgrol mdzad de//srid pa'i mya ngani 'khyims pa yi//'jig rten tshol ba khyod lags so//srid pa'i btson rar sems can dag/yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams///
15a1(mdo sde): sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod//gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang //thams cad byang chub slad du zhugs//
15a2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na//'dren pas de dag bstan du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas tshul
15a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/byang chub sems
15a4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nus pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad
15a5(mdo sde): rnam par sel ba stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la gi zar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
15a6(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis
15a7(mdo sde): bdag la skabs phye na/bdag gi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de
15b1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par stsol ba la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal to//skyes bu dam pa khyod la
15b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phye sa/de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /dris pi lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis
15b3(mdo sde): ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di
15b4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcomo ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin po phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na tshul khrims phun
15b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ji ltar ni brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na bsam
15b6(mdo sde): gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams legs/ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na smon lam
15b7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams legs/ji ltar na sbubs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das kyi
16a1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams
16a2(mdo sde): lags/ji ltar na rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ji ltar na zla ba lta bu rnams lags/ji ltar ni nyi
16a3(mdo sde): ma lta bu rnams lags/ji ltar na seng ge lta bu rnams lags/ji ltar na dul ba rnams lags/ji ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/ji ltar na pad+ma lta bu
16a4(mdo sde): rnams legs/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ji ltar na
16a5(mdo sde): sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams legs/ji ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags//
16a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ji ltar na rnam
16a7(mdo sde): par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ji ltar na sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
16b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' cho ga gzung ba rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams lags/ji ltar na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba/
16b2(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams legs//
16b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas po rnams lags/ji ltar na smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams legs/ji ltar ni byams pa'i bdag nyid
16b4(mdo sde): can rnams lags/ji ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams legs/ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams
16b5(mdo sde): lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/ji ltar na mi khrom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa
16b6(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar ni byang chub kyi snyoms kyi mya stor ba rnams lags/ji ltar ni skye ba dran pa rnams lags/ji ltar ni dge ba'i bshes gnyin dang ma brel ba
16b7(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
17a1(mdo sde): chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ji ltar na lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po
17a2(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar na lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar ni lam ma log par spyod pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
17a3(mdo sde): dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ji
17a4(mdo sde): ltar na chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ji ltar na phyid pa can rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams
17a5(mdo sde): legs/ji ltar na stan+da gcig pa rnams lags/ji ltar na zas phyis mi len pa rnams legs/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon
17a6(mdo sde): pa pa rnams lags/ji ltar nu shring drung pa rnams lags/ji ltar na bla gab med pa rnams lags/ji ltar na dur khrod pa rnams lags/ji ltar na cog pu
17a7(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ji ltar ni gni ji bzhin pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lags/ji ltar na mad
17b1(mdo sde): sde 'dzin pa rnams lags/ji ltar na 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ji ltar na cho ga dang /spyod yul dang /spyod pa dang /smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams
17b2(mdo sde): legs/ji ltar na sIr sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams lags/ji ltar na sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams lags/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs
17b3(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa dang rim gri bgyid pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na nga rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/ji ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/ji ltar na kun
17b4(mdo sde): rdzob la mkhas pa rnams legs/ji ltar na don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na rten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na bdag
17b5(mdo sde): shes pa rnams legs/ji ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/
17b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye/ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ji ltar na 'tsho ba yongs su drag pa rnams lags/ji ltar
17b7(mdo sde): ra yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams lagaso/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/ji ltar na bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer ma mchis
18a1(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ji ltar na mang du thos pa rnams lags/ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal
18a2(mdo sde): po'i sras rnams lags/ji ltar na brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams lags/ji ltar na bsam pa dang /bag la nyal 'tshal ba
18a3(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i cho ga 'tshol ba rnams lags/ji ltar na nges pa rnams lpags/ji ltar na 'grogs na bde ba
18a4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ji ltar na bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ji ltar na gnas bca' ba rnams lags//
18a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams lags/ji ltar na bsod nams bgyi bal rtson pa rnams lags/ji ltar na sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams lags//
18a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/de skad ces gsol
18a7(mdo sde): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
18b1(mdo sde): legs so legs so//yang rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po lnga phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha
18b2(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don dri bar sems pa legs so//rigs kyi bu
18b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa thams cad rnam par
18b4(mdo sde): sel bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
18b5(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs po
18b6(mdo sde): rnams yin/zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/snying rje ba'i sbyin
18b7(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/mchod pa dang rim
19a1(mdo sde): gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
19a2(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lo byang chub sems
19a3(mdo sde): dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/grags
19a4(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/gzhan du ni 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i
19a5(mdo sde): sems kyis gaunyis su med par gzhan dag la'ang dag par ston to//ji ltar rgyal po 'am/blon po chen po la yang dag par ston pa de ltar gdol pa 'am/gdol
19a6(mdo sde): bu la'ang dag par stan na/de ma yin pa grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi gzhan dag lta ci smos/chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de ltar
19a7(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jig pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/rigs
19b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyigs pa bor ba dang /mtshon cha bor ba yin te/gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la gzhog go//de sems can thams cad
19b2(mdo sde): la phar 'du shes pa yin/mur 'du shes pa yin/bur 'du shes pa yin/gnyen bshes su 'du shes pa yin/nye du'am snag gi gnyen mtshams dag kyang rung
19b3(mdo sde): bar 'du shes pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag tu sems can gyi ris su gang khyod kyi pha
19b4(mdo sde): 'am/ma 'am bu 'am/gnyen bshis sam/nye du 'am/snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gang yang rung po'i gnas su ma gyur pa'i phyir sems can de lta bu med do zhes
19b5(mdo sde): gsungs so snyam nas/de srog chags su gyur pa phra ma'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/srog chag sna chen po po gzhan la lta ci smos te/de ltar
19b6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshigs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zung zing gri sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/
19b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang mi dge ba'i las byed pa rab tu mthong na/de dag zang zing gis sdud cing /zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge
20a1(mdo sde): ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste/dge ba'i gnas su 'god do//de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub
20a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byang chub bo//byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang /ser sna dang /dran sems gsum spangs pa yin no zhes
20a3(mdo sde): gsungs te/de bas na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa byin par bya'o snyam ste/de sbyin pa'ang byin zhing sbyin pa des khengs par
20a4(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogaso pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs
20a5(mdo sde): pA la mi rI ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa'ang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/phan 'dogs su re ba'i
20a6(mdo sde): phyir ma yin dron gyi phyir ma yin/g.yog gri phyir mA yin/'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phyir ma yin gyi/gzhan du ni 'di snyam du sems te/gang byang chub sems
20a7(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin no snyam te/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la
20b1(mdo sde): mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems
20b2(mdo sde): dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal ba dang /bkres pa dang /skom po dang /gcer
20b3(mdo sde): bu dang /gos ngan pa dang /bgo ba ngan pa dang /mgon med pa dang /dpung gnyen med pa dang /skyabs med pa dang /gnas med pa dang /rten med pa lta
20b4(mdo sde): bu'i bsod nams med pa dag mthong na/de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu bskyed cing /de 'di snyam du sems te/sems can gang dag gi phyir bdag gis bla na
20b5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal ba/mgon med pa/dpung gnyen med pa/skyabs med pa/gnas
20b6(mdo sde): med pa/rten med pa 'di dag yin te/kun tu 'khyam na nam zhig bdug sems can de dag gi mgon dang /dpung gnyen dang /skyabs dang /gnas dang /rten
20b7(mdo sde): du 'gyur snyam nas/de snying rje bas rab tu mi bzad de/bdog pa ci yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so//phan btags pa'i mod la skyed
21a1(mdo sde): pa'i dag pa'i rje badres kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na
21a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na/bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/brnyas shing
21a3(mdo sde): sbyin pa mi sbyin/gshe zhing sbyin pa mo sbyin/nyon mongs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/rtag pas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/grags po 'dod cing sbyin pa
21a4(mdo sde): mo sbyin/mang du thos pas rgyugaso shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ci sbyin pa de'ang bsti stang du byas shing sbyin po byin par byed do//btsun par byas shing sbyin
21a5(mdo sde): pa byon par byed do//ri mor byas shing sbyin pa byin par byed do//de ltar ni byang chub sems dpo' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar
21a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogaso pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpyas slob dpon dang /mkhan po dang /bla ma lta bu dang /tshangs pa
21a7(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa dge mthong na/lus kyis gus pa dang bcas pa yin/sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/des gus pa bskyed/ri mo bskyed nas
21b1(mdo sde): gus par smra ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsu ba dang /thal mo sbyar ba dang /'dud pa'i lus dag byed do//de dag gi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag lnga'ang
21b2(mdo sde): grogs su 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar nu byang chub sems dpa'i mchod po dang rim gro'i sbyin pa
21b3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/'di lta ste//
21b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten drag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la spos dang /me tog gam bdug pa'am/byug po 'am/brkyang nul lam/de
21b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis te/de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do//ji ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed ce na/de chos nyan
21b6(mdo sde): to//klog go 'chang ngo yi ger 'dri'o//kha ton byed do//kun chub par byed do/sems so//ma log par sgom pa'i sbyor bas groms par byed de/de ltar na chos
21b7(mdo sde): la bya ba dag byed do//ji ltar ni dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ce na/do gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams dang /
22a1(mdo sde): chung ngu na chu grang mo khyor gang tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul te/de ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod
22a2(mdo sde): pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs paM yino zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
22a3(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na/sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha 'am lha la la zhig tu shog cig ce'am/rgyal po 'am rgyal po la la zhig tu shog cig ces de ltar sems mi skyed de/de ltar
22a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag po'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
22a5(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/sbyin po ci dang tswi sbyin yang sbyin
22a6(mdo sde): pa de dang dri la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin no//de de ltar so sor rtog pas gang 'di sbyin pa'i nyes pa dang /sbyin pa'i dri ma dang /sbyin pa'i bor du gcod
22a7(mdo sde): pa de dag mi 'byung ste/da ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
22b1(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams
22b2(mdo sde): yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/nyon
22b3(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gzung ba dang bral ba rnams yin/tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/las kyis 'jigs pa rnams
22b4(mdo sde): yin/kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/'jigs par lta ba rnams yin/yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams
22b5(mdo sde): yin/'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdoms pas bsdams pa
22b6(mdo sde): yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'am/'dul ba 'am/gnas gang yang rung ba la la dag tu bslab pa'i gnas
22b7(mdo sde): 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du sems te/gnas de dang de dag la shin tu legs par slob kyi/rigs la 'dod chags pas ma yin/lta ba la
23a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags pas ma yin/'khor ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/gang zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ri mo med pa ma
23a2(mdo sde): yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i
23a3(mdo sde): sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis ni/bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
23a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar mi nus kyis/de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag
23a5(mdo sde): par spyad pa drang /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag la bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes rnam par dpyod do//byang chub
23a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/'dri la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de
23a7(mdo sde): la sems can rnams ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/yul ma yin par mi spyod/dus ma yin por mi smra ba yin/dus mi shes pa ma
23b1(mdo sde): yin/yul mi shes pa ma yin+da/tshong mi shes pa ma yin te/de sems can de rjes su bsrung ba dang /bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
23b2(mdo sde): spyod lam phun sum tshogs shing 'jam par smra ba dang /dal bus smra ba dang /'du 'dzi mi meng ba dang /rab tu dben po la mngon par phyogs pa dang /bzhin gyi na dang so rab
23b3(mdo sde): tu dang ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas
23b4(mdo sde): bsdams pa yin zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa'i gnas de dag la
23b5(mdo sde): gus par byed pa yin/brtson par byed pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no//ji ltar na
23b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung ba 'am/zhe
23b7(mdo sde): sdang gi yongs su gdung ba 'am/gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba 'am/nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la la 'am/yo byad kyis phongs pa'i yongs
24a1(mdo sde): su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la rton cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams
24a2(mdo sde): yongs su spang ngo //'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhe na/mi sdug pa sgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o//skye bo
24a3(mdo sde): bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen te/mi sdug pa bsgom pa de gang zho na/'di lta ste/lus 'di la skra dang spu dang sen mo dang so dang rdul dang dri ma dang /lcogs
24a4(mdo sde): pa dang sha dang /rus po drang rgyas pa dang rtsa dang mkhal ma dang snying dang mchin pa dang glo ba dang rgyu ma dang /gnyi ma drang pho ba dang sul mangs dang long ka dang lgang pa dang
24a5(mdo sde): mtsher pa dang phyi sa dang mchi me dang rdul dang snabs dang ngar snabs dang zhag dang chu ser dang rkang dang tshil dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rnag khrag dang klad pa dang
24a6(mdo sde): klang rgyab dang gcin dag yod de/dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can du
24a7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de 'ong dngos po 'di dag shes nas/'dod chags kyi sems ma skyed na/shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin
24b1(mdo sde): can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba yin no//skye bo bzang mo de gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpas chags
24b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i bud med gzugs bzang ba/yod du 'ong ba/mdzes pa/mig tu sdug pa/sems 'phrog pa mthong yang des de ltar bu dge mthong ni 'di ltar yongs su rtog
24b3(mdo sde): ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/byung nas med par 'gyur ba yin na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la
24b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags skyid par byed ces gsungs so snyam ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs
24b5(mdo sde): su spong ngo //ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la sten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/'di la byang chubo sems dpa' sems can
24b6(mdo sde): rnams la byams pa mang po yin te/de gzhi gang dang rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang /'khon du 'odzin par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang /
24b7(mdo sde): rkyen de dag yongs su spangs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spang ba yin no//de de ltar yongs su
25a1(mdo sde): rtog pas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro//gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam/yo byad ma 'byor kyang yongs su yi 'chad pa med
25a2(mdo sde): de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral bya yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin
25a3(mdo sde): pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu lkog tu song ste/rab tu dben po la gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ni ma 'dres
25a4(mdo sde): par gnas po ste/bdag ni rab tu dben pa nu 'dug pa'o//bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o//dge sbyong dam/bram ze gzhan
25a5(mdo sde): dag ni kun kyang 'dres par gnas pa/'du 'dzi med ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi skyod de/de ltar na byang
25a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyis 'jigs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang
25a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams bsod nams dag gus par bya'o//tshul khrims gus par srung ngo //shes rab gus
25b1(mdo sde): par bsgom mo//deci'i phyir zhe na/bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'dod pa dang /'thad pa dang /dga' ba dang /yod du 'ong ba nyams/
25b2(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyod do//de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/de ltar na las kyis
25b3(mdo sde): 'dzegs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' kho na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la'ang 'jigs
25b4(mdo sde): par lta zhing sdig pa chung ngu'ang khyad du mi ga sod pa yin te/de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams drug chung ngus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro//dge
25b5(mdo sde): slong rnams drug chen pos kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sdig pa chen pos kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do//sdig pa chung ngus kyang ngan song rnams
25b6(mdo sde): su phyin par byed do zhes gsungs sngo snyam du sems te/de de ltar yongs su rtogs pas kha na mtho bas 'jigs pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na
25b7(mdo sde): ma thobs 'jigs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /
26a1(mdo sde): grong pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid brtan du rung ba yin te/bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams byang chub sems dpa'
26a2(mdo sde): de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang /gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dung bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel deng byi ru la sogs pa nor dong /yo byad kyi
26a3(mdo sde): rnam pa dag 'doms kyang /de la byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi skyed do//gal te byang chub sems dpa'o mchod rten gyi 'am/dge 'dun gyi dngos
26a4(mdo sde): po'i phyir las su bsgos nas dngos po des kyang nye bar mi 'tsho ste/de 'di snyam du sems shing bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpas ni bdag gi lus
26a5(mdo sde): las sha zos kyang sla'i gzhan gyi zas sam/skom mam/yo byad kyi rnam pa gang ci'ang rung bdag ma byin la/ma gnang bar spyad pa ni mi rung ngo zhes gsungs so
26a6(mdo sde): snyam ste/de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs po la brtan pa yin zhe na/'di la
26a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis gtses sam/nor dang /'khrig pa'i yan lag gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing nyams
26b1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe
26b2(mdo sde): na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung na/tshul khrims 'dis bdag lhur shog cig ce 'am/lha la lar shog cig ce'am/rgyal por shog cig ce'am
26b3(mdo sde): rgyal po la lar shog cig ces sems mi skyed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
26b4(mdo sde): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin/ngag dang yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin
26b5(mdo sde): te/ji ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/de gang lus kyi ngan du spyod pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/lus kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag
26b6(mdo sde): kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ste/de ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no//ji ltar
26b7(mdo sde): na ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/de gang 'di dag ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang
27a1(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang /chog kyal pa ste/de ltar ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin no//ji ltar na yid
27a2(mdo sde): kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/de gang 'di dag yid kyis ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/yid kyi dran du spyod pa de dag kyang gang
27a3(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba'o//de ltar na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
27a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims can yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun
27a5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu cho sa bcu dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di
27a6(mdo sde): lha ste nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas
27a7(mdo sde): kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/nye tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/tha dad med pa'i bzod pa phun sum
27b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/snying rje'i
27b2(mdo sde): bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
27b3(mdo sde): dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag nang gi ma ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal
27b4(mdo sde): ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len la yongs su yi mi 'chad de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i nang gi bzod pa phun sum chogs pa
27b5(mdo sde): yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma las smos pa 'am/phra las smos pa 'am/
27b6(mdo sde): nye du las smos pa 'am/mkhan po las smos pa'am/slob dpon las smos pa'i tshig gi lan ngan du brjod pa dang /ngan du smras pa pha rol las thos sami/sangs
27b7(mdo sde): rgyas sam/chos sam/dge 'dun la mi snyan par brjod pa thos na/mi khro zhing gnod par mi sems la 'khon du mi 'dzin te/de bzod cing dang du len la gnod
28a1(mdo sde): sems mi mang ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos
28a2(mdo sde): kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyud
28a3(mdo sde): chad pa/mtshams sbyor ba las rnam par grol ba bsnor med pa 'di lta ste/chos thams cad thig ma nas zhi ba'o//chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las
28a4(mdo sde): 'dus pa'o zhes bstan pa de dag thos kyang mi 'jig mi de dang skrag pAr mi 'gyur te chos 'di dgra ma shes ma thos par ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub
28a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma nus so//snyam du sems te/de'i phyir gang chos 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /sems pa dang /sgom pa dang /yongs su klog pa dang //
28a6(mdo sde): mos pa 'di ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
28a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod po phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/gnod sems kyi bsam pa
28b1(mdo sde): skyes na/'di ltar khro ba 'di gang nas byung /gang du 'gag na gang las 'byung /ji ltar 'byung /ci'i don du 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/des de ltar yongs su brtags
28b2(mdo sde): no/khro ba'i skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'gag pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //gang la skye ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ji ltar skyo ba de'ang
28b3(mdo sde): yang dge bar rjes su mi mthong /rkyen gang gis skye ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/de de'i phyir bzod ci ngo dad du len la kun nas ldang ba mi mnga' ba yon te/de
28b4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnong ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye che ba me yin pa'i bzod pa phun
28b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin par bzod la mtshan mo mi bzod pa 'am/mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa 'am/bdag gi yul na
28b6(mdo sde): bzod la gzhan gyi yul na mi bzod pa 'am/gzhan gyi yul na bzod la bdag gi yul na mi bzod pa 'am/bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzod pa 'am/
28b7(mdo sde): mi bshes pa la bzod la bshes pa la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni dus thams cad du'ang bzod/yul thams cad du'ang bzod/thams
29a1(mdo sde): cad la'ang bzod pa yin te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub
29a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs po yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha dang /ma dang bla ma dang bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang nye du dang
29a3(mdo sde): snag gi gnyen mtshams la bzod la/gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na gdol pa gzhon nu yan chad lnga'ang bzod de/de ltar na
29a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin na/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs
29a5(mdo sde): po yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' don gyi phyir bzod pa ma yin/'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/phan thogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/'jig rten gyi
29a6(mdo sde): tshul gyis ma yin no//ngo tsha bas bzod pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par yong bzod pa mang ba yin te/de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' dgos
29a7(mdo sde): pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la
29b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dgos lnga khro ba skyed pa'i rkyen gang gis zil gyis rlon na/khru tshur gyis 'tshog par 'gyur ba 'am/thal mos 'tshog par 'gyur ba 'am/dbyig pas
29b2(mdo sde): rdog par 'gyur ba 'am/mtshon gyis 'dro bas par 'gyur ba 'am/mi gtsigs pa'i tshig gis ngan du brjod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen ma byung gi bar du bzod pa ma yin gyi/
29b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te la la zhig gis brdegs sam/bsdigs sam/smyos sam brgya ba na/dril byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyis las 'di
29b4(mdo sde): dog byas te/bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//mas ma byas/phas ma byas//nye du dang /snag gri gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/lus
29b5(mdo sde): 'di dag bdag nyid kyis byas pas/de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam por smin par 'gyur gyi/phyi rol gyi sku'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/de bzhin du chu'i
29b6(mdo sde): khams dang /me'i khamos dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par myi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du nang gi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/de bzhin du chu'i
29b7(mdo sde): khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems gzhag par bya'o//de de ltar mi log par rtog pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen/
30a1(mdo sde): de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs kyang bzod/rnam par mya dkrugs kyang bzod de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par ma 'khrug pa'i bzod pa phun
30a2(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe no/'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po 'am/blon po
30a3(mdo sde): chen po phyug cing nor mang ba/longs spyod che ba/sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur la/de la sems can gzhan de dgra gis mi snyan par brjod
30a4(mdo sde): kyang rung /kyal kyang rung /gtses kyang rung ste/mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/bdag por gyur pa lta bur mi ston gyi/gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems can
30a5(mdo sde): 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bzung ba ste/sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya ba yin la/de ltar yongs su bsrung ba ni/brlag par bya/
30a6(mdo sde): ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o zhes de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
30a7(mdo sde): snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/
30b1(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang
30b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can rnams bskul bar bgyi'o zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags kyis
30b3(mdo sde): de ltar na sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dul ba dang zhi ba la rab tu bkod par brtson pa la/bdag
30b4(mdo sde): nyid khro ba mang ba dang /gnod sems mang ba dang /mi bzod pa mang ba dang /phog sna byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sman
30b5(mdo sde): pa thur ma can zhig yod la/sems can rnams kyang rab rib kyis ldongs par gyur nas/sman pa des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi rab rib kyi skyon
30b6(mdo sde): bsal bar bya'o zhes bsams la/de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang ldongs par gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ji ga sman pa des sems can de dag gi rab
30b7(mdo sde): rib kyi skyon thams cad bsal bar nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de la lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin
31a1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs pa'i gti mug gi dri ma shes rab kyi mig gis bsal brla
31a2(mdo sde): 'dod la/bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs na bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems te/de de'i phyir bzod cing drang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin
31a3(mdo sde): te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dum bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/byang
31a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no////'phags pa dkon mchog sprin//bam po gnyis pa//rigs kyi bu chos
31a5(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan nu byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin//
31a6(mdo sde): mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/'bar
31a7(mdo sde): ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/thun mong ma yin
31b1(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/mi brnyas pa'i brdzun 'grus can rnams yin/skams pa med pa'i brjod 'grus can rnams yin no//rigs kyi bud la ji ltar na rje
31b2(mdo sde): lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las me 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla
31b3(mdo sde): ba dang /margal ba bsgral ba dang /ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par
31b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/dri de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa'i drung du bdud sdig can 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'
31b5(mdo sde): de la rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus thong shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dus kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan
31b6(mdo sde): las bzla ba dang /ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang /ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par
31b7(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsams te/de ni brdzun dang 'drid pa'i chos can byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o//rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can
32a1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma shes so//
32a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can bye ba du ma nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ngas shes kyis rigs kyi bu khyod
32a3(mdo sde): kyis de'i phyir brtson 'grus zlog shig/don med par nyon mongs pa la sten pa por gyur ta re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing kyal ka byed kyang /de la byang chub sems
32a4(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig can bdag la kyal ka byed par 'dod do snyam ste/des de ltar shes nas bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/sdig
32a5(mdo sde): can khyod bya ba nyung ngu gyis shig/'jig rten gyi bsko sham gyis khyod la ci zhig bya/sdig tsan bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las bdag gis bya ba ni 'jig rten yin
32a6(mdo sde): te/los kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o//las kyi skye gnas pa'o//las la rngon pa'o zhes gsungs te/sdig can khyod kyang las bdag gir bya ba yin te/las kyi
32a7(mdo sde): bgo skal la spyod pa/las kyi skye gnas pa/las la rten pa yin gyis/sdig can khyod gang nas/'ongs pa'i lom nas song shig/ngol kyal ka byas pas
32b1(mdo sde): khyod yun ring por don med pa dang /gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o//bdud sdig can de'ang bdag gi sems ni sems kyis tshor bar rig nas
32b2(mdo sde): yibs yibs te de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis kyal ka byas te dad pa dang
32b3(mdo sde): dpral bar byas kyang mi 'gyur/mi 'dzum/zhum par mI 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems
32b4(mdo sde): dpe' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag
32b5(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de lnga grangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro/cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang nye
32b6(mdo sde): bar mi 'gro na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos te/de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
32b7(mdo sde): cad yongs su 'dzin cing /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson
33a1(mdo sde): 'grus can yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
33a2(mdo sde): dpa' ha cang brtun ngas pa'am/ha cang zhan pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/he cang brtun ngas po'i brtson 'grus ni yab yab por 'gyur/ha cang
33a3(mdo sde): zhan pa ni le lor 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs
33a4(mdo sde): po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/'odi la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tso 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang
33a5(mdo sde): de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang /'od 'dom gang ba dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs
33a6(mdo sde): pa dang /ye shes thogs pa med cing mtha' yas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi che ba khyu mchog de'ang bdag la'ang yod par 'gyur ro//
33a7(mdo sde): zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus
33b1(mdo sde): can+da yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na gsor ram/nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni lamA ldan ne ljang nge ste/de ni a la la 'gyur
33b2(mdo sde): bya'i gser ro//A la la 'byar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba yin
33b3(mdo sde): no//brtson 'grus sa dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhen/le lo ni brtson 'grus kyi dri mo dang skyon no//snyom las no brlon 'grus kyi dri mi dang sbyin no//zas la tshad mi shes pa ni
33b4(mdo sde): btsun 'grus kyi dri ma deng skyon no//bdag mA shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri mu dang skyon no//tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri mo dang skyon no//'du 'dzi ni brtson 'grus
33b5(mdo sde): kyi dri ma dang skyon te/de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang /brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o//de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la med pa yin te/dri'i phyir brtson 'grus
33b6(mdo sde): dri 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang /'od gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang /yongs su byang ba yin no//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can
33b7(mdo sde): yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du ma chad pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe no/'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/
34a1(mdo sde): ci nas kyang lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang /sems skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar rtsom pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes
34a2(mdo sde): bya ste/da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'gruso can yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin
34a3(mdo sde): zhe ni/de ltar rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus ci ni de'i gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lom gyi bar du gcod pa ginon pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/
34a4(mdo sde): gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa/byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa/byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub du 'brang ba de
34a5(mdo sde): dgra 'phel ba dang /rgyas pa dang /yangs par 'gyur te/de la mi dge bo'i sems skye ba phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi sbyin che ba lta ci smos te/de ni rnam par drag
34a6(mdo sde): ba'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no//ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin
34a7(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus can yon zhen/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig
34b1(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i me'i phung po chen pos byur bur gang bar gyur la/'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das pa na sems can gcig cig sdug bsngal zhing /skyabs med/mgon
34b2(mdo sde): med de/granas med/rten med pa zhig yod na'ang sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir me'i phung po de la rkang gi 'bogs te/'jig rten gyi khams de dog 'das nas sems
34b3(mdo sde): can gcig po de dag thar par bya bar bdag spro na sdug bsngal phal ba lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
34b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang /mu stegs can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no//ji ltar
34b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du mi 'gyur pas ni byang chub thob par dka' ste/bdag gi brtson
34b6(mdo sde): 'gros 'di ni chung shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/byang chub ni mdo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bskul pa mang po//bskul pa brgya phrag mang po//bskal pa
34b7(mdo sde): stong phrag mang po/bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang por bsgrub dgos pas bdag ni de lta bu'i khur bskur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/byang chub sems dpas ni 'di
35a1(mdo sde): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang /gang mngon
35a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang /gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di 'dra ba dang /lam 'di 'dra ba dang /brtson 'grus
35a3(mdo sde): 'di 'dre bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de
35a4(mdo sde): dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/bdag kyang ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
35a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang /sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i
35a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar btsal lo 'bad do//bdag sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni sems can dmyal bla na gnas kyang
35a7(mdo sde): sla'i bdag la phan par brtson na mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus
35b1(mdo sde): can yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyoms pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na btsun
35b2(mdo sde): 'grus de'i ro myang bar mi byed de/brnon 'grus des gzhan la mi spyod/bdag la ma stod do/de 'di snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag gi las
