35b3(mdo sde): la brtson pas gzhan la smod snyam du sems te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snyams pa med pa'i brtson 'grus ce na yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
35b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum
35b5(mdo sde): tshigs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/skyob med pa rnams yini/brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams
35b6(mdo sde): yin/mang du thos pa rnams yin/ma log par gdams dag bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/dbang po
35b7(mdo sde): rno ba rnams yin/sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/de la mazhon pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la rdza
36a1(mdo sde): wAr na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhen/'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog pa rgyun pa la dag bu'i rtsub shin tu
36a2(mdo sde): bsags shing tshe rabs tha drod pa de dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang /drage bre'i ba shes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/de bram ze'i rigs shing sA la
36a3(mdo sde): chen po lta bu'am/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu gang dang gang du skyes kyang khyim dri'i mi dad pa yin te/
36a4(mdo sde): de skyes nas kyang rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas po dang yangs par gyur te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/dge ba'i bshes
36a5(mdo sde): gnyen de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gram+ba/byang chub sems dpa' dag gro/de skyes na sngon dge ba'i rtsub la goms
36a6(mdo sde): pas 'di ltar dpyod de/kye ma skye dgu 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o//kye ma skye dgu 'di ni nyam theg pa'o//kye ma skye dgu 'di ni na ba'o//kye mA skye dgu 'di mi gnas pa'o//
36a7(mdo sde): kye ma skye dgu 'di ni yun ring po nas nad par gyur pa'o//kye ma skye dgu 'di ni gti mug gis ldongs pa'o//de 'ong 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/de bas na 'jig
36b1(mdo sde): rten gnas pa de lta bu la bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni bdag gis mi chi'i/'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag par ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ste/bcom ldan
36b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/'dod pa rnams ni gsal shing lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni mtshon shag ti lta bu'o//'dod pa
36b3(mdo sde): rnams ni ral gri'i so lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni spu gri'i so lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni sbrul gyi mgo lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o//'dod pa rnams
36b4(mdo sde): ni rul pa'o//'dod pa rnams ni dri nga ba'o zhes gsungs so snyam ste/de de ltar skyo nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/dad pas khyim nas khyim med
36b5(mdo sde): pApar yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo //de rab tu byung nas mu thob pa thob par bya ba dang /khong du mi chud pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i
36b6(mdo sde): phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no//de de'i rgyu de de'i rkyen de'i gzhis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang /don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa thos pha
36b7(mdo sde): 'dzin to//de gnyis ka la'ang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par bsgom mo//gdams ngag ma log par bsgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la
37a1(mdo sde): 'jug ste/chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang //
37a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dge ba'i 'tshe ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsolnga ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pA'i ting nge 'dzin to//des lam khong du
37a3(mdo sde): chud pas dbang po rno ba dang /dbang po gsal ba dang /de shes pa'i dbang po can yin no//de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la de shes pa'i dbang po can yin pas/dben pa
37a4(mdo sde): myong ba yin te/de 'du ba thams cad du thams cad yongs su smong //'du 'dzi thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo //smra ba la dga' ba dang /'dod pa'i rnam par
37a5(mdo sde): rtog pa dang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /gtso ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /lha la rnam par rtog pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo //shes kyi
37a6(mdo sde): kha 'dod pa dang /grags pa 'dod pa dang /rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin
37a7(mdo sde): te/de sems la 'di snyam du bdag gis sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/de ste mi dge ba'am/'on tam lung du ma bstan pa'am/chos gang la spyod ces rnam
37b1(mdo sde): par dpyod de/gal te dge ba la spyod na de la sems dga' ba dang /rangs pa dang /mos pa skyed do//dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub kyi
37b2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no//'on te mi dge ba la spyod na de la skyo ba mang ba dang /rtog pa mang ba yin te/mi dge ba'i chos de dag spang ba la brtson po yin no//mi
37b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug go/de la 'dod chags rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/chen po dang /
37b4(mdo sde): 'bring po dang /chung ngu'o//de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhe na/gang lus thams cad du khyab ste/sems kun nas bzung zhing gnas pa dang /gang gis de la gzhol
37b5(mdo sde): zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems mi 'thong ba ste/de la gzhol ba de la ngo tsha ba dang /'dzom pa thams cad du thams cad med par gyur te/ji ltar na ngo tsha ba dang /
37b6(mdo sde): 'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med pa yin zhe na/de gcig pu lkog tu song ste/de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog cing /de nyid legs
37b7(mdo sde): par shin tu smon pa dang /de nyid la'ang yon tan du lta ba yin te/de ltar na de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin no//ji ltar na 'dzem pa med pa yin zhe na/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i
38a1(mdo sde): gzhis phra ma'am/bla mu lta bu gzhan dag dang /ljor cing phyir bzlog pa dang /rgol bar byed cing nges ngo mi tsha la yon tan du lta ba yin te/de ltar
38a2(mdo sde): na de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin te/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis ngan song rnams su skyo bar 'gyur te/de ni 'dod tshogs chen po zhes bya'o//de la 'dod chags 'bring po
38a3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/gang gis 'dod chags rnams la sten par gyur na bya ba grub kyi bar du bsten gyi/bya ba grub nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems 'thob pa dang /'gyod
38a4(mdo sde): pa 'thob pa dang /sems la mi che ba 'thob pa ste/de ni 'dod tshogs 'bring po zhes bya'o//de la 'dod chags chung ngu gang zhe na/gang gis 'dod pa rnams bsnyen par
38a5(mdo sde): gyur kyang mnams pa dang /byugs pa dang /lus kyis reg pa tsam mam/tshig tu smra ba tsam mam/mthong ba tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba de ni 'dod chags chung ngu
38a6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//mdor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i sems su gyur pa ste de ni 'dod chags zhes bya'o//de la zhe sdang grang zhe na/zhe sdang yang rnam pa
38a7(mdo sde): gsum du rig par bya ste/chen po dang 'bring po dang chung ngu'o//de la zhe sdang chen po gang zhe na/zhe sdang gi rnam pa gang gis zhe sdang zhing rnga ma/gtum par gyur nas
38b1(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung ba la byed pa'am/dam pa'i chos spong ba gang byas pa la/mtshams med pa lnga bsdams kyang blangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro/cha dang /
38b2(mdo sde): babrang ba dang /dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba de lta bu byed de/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye zhing /gal te brgya
38b3(mdo sde): lame nu mir skye na'ang gnag cing mig dmar la gtum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis yang sems can dmyal ba dag du skye bar 'gyur
38b4(mdo sde): bya de ni zhe sdang chen po zhes bya'o//de la zhe sdang 'bring po gang zhe na/gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur te/sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas na myur ba myor ba/skyen po sbyin pa/la
38b5(mdo sde): grong la gor du 'gyod cing de'i gnyen po la'ang sten pa ste/de ni zhe sdang 'bring po zhes bya'o//de la zhe sdang chung ngu gang zhe na/gong gis zhe sdang bar gyur nas tshig tsamA dang /
38b6(mdo sde): mi snyan pa tsam dang /dan du brjod pa tsam gyis mi dge ba'i la sogs pa ste/de 'ong de la brgya la bar 'ga' 'byung ste/byung na'ang de'i skad cig yud cem de'i thang cig
38b7(mdo sde): la gnyen po la ston pa ste/de ni zhe sdang chung ngu zhes bya'o//de las gti mug gang zhe na/gti mug kyang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/chen po dang /'bring po
39a1(mdo sde): dang /chung ngu'o//gang de la gti mug chen po gang zhe na/gang rje skad du smras pa'i gnas de dag la sa kyang dga' zhing myu ngan du mi byed/ste sngags
39a2(mdo sde): mi 'don/'gyod pa med pa yin te/de ni gti mug chen po zhes bya'o//de la gti mug 'bring po gang zhe na/gang gis mi dge ba'i laso la la byas kyang /le gror
39a3(mdo sde): la gor du 'gyod cing /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi drung du 'chags shing mi 'chab la/dri yon tan du'ang mi lta ba yin te/'di ni gti mug 'bring po zhes
39a4(mdo sde): bya'o//de la gti mug chung ngu gang zhe na/gang gis rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa/bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba bslab pa kun spyad pa'i lam gnyis gsum las
39a5(mdo sde): 'da' ba ste/de ni gti mug chung ngu zhes bya'o//de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems phyir bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin te/dri de ltar sems la mkhas pa la//
39a6(mdo sde): gang 'dod pa rnams la mkhas pa dang 'dod pa rnams la mos po dang /'dod pa rnams la chags pa med pa de lta bu yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar sems la
39a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i phyir ro//'on te lung du ma bstan pa la spyod na/de la dran pa dang ldan zhing nan tan du byed la/de brtag pa la brtson pa yin te/de la ji ltar na lung
39b1(mdo sde): du ma bstan pa la spyod pa yin zhe na/gang gi tshe sems phyi rol tu'ang mi rgyu/nang du'ang mi rgyu/dge ba la'ang mi spyod/mi dge ba la'ang mi spyod/lhag mthong la'ang mi
39b2(mdo sde): spyod/zhi gnas kyang mi 'dzin cing zhum la gnyid kyis non par gnas pa ste/'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu nyal nyol ba las sad pa mig gi nyid kyis bsgribs pa'i sems
39b3(mdo sde): mi gsal ba de bzhin du de'i tshe sems dang mi gsal bar rgyu ba ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems gzengs bstod pa dang /rab tu dga' bar bye ba dang /yang dag
39b4(mdo sde): par bzhag pa la mkhas pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la mkhas pa yin no//de de ltar sems la mkhas pa'i chos 'dri drag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//
39b5(mdo sde): chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o//chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o//chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o//chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o//chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o zhes chos
39b6(mdo sde): rnams la yongs su rtog ste/de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni sems la gnas pa/sems las byung ba/sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/sems shin tu
39b7(mdo sde): bci la/shin tu btul/shin tu khong du chud par byas na/chos de dag thams cad kyang shin tu bcil ba dang /shin tu btul ba dang /shin tu khong du chud par
40a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhes sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/de snyoms nyid la sems
40a2(mdo sde): 'dogs so//sems nyid kyis sems zhi bar byed do//sems nyid la sems rab tu bzhug go/de de ltar zhi ba la brtson pas sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur te/
40a3(mdo sde): gcig tu red nas mnyam par gzhog go/sems mnyam par bzhag pa la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba mngon du 'gyur te/de yid dga' bar gyur nas 'dod pa
40a4(mdo sde): las dben/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba tsun
40a5(mdo sde): bsdam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de rtog pa dang dpyod pa mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed cing dga' ba dang /bde ba'i ro'ang myang bar mi byed
40a6(mdo sde): dri mi rtag gro snyam nas bsam gton dang po las sems spyod do//de rtog pa dang dpyod pa drong bral zhing chags po med pa'i yid du gyur pas nang yongs su dang ste/sems
40a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas
40b1(mdo sde): so//de dga' ba drang sdug bsngal ba yin par khong du chud par byed de/sdug bsngal lo snyam nas btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/btang snyoms la gnas pas dran pa dang
40b2(mdo sde): ldan zhing shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong lo/'phags pa rnams kyis gang do dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa
40b3(mdo sde): spyi/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de bsam gtan gsum pa gtong ngo snyam nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la sems gtong ste/
40b4(mdo sde): de bsam gtan bzhi pa thob pas bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldog go/bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldogs pas bde ba'ang spong /sdug bsngal ba'ang spong ste/de bde ba'ang spangs/
40b5(mdo sde): snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag
40b6(mdo sde): pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de bdag gi lus dang nam mkha'i lus su gcig tu mos par byed de/de de ltar mos pas gzugs kyi 'du shes
40b7(mdo sde): las thams cad du thams cad yang dag par 'das pa yin/thogs pa'i 'du shes kyang nub pa yin/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang
41a1(mdo sde): dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam
41a2(mdo sde): nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag por 'das nas rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
41a3(mdo sde): so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yos skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de rnam shes mtha' yos skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ci yang med do snyam
41a4(mdo sde): nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de ci yang med pa'i na skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
41a5(mdo sde): mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de'i gong nas gang sems kyi mtshan ma med pa/rgyu ba thams cad 'gags pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni 'gog
41a6(mdo sde): pa'o zhes bya ba ste/de ni shes par bya'o snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug gi/de la mngon par dga' ba'i rten gyi gnas mi skyed do//de byams
41a7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa/mi gnyis pa shin tu bosgoms pos
41b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so//gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /de bzhin du gsum pa dang /de bzhin du bzhi pa
41b2(mdo sde): dang /bla dang /'og dang /grwa'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa//
41b3(mdo sde): yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa/mi gnyis pa/shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so//de bzhin du snying rje dang
41b4(mdo sde): ldan pa dang /dga' ba dang brtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/'gran zla med pa/gaunod pa med pa/yongs pa chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa/mi
41b5(mdo sde): gnyis pa/shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so//gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /de bzhin
41b6(mdo sde): du gsum pa dang /de bzhin du bzhi po dang /bla dang 'og dang /grwa'i 'jig rten 'di thams cod kyi rnam pa thams cad du btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/
41b7(mdo sde): 'gran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/yangs pa chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa/mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te
42a1(mdo sde): gnas so//de mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do//de la'ang ma zhen pa yin te/gong du'ang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos
42a2(mdo sde): rnams yongs su tshol lo//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos
42a3(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag med pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/
42a4(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/'dus byas la mkhas pa rnams yin/'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa rnams yin/'khor ba la ldog
42a5(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/theg pa chen po la mkhas pa rnams yin/bdud kyi
42a6(mdo sde): las yongs su spangs pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ma log pa'i shes rab can+da rnams yin/mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can rnams yin no//rigs kyi
42a7(mdo sde): bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gzugs
42b1(mdo sde): la rtog/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams la rtog ste/de gzugs la rtog pa na gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs/kun 'byung
42b2(mdo sde): ba mi dmigs/'gag pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'od byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs/kun 'byung ba
42b3(mdo sde): mi dmigs/'grog pa mi dmigs so//de'ang don dam par yin gyi tha snyad kyi rang bzhin ni ma yin te/des don dam pa'i rlung bzhin gang yin pa dang /tha snyad kyi rlung
42b4(mdo sde): bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka'ang brjod pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs te/de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed de/mgo'i thod la mu 'bar ba bzhin
42b5(mdo sde): du sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar
42b6(mdo sde): nu byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gar mkhan
42b7(mdo sde): gyi tshan dang 'dra ba/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong la/sems can 'di dag kyang sems can ma yin na 'on kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen
43a1(mdo sde): pas de dag de'i phyir lam khong du chud pa mi 'thob bo//de dag ni 'di snyam du gal te bdag gam/sems can nam/srog gam/skye bo bo'am/
43a2(mdo sde): gso ba'i skye bu'am/gang zag gom/shred las skyes sam/shed bu med na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems
43a3(mdo sde): mod kyi/sems can med du zin kyang las kyi rnam par smin pa ni mngon no snyam ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems can de'ang med la/ji ltar dge ba
43a4(mdo sde): dang /mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang mngon de yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/de ltar na byang chub sems
43a5(mdo sde): dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa'
43a6(mdo sde): 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtog par byed cing de 'dri snyam du sems te/'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag mi gnas pa/g.yo ba zil
43a7(mdo sde): pa'i thigs pa lta bu/ri bo'i 'bab chu lta bu yin/de la mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhon pa dang /chags par byed pa 'am/de dag med par
43b1(mdo sde): gyur pas mya ngan du byed snyam nas/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i grwa zhis skye ba dang /'dod chags dang rnalwa ba dang /'gog pa la sems gtong ste/de ltar na byang chub
43b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyan la mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'a
43b3(mdo sde): ltar dpyod de/kye mo'o 'jig rten granas pa 'di ni ma rig pas ldongs pa/'khor ba la phyogs pa/srid pa'i zhugs pas bcings po ste/len pa nye bar len to///
43b4(mdo sde): de len pa'i rgyus dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/de dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan pas srid pa'i yang
43b5(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te/de'i rgyu las skye bar 'gyur ro//skye bo yod pas rga bar 'gyur ro//rga ba'i chos can ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro//'chi ba las mya ngan dang //
43b6(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dong /'khrug pa rgyun chags pa nyid du 'gyur te/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'
43b7(mdo sde): shig po de zo chun rgyad mo'i 'khor lo ltar/'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud du 'gyur ro snyam sde de'ang byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i shes rab kyis yang dag
44a1(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
44a2(mdo sde): ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ma rig pa med par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen par mi 'gyur/'du byed la zhen pa
44a3(mdo sde): med par gyur pas rnam par shes par mi 'gyur/rnam par shes pa med par gyur pas ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /srid
44a4(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur ro//sred pa med par gyur pas len pa mi 'byung ste/len pa med pas srid pa'ang mtshams sbyor ba med par gyur/srid pa'ang mtshams sbyor ba med
44a5(mdo sde): par gyur pas/skye bar mi 'gyur/skye ba med par gyur pas rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don po dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug
44a6(mdo sde): pa rnams rgyun chad por 'gyur te/de 'ong byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/de ltar na byang chub sems
44a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub
44b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de//chos 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro//'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro//'dis ni lan cig phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur/
44b2(mdo sde): ro//'dis na dgra ba tsam po zag pa zad pa/srid pa kun tu sbyor ba chad pa'ang mtshams sbyor ba med pa/mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro//chos
44b3(mdo sde): 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu gcig pu spyod par 'gyur ro snyam ste/de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed de/
44b4(mdo sde): chos 'di dag mngon du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de 'di snyam du sems te/sems can gyi khams bdag gis bzung bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/sems
44b5(mdo sde): can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa thams cad sgrol lo zhes dam bcas la/gcig pu 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ba ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam ste/
44b6(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin zhe
44b7(mdo sde): na/'di lo byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la'ango slob la slob pa'ang mi dmigs/bslab pa'i lamo yang mi dmigs so//gang slob pa de'ang mi dmigs so///
45a1(mdo sde): de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis chad par lta bar mi ltung ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg bya chen po la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub
45a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bdud kyi las spong ba la mkhas pa yin te zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i grogasra po thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/mi che ba'i
45a3(mdo sde): yul la gnas pa dang /'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig la rton cing sgom pa dang rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /mchod pa dang /rim grol ched tshor 'dzin pa thams
45a4(mdo sde): cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo //nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gang byang chub kyi lam gyi bar chad 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong zhing
45a5(mdo sde): de dag gi gnyen po la'ang sten to//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las yongs su spang ba la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma
45a6(mdo sde): log pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i gtsug leg dang /gsang tshig dang /bzo'i gnas thams cad lnga shes rab
45a7(mdo sde): gtong ste/de'ang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang /grags pa 'dod pa dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti 'dod pa'i
45b1(mdo sde): phyir mu yin gyi de bzhin grwa shegs pa'i bstan pa'i che bya nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/de la yon tan du lta ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/gsung rab
45b2(mdo sde): 'di ni dam pa ste/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snyam nus/de de la yon tan du lta bas mu stegs can+da gzhan gyi lta ba can du mi 'gyur te/de ltar na byang
45b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la/
45b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lha dang banas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/skye dgu'i dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
45b5(mdo sde): du bcas pa'i nang na de bzhin grashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par gang de dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta bu'i sems can sems
45b6(mdo sde): can gyi ris la med de/de ni 'jig rten lha drang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/skye dgu'i dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/lha dang mi dang lha
45b7(mdo sde): ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis mnon pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin no//rigs
46a1(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang
46a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/mu stegs can rnam par bzlog
46a3(mdo sde): pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/yul las rnam par bzlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams
46a4(mdo sde): yin/sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs mkhas pa nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/len pa'i
46a5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/gnos nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /gzengs bstod pa dang /shin
46a6(mdo sde): tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar
46a7(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag me tog gi rnam pa 'am/'bras bu'i
46b1(mdo sde): rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa/yongs su bzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan ldan gsum sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo//dge ba'i
46b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba de'ang bla no med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//de gang 'di dag bdug pa'i shing ngam/spos kyi shing ngam/rin po che'i shing ngam/dpag
46b3(mdo sde): bsams kyi shing ngam/me tog gi shing ngam/'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang /
46b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo//dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//de mdo sde rnams las mchod pa dang
46b5(mdo sde): rim gro bya ba gang 'di dag rgya chen po rgya che ba dag nyan cing de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo'o///
46b6(mdo sde): gang phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de ma yin pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i las rnams byed cing byang chub kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
46b7(mdo sde): pa de dag la snying thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
47a1(mdo sde): rten nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la mi tog gam/bdug pa 'am/spos gsol na sems can thams cad kyi ngang tshul ngan pa'i
47a2(mdo sde): dri dra ba bsal ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o//de phyag dar dang zhal zhal byed na sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam
47a3(mdo sde): mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ba dang /spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o//de me tog gi bdugs gsol na/sems can thams cad kyi nyon
47a4(mdo sde): mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung bar bya ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o//de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya
47a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzung ngo snyam du sems skyed do//de phyir 'byung na 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra nas 'don to snyam du sems/
47a6(mdo sde): skyed do//de gnas khang gi sgro 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o snyam du sems skyed do//de sgo gcod na 'di
47a7(mdo sde): ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo rnams bcad do snyam du sems skyed de/de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cang byang chub kyi snying po la dgod do snyam du sems skyed
47b1(mdo sde): do//de glog mas pas nyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan lus bzla'o snyam du snyoms bskyod do//de de nas ldang na
47b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslad do snyam du sems bskyed do//de lus kyi ched la 'gro na/'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes
47b3(mdo sde): bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do//de der 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung
47b4(mdo sde): do snyam du sems bskyed do//de bkru ba shul byed na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems bskyed do//de lag pa skal nr-i
47b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do//de rkang po 'khru na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i
47b6(mdo sde): rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do//de so shing za na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do//
47b7(mdo sde): de lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar yongs su bsngo'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems
48a1(mdo sde): can thams cad ltu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar shog cig snyam du snyoms bskyed do//rigs kyi bla de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang /
48a2(mdo sde): su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par bzlog pa'i thobs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
48a3(mdo sde): dpa' 'di lta ste/mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /gtsir bu pa la sogs pa'i mu stegs can gyi gnas pa de dang de dag tu 'phrul pa dag mngon par sprul
48a4(mdo sde): te/de sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas bdag
48a5(mdo sde): gis sngar slob dpon gyi tshul gyis gdul ba ri mi nus so slob mar khas blong ngo snyam ste/de dag gi khrod du rab tu 'byung ngo //de rab tu byung nas ji ltar spyod pa dang /spyod yul
48a6(mdo sde): dang /mang du thos pa dang /spyod pa dman tshogs kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de dag zil gyis gnon pa de lta de lta bur rtsol lo//'bad do//brtson 'grus rtsom
48a7(mdo sde): mo//de dag gi ning na slob dpon dong bla ma lta bur bkur bar 'gyur/tshig bzung zhing ngag mi gcog par 'gyur te/de kye sems can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du shes
48b1(mdo sde): nas grogs pa dag 'di ni skyo ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no zhes mu stegs can de dag gi ma logs pa brjod par 'gyur te//des
48b2(mdo sde): mu stegs can gzhan de dag gnas de rnams las bskyad nus de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'god do//de phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dgra grigan+d+ha
48b3(mdo sde): du tshongs par spyad pa spyod do//de tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing chos de thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod cing rtsol lo//'bad do//rtsol zhing 'bad pas bsam gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin
48b4(mdo sde): dang /snyoms par 'jog pa rnams sgrub ste/ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gzhan de dag pas ches mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /ches 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang /
48b5(mdo sde): slob dpon gyi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /mkhas par bkur bar 'gyur pa de ltar bsgrub bo//dris sems can de rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus dang /tshod shes nas gogs
48b6(mdo sde): po dag lam 'di ni skye ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'god par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no zhes/bsam gtAn dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa
48b7(mdo sde): de dag gi ma legs pa brjod pa yin te/des sems can de dag gnas de las bslang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'ged de/de ltar na byang
49a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par bzlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par bzlog pa'i
49a2(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rab tu 'dod chags can rab tu 'dod tshogs mang ba'i sems can rnams mthong na/des de
49a3(mdo sde): dag gdul ba'i thabs gzhan med do snyam nas des de dag gi drung du bud med sprul pa bzang mo lta na sdug pa bud med thams cad kyi mchog ngag sprul te/sems can de rnams
49a4(mdo sde): de dag la rab tu chags par rig nas sprul pa'i bud med de ma la de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed du 'jug go//de'ang skad cig de nyid dang /yud tsam de nyid dang /thang cig de nyid
49a5(mdo sde): la rul cing dring ba dang 'jigs par 'gyur te/de dag gis kyang de mthong nas dang ngos sgrog skyo bar red de/bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i dri de ba'i nang nas gang thar bar byed
49a6(mdo sde): pa su nig yod ces nyam thag par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/de byang chub gsum las gang yang rung ba'i
49a7(mdo sde): bya chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can de dag la chos ston te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par bzlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ji
49b1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa yid la bcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su mtshams med pa'i las byed
49b2(mdo sde): pa'am/mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na/de'i gan du song ste/kye skyes bu ci'i phyir yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas zhes de skad zer ro//des kyang smras pa/rigs kyi bu
49b3(mdo sde): bdag gis mtshams med pa'o las byas pas de'i phyir bdag la yun ringo bor gnod pa dang /phan pa med pa dang /sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur grang zhes yid mi bde zhing mi dga'
49b4(mdo sde): bar gnas so//de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa 'dzin du 'jug go/nyes pa'ang 'chags su 'jug go/de la chos bstan pa zab mo zab mo'ang byed do//
49b5(mdo sde): de smre 'gyod pa mi gtong no de'i phyir de la bang chub sems dpa' thog ma 'di lta ste/rdzu 'phrul lam/sems kun ston pas yang dag par yid ches pa snyed do//de nas
49b6(mdo sde): sems can de yang dag par yid ches po skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' de la dga' ba dang /mos pa dang /rangs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro//de dag dga' ba dang /mos
49b7(mdo sde): pa dang /rangs pa rnyed pas de chos bstan du rung bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang mthun pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de'i
50a1(mdo sde): mdun du 'di lta ste/pha mar sprul pa mngon par sprul te 'di skad zer ro//kye skyes bu khyod ltos la 'gyod pa chod cig/da'ang khyod kyi grogs te/
50a2(mdo sde): las 'di lta bus su'ang shin tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/don thams cad las nya mos par 'gyur ba med do//las de ye shes kyis bsal du mi
50a3(mdo sde): nus pa'ang ma yin no zhes de skad smras nas/pha ma srog dang phral lo//srog dang phral nas kyang rdzu 'phrul de ston to//de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/
50a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang phral na/bdag 'dra ba lta ci zhig smos snyam mo//byang chub sems dpa' de'ang de'i tshe sems can de la ci nas kyang de'i las
50a5(mdo sde): de spang ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar 'gyur ba da lta de lta bur chos ston par byed do//de ltar na byang chubo sems dpa' 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas
50a6(mdo sde): pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can lnga dpung gnyen byed pa'i thobs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpas sems can gang
50a7(mdo sde): chos bstan par rung zhing nus pa dag mthong la/de dag kyang shin tu mi dge bo'i las byed par gyur na/de dag gdul ba'i thobs su byang chub sems dpas 'phrul
50b1(mdo sde): bdag mngon par sprul te/de la sems can gang rnams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal por sprul pa mngon par sprul bar byed do//sems can gang rnams blon
50b2(mdo sde): po chen pos 'dul bar gyur pa de dag la blon po chen por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do//sems can gang rnams bram ze dang /rgyol rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul mis
50b3(mdo sde): 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul ming sprul pa dang /sems can gang rnams lhas 'dul ba de dag la ltar sprul pa dang /gang
50b4(mdo sde): lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag le lag na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par spel par byed do//sems can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston
50b5(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams brdegs pa dang /bsdigs pa dang /btsod pa dang /bcing bas gdul ba de dag la de 'dra bar ston/sems can gang rnams nges pas 'dul ba
50b6(mdo sde): de dag la nges pas 'dul/sems can gang rnams mtshams med pa byed 'dod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dge la rgyal bar 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bzlog
50b7(mdo sde): cing zil gyis gnon pa byed/phyogs gzhan du'ang bskor bar byed do//mtshams med par 'gyur ba'i dngos po sbas te/de 'dra bar de'i mdun du sprul pa ston to//yang
51a1(mdo sde): na sems can dmyal ba ston to//mngon par shes pa ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tsha'i mtshan ma shes pa ni byed 'dod pa dang /gsod
51a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes te/de yang 'di snyam du/kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni phung bar 'dod po'o//kye ma sems can
51a3(mdo sde): 'di rnams ni brlag par 'dod pa'o snyam du sems shing /de dag des lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas mi dga' ba'i sems chen po bskyed de/
51a4(mdo sde): de'ang 'di snyam du sems so//bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu bzhag
51a5(mdo sde): pa'i bar du/mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal bkur bar bzod na/sems can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te/mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen
51a6(mdo sde): por skye bar 'dod pa thabs gzhan gyis ni bzlog par mi nus te/sems can de rnams tshe'ang thung dad pa'ang med pa dag cig la yul gzhan du bskor ba 'am/zil gyis
51a7(mdo sde): mnano par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag la med na sems can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i lus zhig nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 'gyur grang
51b1(mdo sde): de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas las bdag gis bya ba dang 'dra bar byas nas/sems can de rnams la byams pas khyab par byas te/thabs gzhan gyis mi rus
51b2(mdo sde): nas chad pa rab kyis 'chos te/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'o sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
51b3(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par mi lcogs mi nus te/zas
51b4(mdo sde): dang gos lhur 'dzin ci de kho nas chog par rtsi ba mthong na/de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yi ge dang /gtsug lag dang /rgyu dang /grangs dang /shod thabs la
51b5(mdo sde): sogs pa'i las dge ba dang ldan pa dag ston te/mi dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas
51b6(mdo sde): pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsamathong na 'ong len te/dngos
51b7(mdo sde): po ngan pa zhig thob na'ang len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sems te/sems can 'di dag ni ser sna can/brkam pa/'dod pa'i 'khol ba/'jungs pa yin te/de'i
52a1(mdo sde): rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis chu'i phung po chen pos non pa bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung nub byed pa de dag la/de ni yun ring por don dang /phan pa dang //
52a2(mdo sde): bde bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/de blangs nas bdag gis mi byed/chags pa'i sems mi bskyed de/gzhon du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sangs rgyas dang
52a3(mdo sde): chos dang /dge 'dun dag la bya ba byed do//sems can sdug bsngal ba'i rnams la'ang phyin par byed do//sbyin pa'i bdag po de'ang gzengs bstod pa dang /shin
52a4(mdo sde): tu dga' bar byed de/de ltar no byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su skyong ba'i thabs
52a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcogs shing
52a6(mdo sde): nus pa zhig la/de'ang nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol zhing 'bad de brtson 'gros rtsom pa mthong na/de gnas de nas slong ste/tha na 'khor
52a7(mdo sde): dbye ba'ang byas napa theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub
52b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang dag pur 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /gzengs bstod pa dang /shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
52b2(mdo sde): kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems bskyed du 'jug/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems can la lo can+da brtson 'grus chung ba/tshul khrims
52b3(mdo sde): tsam gyis chog por 'dzin pa dag ni brtson 'gros la 'jog/sems can gang rnams bslab pa kun spyod po phra mo las 'gal ba dag de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis sems can
52b4(mdo sde): kun khebs shing 'khod de/dga' mgu rangs pa'ang mi rnyed pa de dag lnga/de ci nas kyang gnas de nas ldang ba de lta de lta bur chos ston par byed do/de ltar na byang chub sems
52b5(mdo sde): dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /gzengs bstod pa dang /shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
52b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar 'gyur te/rnyed pa chung yang
52b7(mdo sde): chos rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin/de gcig pu lkog tu song ste/rab tu dben par gnas nas/de 'di ltar sems te/ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la
53a1(mdo sde): mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba bsam mo snyam nas/de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod bya dang /rim gro bya ba rnams sna tshogs sems te/de ltar/
53a2(mdo sde): de'i sems pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/de la gang mchod
53a3(mdo sde): pa dang /rim gro bya ba mngon par byed pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i
53a4(mdo sde): sems skye ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//mchod po dang /rim gro bya ba de dag la gang semos mngon par mos shing shin tu dga' ba 'di ni de'i
53a5(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
53a6(mdo sde): phyin pa'o//mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba de nyid la grang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba de dag nyid
53a7(mdo sde): lo gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes rabo kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod po dang /rim gro
53b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
53b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi dman pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa
53b3(mdo sde): rnams yin/sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams
53b4(mdo sde): yani/bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/mtha' yas pa'i sgrani lam pa rnams
53b5(mdo sde): yin/mi sgeg pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no//rigs
53b6(mdo sde): kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon la mo pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing smon lam mi 'debs te/de
53b7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni khams
54a1(mdo sde): gsum las skyo ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam
54a2(mdo sde): pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems
54a3(mdo sde): can gyi khams ji snyed pa ma lus par de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las
54a4(mdo sde): 'da'o//zhes smon lam 'debs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cod kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems
54a5(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i
54a6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/mthar gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod du btsud nas byang chub kyi snying por 'dug
54a7(mdo sde): pa rnams la mchod pa dang /bkur sti bya'o//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo//yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams kyang sems can la
54b1(mdo sde): phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol zhes smon lam 'debs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin
54b2(mdo sde): no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar bdag mngon par rdzogs
54b3(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyang bdud kyi sgra 'am/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs te/de ltar na byang
54b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yi ni zhe na/byang
54b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyis shes rab kyis
54b6(mdo sde): dpyad de/sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal ba la bltas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
54b7(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/byang
55a1(mdo sde): chub kyi tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas nye tshe'i smon lam mi 'debs kyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
55a2(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/sems mi skyo bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas te/byang chub sems dpa' gang
55a3(mdo sde): dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang /gang dag dka' ba spyod pa la gnas pa dang /gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs
55a4(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa dang /gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo skor po de dag rnams la snying thag pa nas bsams te/de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed pa de dag la mos par byed
55a5(mdo sde): do//mos por gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo //rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
55a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no//ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin yang
55a7(mdo sde): chos zab mo zab mo rnams thos pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo thos pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rol po'i zab mo thos pa dang /thabs mkhas pa'i
55b1(mdo sde): tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag/rab tu mi skrag shin tu mi skrag par mi byed do//de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mtha' yas/sangs rgyas kyi yul kyang mtha' yas/sangs
55b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'ang mtha' yas te/de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par mi nus kyi/sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/bdag gis
55b3(mdo sde): mi shes so snyam du sems te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon la mo pa yin zhe na/
55b4(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod gdul dka' ba re rig ste/de rnams kyis yi chad nas/'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'dri lta bur gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di
55b5(mdo sde): ngag gis chog go zhes te/de'i phyir yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur te/gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
55b6(mdo sde): dag par smon lam mi 'debs so//sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar yang mi 'gyur te/de la
55b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung ba/blun po glan pa/lug ltar lkug
56a1(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can/sems can gyi khams ma lus pa de las bsnyigs pa/sangs rgyas thams
56a2(mdo sde): cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/bdag gis de dag byang chub
56a3(mdo sde): kyi snying po la 'dug tu bcug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/byang chub sems
56a4(mdo sde): dpa' de ltar sems pa'i sems bskyed pa re re la'ang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngagaso pa gsung bar 'gyur ro///
56a5(mdo sde): de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de ltar na
56a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin
56a7(mdo sde): zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
56b1(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba dang yang de ltas par smon lam mi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o//'di lta ste/dper
56b2(mdo sde): na/mar ram/'bru mar gyi snod kho tha chad du gang ste/lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa'ang mi shong na/de'i phyir e mo'o snod gang ba/e ma'o snod shin tu gang
56b3(mdo sde): ba zhes bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la smon lam legs por yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir smon lam ma rdzogs
56b4(mdo sde): pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med do//de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dge dang ldan no byang chub sems dpa'
56b5(mdo sde): smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan ni byang chub sramyos dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/
56b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/mi tshogs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum
56b7(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin/shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum chags
57a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/rnam par mi 'khrugs
57a2(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
57a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgod pa kun gyis zil gyis mi non
57a4(mdo sde): pa yin te/de ltar na zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa
57a5(mdo sde): yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis thub pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/de ltar na byang chub sems
57a6(mdo sde): dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
57a7(mdo sde): dpas ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi
57b1(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
57b2(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang /mngon du ma byas pa dang /khong du ma chud pa de dag med de/de ltar
57b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang
57b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/lta ba nyams pa ma yin/cho ga nyams pa ma yin/'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni
57b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems
57b6(mdo sde): dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tsho gros pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs
57b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad zil gyis gnon te/de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa/mchog gis zil gyis gnon to//de 'dod na dzam+bu'i gling skra nyag ma
58a1(mdo sde): gcig gi rna mo la 'jog go/de bzhin du gling bzhi pa dang /stong gi 'jig rten gyis khams dang /stong gnyis dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
58a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no//de 'dod na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go/de bzhin du gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma
58a3(mdo sde): stesnyed dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum tsu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pa'i gang+gA'i
58a4(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang /bri bar yang mi mngon te/'jig rten gyi khams du rnams
58a5(mdo sde): kyang phan tshun du 'das par mi 'gyur sems can de rnams la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs
58a6(mdo sde): pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stabs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
58a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo//da 'dod na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che rnam pa
58b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin gyis rlob ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gri stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
58b2(mdo sde): gigazungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/sangs rgyas bcom
58b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji snyed cig don tha dad pa dang /tshig dang yi ge tho dad pa dang brjod pa tha dad pa dang /tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpas skrod cig yud
58b4(mdo sde): tsu ma thung cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/khong du chud par byed/skom par byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa
58b5(mdo sde): yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam por mi 'khrug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs po yin zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
58b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabyas pa gang rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i sems canu de lta bu
58b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi ris na med de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na
59a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs byar gang byang chub sems
59a2(mdo sde): dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na ma mthong ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum
59a3(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin na/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sumo tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
59a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa
59a5(mdo sde): rnams yin/chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ting nge 'dzin
59a6(mdo sde): gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
59a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam por lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
59b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/'jig rten lngas 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no///
59b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung
59b3(mdo sde): po rnams skye ba yang dag par mthong /'jig pa dang /'gog pa'ang yang dag par mthong ngo //des phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang //
59b4(mdo sde): gsog tu yong dag par mthong /phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni bdag med pa/sems can med pa/srog
59b5(mdo sde): med pa/gso ba med pa/gang zag med pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dag ni 'dri ltar bdag cag gi phung po rnams
59b6(mdo sde): bdag go//bdag cag gi phung po rnams la byadag yod do//bdog cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yod do//bdag cag gi bdag ni phung po can yin no snyam ste/de dag
59b7(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas de kho na nyid khong du mi chud do//de kho na nyid khong du mi chud pas mgal ma'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor bar 'khyam mo snyam du sems
60a1(mdo sde): shing /de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la
60a2(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs po yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la
60a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas chos la sgro 'dogs pa dang /chos lnga sgur po'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/dri 'dri snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun
60a4(mdo sde): brtags pa'i ming gdags te/chos de'ang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/yi ge de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/'di ni mr-ing cim dang /tha snyad tsam du//
60a5(mdo sde): bya'i 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o//glo bur du byung ba'i chos de'ang thums cad du thams cad med pa yin te/gzhan gyi rkyen dang /gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod
60a6(mdo sde): pa dang /gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yod do zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
60a7(mdo sde): du rab tu shes te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi
60b1(mdo sde): cho bu ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' nye tshe ba'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug phram/
60b2(mdo sde): yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/de ltar nu byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye
60b3(mdo sde): shes phun sbom tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
60b4(mdo sde): dpas nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
60b5(mdo sde): rab tu shes/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes so//des ting nge 'dzin gang dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de'ang
60b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ting nge 'dzin gang dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la rlung sangs rgyas spyod pa de'adra rab tu shes/ting nge 'dzin gong dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul
60b7(mdo sde): gang la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de'ang rab tu shes/des ting nge 'dzin gang dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa de 'ong rab
61a1(mdo sde): tu shes te/de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu shes kyi/rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi
61a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyis ni ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams ni rnam paro smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting
61a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la
61a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/rlung sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/byang chub
61a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag lta ci smos te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi
61a6(mdo sde): rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems
61a7(mdo sde): dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad dang /bdud thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin to/de ltar na
61b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i
61b2(mdo sde): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag cing rnyog pa med pas sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/des de na
61b3(mdo sde): sems can la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dgo dang /la la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa dag dang /la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs pa dag dang /la la byang
61b4(mdo sde): chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang /la la las dang po la gnas pa dag dang /lo la sa bcu'i bar la gnos pa dag dang /la li mngon par rdzogs par songs
61b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa dag dang /li la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dag dang /la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang /
61b6(mdo sde): lo la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bo dag dang /la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dog dang /la la bde 'gror
61b7(mdo sde): skye ba dag mthong ngo //de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par
62a1(mdo sde): lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhu
62a2(mdo sde): na/'dri la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'am/'greng ba 'am/'dug pa 'am/'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ni lhun gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung ste/'di lta ste/dper
62a3(mdo sde): na mi gnyid kyis log pa'i dbugaso 'byung ba dang /rngub pa dag lhun gyis 'grub cing 'byung ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de'ang de bzhin du blta'o//ye
62a4(mdo sde): shes de'ang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no//ji ltar na
62a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs
62a6(mdo sde): papor yang rab tu shes/mtshan nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du'ang rab tu shes/yang dag pa ma
62a7(mdo sde): yin par yongs su btags pa'i mtshan nyid du'ang rab tu shes te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum
62b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems//
62b2(mdo sde): dpa' zag bya med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad lus 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes
62b3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bre chos bcu po de dag dang ldan ne/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no///
62b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin//bam po gsum pa//rigs kyi bu che sa bcu dong ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin na//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta
62b5(mdo sde): ste/yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/chos
62b6(mdo sde): kyi sprin chen po kun zad pa rnams yin/sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/dge ba'i chos sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/rin po che'i
62b7(mdo sde): snod du gyur pa rnams yin/rtse chen po'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/mi sprul ba rnams yin/mi dngang ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
63a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ldangs shing tshad myed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper nas chen po ni thams cad du yangs shing tshang med do//de bzhin
63a2(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing tshad med pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
63a3(mdo sde): yongs shing tshad med pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sa
63a4(mdo sde): chen po ni 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang /tshul
63a5(mdo sde): khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams dang /phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad
63a6(mdo sde): rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa
63a7(mdo sde): yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du pha ni 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/'di lta ste/rigs kyi bu dper na sa chen po ni gnod pas
63b1(mdo sde): kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur/phan pas kyang chags par mi 'gyur to/de la gnyis su 'du shes pa'ang mi 'byung ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag
63b2(mdo sde): gis khong khro bar mi 'gyur/phan pa dag gis kyang chags par mi 'gyur te/de ni sems can de dag la chags pa dang /khong khro ba'ang mi skyed de de ltar na byang chub sems
63b3(mdo sde): dpa' gnod pa drang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zad pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper
63b4(mdo sde): nas chen po ni sprin chen po las 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po kun zad de/bzod cing kun 'dzin to de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen
63b5(mdo sde): po las chos kyi 'od pa chen po rab tu phab pa kun zad cing bzod lnga 'dzin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin chen po kun zad pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub
63b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang /'ong ba'i
63b7(mdo sde): gnas su gyur pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/
64a1(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi
64a2(mdo sde): gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sra bon thams cad ni sa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa las sku'o//dri bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i
64a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no//
64a4(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i sdod du gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/sa chen
64a5(mdo sde): po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yan tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/byang chub sems
64a6(mdo sde): dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub semos dpa' rtsi
64a7(mdo sde): chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper ne rtsi chen po gang dag nang rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te/
64b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten na sdang ngo //de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtse chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la
64b2(mdo sde): glanas shing 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no//ji ltar nu byang chub sems dpa' mi sgulta ba yin zhu na/
64b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar sho sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /rlung dang /nyi mi dang /sbrul gyis reg pa'i sprog bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yin
64b4(mdo sde): no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi skul ba yin te/de ltar na
64b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mi sprul ba yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mi dang dzA ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sa chen po ni glang
64b6(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po dang /ring gis kyi rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag rab tu mi skrag shin tu mi skrag par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpe'
64b7(mdo sde): yang bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyi sgra thos na mi skrag rab tu mi skrag shin tu sgeg par mi 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dang ba
65a1(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag drang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang /
65a2(mdo sde): ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/dkar po'i chos thams/
65a3(mdo sde): cade skyed pa rnams yin/dga' ba dang dad po dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams yin/nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud thams cad stsal ba rnams yin/drang zhing rnyog
65a4(mdo sde): pa mod de/gsal ba rnams yin/nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/zab cing gting
65a5(mdo sde): dpag dka' ba rnams yin/mthong ma' 'greng ba rnams yin/nyon mongs pa'i rdol thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar
65a6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang /gzhal bar rgyu ba yin no//de bzhin
65a7(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin
65b1(mdo sde): no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper nA chu ni rtswa dang /shing gel ba dang /rtsi dang /
65b2(mdo sde): nags tshal thams cad skyed de/skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus kyang byang chub kyi phyogs
65b3(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed do//skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur gyi bar du phyir zhing rgyas par byed do//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
65b4(mdo sde): kyi shing du gyur pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar
65b5(mdo sde): po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' bya dang /drad pa dang /rangs pa'i gshir ba can yin zhe no/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
65b6(mdo sde): dper na chu ni ngo bo nyid kyiso gsher ba can yin te/gzhan yang gsher bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis dga' ba dang /dad pa
65b7(mdo sde): dang /rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/sems can gzhan yang dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rangs pa'i gsher ba can du byed do//de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten
66a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o//dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la brten pa'o//rangs pa ni gang sems dag pa ste//
66a2(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams
66a3(mdo sde): cad srul ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na chu ni shing gi rnam pa drang rtswa'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun thams cad srul lo//de bzhin du byang chub sems
66a4(mdo sde): dpa' yang bsgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag gi ming
66a5(mdo sde): yang mi shes pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i bag chags kyang med par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i
66a6(mdo sde): rgyun thams cad skul ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gras lnga ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na chu ni rang bzhin
66a7(mdo sde): gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal lo//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin te/de la bag la nyal
66b1(mdo sde): ba dang /kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang bral bas na rnyog pa med pa'o//dbang po rab tu dang bsdu na gsal
66b2(mdo sde): ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byung
66b3(mdo sde): ce na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tshubs gdungs pa dang /dri las gzhan yang sems can rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas gladungs pa rnamaso/
66b4(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/de ltar
66b5(mdo sde): nun byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs po'i yongs su gdungs rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa bzlog pa yin zhe na/rigs
66b6(mdo sde): kyi blo 'di lta ste/dper na chu ni skom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la srid pas nyen
66b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can nyen par gyur pa dag la gang gi sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa zlog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/de ltar na byang
67a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred par zlog par byed do//ji ltar nA byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhe na/rigs
67a2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na chu'i 'dzings ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa'ang 'di lta ste/
67a3(mdo sde): bdud thams cad dang /mu stegs can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin
67a4(mdo sde): no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtho dma' 'gongs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper ni chu'i klung ni sa'i phyogs mtho dma' 'gengs so//de bzhin
67a5(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu'i klung gis sems can gyi khams mtho dma' 'gongs te/ji ltar na chus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod pa byed
67a6(mdo sde): pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/sems can dri rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu klung 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/de ltar
67a7(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mtho dma' 'gengs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed po yin zhe na/rigs
67b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na chus ni sa'i phyogs skam zhing rdul 'thul ba thams cad sdum par byed cing /rdul de dag zhi bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
67b2(mdo sde): sems can sems rngub pa rnams 'di lta ste/shes rab la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus sems snum par byed cing snyoms can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad
67b3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
67b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'o chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta
67b5(mdo sde): ste/nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khur thams cad kyang sreg par byed/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang
67b6(mdo sde): skem par byed/myo'o phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/skrag par byed pa rnams yin/dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/sems can
67b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa rnams yin/mchod par bya ba rnams yin/mi brnyes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon
68a1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i phyag dar khur thams cad srog ce na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na me ni phyag dar khur dang /rtswa dang /shing gal ba dang /rtsi dang
68a2(mdo sde): sdong po thams cad sreg go/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la nyal dang /kun nas ldang ba dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /
68a3(mdo sde): gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khur thams cad sreg te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyug dar khur thams cad sreg pa yin no//ji ltar
68a4(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na me ni lo tog dang /rtsi dang /sdong bu'i rnam
68a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad yongs su smin par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed
68a6(mdo sde): pa'ang ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su srin por byed do//de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o//ji ltar ni byang chub
