68a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed ce na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/me ni chu bran gyi 'dim thams cad skam par byed do//de bzhin
68b1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyi zag pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad
68b2(mdo sde): skam par byed do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sems can grang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi
68b3(mdo sde): grang ba med par bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i gang ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i
68b4(mdo sde): gleng ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyis rab tu dro bor byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
68b5(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na gangs kyi rtse mo 'om/ri bin d+ya'i rtse mo la mo'i phung po chen po 'bar na/des dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug
68b6(mdo sde): tu snang bar byed/dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang /dpag tshad gsum kho ra khor yug tu'ang snang bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes
68b7(mdo sde): kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/dpag tshad stong du'ang khyab par byed/dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar yang khyab por byed pa nas/'jig rten gyi khams
69a1(mdo sde): dngag tu med/grangs med pa'i bar du'ang khyab par byas nas/sems can thams cad la ye shrIs kyis snang bar byed de/ye shes kyi snang ba
69a2(mdo sde): des mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sil te/de lhor na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no//ji lta ron byang chub sems dpa'i skrag
69a3(mdo sde): par byed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ri dgas khro bo 'om/ri dgas kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na skrag rab tu skrag shin
69a4(mdo sde): skrag por gyur cing /'di lta ste/mo'i 'jigs pas skrag pas gnas de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar stong ngo //de bzhin du bdud rnams sam bdud kyi ris kyi
69a5(mdo sde): lce rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/skrag rab tu skrag shin tu skrag par gyur cing /'di lta ste/gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir gang du byang chub sems
69a6(mdo sde): dpe'i rnams kyi mang yang mi thos na/mthong ba lta smos kyang ni smos par ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar si'i phyogs de yongs su spong ngo //de ltar na byang chub
69a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na mi la la zhig 'brog
69b1(mdo sde): dgon par 'khyam pa las me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/de de logs su song ba dang /des de na grong dram/rdzi'u sgra mthong na/de shugs phyin de rab tu dbugs phyin nas
69b2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khod pa'i 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub
69b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mthong na/shugs phyin par 'gyur/rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/de ltar na byung
69b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper
69b5(mdo sde): na me ni sems can thams cod kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/ji ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la'ang de bzhin no//de bzhin du byang chub
69b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/ji ltar rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la'ang de bzhin te/de ltar na byed
69b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper
70a1(mdo sde): na me lnga ni bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/
70a2(mdo sde): lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcos pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas mchod de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no///
70a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na me stag chung ngu'ang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid yin pa sngo na mi brnyas pa yin no//de bzhin du myos pas
70a4(mdo sde): spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs ma rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las drang po pa'ang lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
70a5(mdo sde): gyis mi brnyas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ring po mi
70a6(mdo sde): thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/de ltar na byang
70a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi brnyes pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan no byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs po rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu
70b1(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gnas myed par spyod pa dang /spyod yul kun mu med pa dang /
70b2(mdo sde): sems can nga rgyal gyis snyoms pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa dang /chos kyi cher sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon
70b3(mdo sde): mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthun par 'gyur ba'i dbug so 'byung ba dang /rngub pa'i srog nye bar
70b4(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang /chos kyi char spyani dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin pa dang /chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed
70b5(mdo sde): cing yongs su 'god pa dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong
70b6(mdo sde): ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang /bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa dang
70b7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang /ri rab dang //'od dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /chos kyi tshul dang /nags tshal dang /khang pa dang /dge ba'i khor yug gi ri la
71a1(mdo sde): sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor nu 'dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med
71a2(mdo sde): cing lus med pa'i gnas 'phro bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas
71a3(mdo sde): med par spyod pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs po med cing gra nas med rten med de/gzugs med kyang nags
71a4(mdo sde): tshal dang /khang pa dang /gzhal med khang dang /ri rab dang /rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo //de bzhin du byang chub
71a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin te/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams dang /gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /
71a6(mdo sde): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /rna
71a7(mdo sde): ba'i khams dang /sgro'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
71b1(mdo sde): dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
71b2(mdo sde): khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /myig gi skye mchod dang /gzugs kyi skye mched dang /rna ba'i skye
71b3(mdo sde): mched dang /sgra'i skye mu ched dang /sna'i skye mched dang /dri'i skye mched dang /lce'i skye mched dang /ro'i skye moched dang /lus kyi skye mchod dang /reg bya'i skye
71b4(mdo sde): mched dang /yid kyi skye mched dang /chos kyi skye mched la mi gnos pa yin/'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang /'jig rten las 'odas pa'i chos rnams dang /
71b5(mdo sde): lha dang /myi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /'khor los sgyur ba dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag tu 'gyur ba dang /dbang
71b6(mdo sde): phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur bu dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dong /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
71b7(mdo sde): dag la'ang gnas par mi byed de/de thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang /dngos po med pa dang /gcig pa dang /tha dad pa dang /de bzhin nyid la
72a1(mdo sde): sogs pas rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mar ma gyur cing dmigs pa med la rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas/brgya byin+da dang /
72a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'ang byed la/phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems ce n+da thams cad kyi don
72a3(mdo sde): thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du'ang rgyu la/chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba'ang yin zhing mi rtog rnam par mi
72a4(mdo sde): rtog ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe
72a5(mdo sde): na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed do g.yob cing rgyu'o//rigs kyi bu
72a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang /don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed/rig par byed/rnam
72a7(mdo sde): par 'god cing ston te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang /'gro ba thams
72b1(mdo sde): cad kyi gnas dag tu yid kyi mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing /phyogs bcu thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul bar gyur nas rmya zhing 'gro ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar nu byung /
72b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin+da no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar nu byang chub sems dpo' sems can+da du rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jog
72b3(mdo sde): la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni ri dang /khyim dang /nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag tu 'dud par byed/rab tu rnyil bar
72b4(mdo sde): byed/rnam par 'jig par byed/bathor bar byed/mi snang bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung myur yang sems can nga rgyal dang /rlom sems
72b5(mdo sde): dong /dogs pa dang /'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyoms po rnams gzugs dang /dar la bab pa dang /longs spyod dang /dbang dang /stobs dang /che
72b6(mdo sde): dang /nad med pa dang /'tsho ba dang /bzo dang /thos pa dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /g.yog dang /smra mkhas pa dang /dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa
72b7(mdo sde): dag dang /yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag bstod pa rnams la de dag khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang /chos bstan pas nga rgyal tshoms
73a1(mdo sde): par byed cing dge ba'i dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing
73a2(mdo sde): 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi chur sprin chen po kun nus skyed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta
73a3(mdo sde): ste/dper na rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi rAs sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang /zab cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jom pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs
73a4(mdo sde): tsan/glu rol sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa/glog gi phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
73a5(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya dgra kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te/'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang /lo tog dang /sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir
73a6(mdo sde): tshur gyi rgyun chen po rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nus slong ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang lus sna
73a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ya sau mu med pa snang bar byed pa/'od zer kha dog
73b1(mdo sde): ma' yas pa'i sgrog gi phreng ba'i rgyun 'byung ba/yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phyug+na drugan+d+ha pa sgrags pa/snod rje chen po'i du mad gyes
73b2(mdo sde): yang dag par mtho ba/chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nam mkha'i khyab par byed pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nis khe byas
73b3(mdo sde): par byas shing ngan song dang mi khom pa la sogs pa nas sems can rnams rnam par bslong ste/rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang po dang /'od kyi
73b4(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor snang bar rnam par dag pa'ang byin gyis brlabs te/bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyong byin gyis brlabs nas/
73b5(mdo sde): lha dang mi dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang rangs blo mchog tu gyur pa/dga' ba dang bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las
73b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo d+h+r-ig dang /rtsi chen po dang /sdong po thams cad rnam par spyad pa dang /thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir sems
73b7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /dga' bar byed pa dang /rgud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/rigs kyi bu de
74a1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nus skyed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams
74a2(mdo sde): cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lto ste/dper na rlung mar dri zhim po'i char gyi rkyen gyi snying po can ldang na/sems
74a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing /lus shin tu sim pa dang /bsil bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang
74a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang drang /gti mug dang /ngan 'gro dang /ngan par lta ba dang /nyes byas dang /the tshom dang /phongs pa mi
74a5(mdo sde): zad pa dang /yul la sred pa dang /sdug pa dang /mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang /nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs
74a6(mdo sde): pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /smon lam dang /mthong ba dang /rig pa dang
74a7(mdo sde): 'grogs pa dang /bstan pa don yod pa la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon
74b1(mdo sde): mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa lu 'god pa yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos
74b2(mdo sde): dkar po las mthun par gyur pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang /rngub pa'i
74b3(mdo sde): rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpas bstabs pa'i chos dkar
74b4(mdo sde): po'i rlung mar nye bar sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dga'i bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/dper
74b5(mdo sde): na rlung mur ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang /khor yug ri dag dang /khor yug ri chen po rnams dang /gling chen
74b6(mdo sde): po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang /rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang /ri rab dang /ri rab chen po dang /de
74b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang /gangs dang /ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /grong rdal dang /nags tshal dang /gzhal med khang dag dang /dza m+bu'i gling dag
75a1(mdo sde): dang /gling chen po bzhi dag dang /stong dag dang /stong gnyis pa dag dang /stod gsum gyi stong chen po dgra dang /bkod pa rnam par phye ba sna
75a2(mdo sde): tshogs mngon par bsgrub po//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can+da thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum
75a3(mdo sde): tshogs pa nye bar sgrub bo//skyed do/yongs su bzhog go/de la ji ltar gangs kyi r-i phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs
75a4(mdo sde): pa rnams blta'o//ji ltar gleng chen po bzhi pa dang ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni nyen thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o//ji ltar steng gi 'jig
75a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o//ji ltar stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun
75a6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dri ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o//ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum
75a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa/
75b1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag par grags pa mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te/de bzhin gshegs
75b2(mdo sde): pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhug pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o//de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams
75b3(mdo sde): blta'o//gling drang /bar gyi gling dang /ri gzhan dang /gling chen po bzhi pa la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang /gzungs dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
75b4(mdo sde): dang /slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o//grong rdal dang /nags tshal dang /gzhal med khang ltar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan
75b5(mdo sde): bkod pa rnams blta'o//dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal ltar ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /mngon par shes pa
75b6(mdo sde): dang /rig pa dang /ye shes snang ba dang /dbang dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /
75b7(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa dang /snying rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dmo pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o//rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
76a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i
76a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed drag na sems can gang ji skad yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i
76a3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam
76a4(mdo sde): pa de bsdoms pa dang /'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur pa taM/rnam grangs des shwar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das
76a5(mdo sde): te/de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/snga ma
76a6(mdo sde): bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can yod dro cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
76a7(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang /so sor ldan par gyur te/de bzhin du bgrang ba de snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i
76b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin shu stag tu gyur la/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs
76b2(mdo sde): myemed pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin gcig tsog ldan par gyur te/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
76b3(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/bgrang
76b4(mdo sde): ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs po chen por gyur
76b5(mdo sde): la/bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur la/tshangs pa chen po ji ltar sems can thams cad kyang
76b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du gyur te/snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang /rang sangs rgyas dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa/'od zer gyi sprin
76b7(mdo sde): chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i
77a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dang /nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i dus gsum+b+ha pa thams cad kyi bskyod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa dus gsum
77a2(mdo sde): gyinam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa dang /'jig rten gyi khamos su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas/de bzhin
77a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bo spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub po//ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur
77a4(mdo sde): bas/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu lngas dpe byad bzung po re re mngon par 'grub po//dpe byang bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad brjod du
77a5(mdo sde): med pa bcur bsgyur bas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re raM mngon par 'grub po//de'ang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur ba ste de bzhin
77a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla bany+tsa ste dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub po//de'
77a7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor kyis
77b1(mdo sde): yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub po//de'ang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
77b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa dmigs pa thams cad lus gsung gi sku mtha' yis par 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa
77b3(mdo sde): yongs su sim par gyur la/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
77b4(mdo sde): bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad po dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed
77b5(mdo sde): pa bkod pa dang ljon pas sems con+da thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos
77b6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin+da la gnas pa/rnam pa thams
77b7(mdo sde): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba/dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu
78a1(mdo sde): gtsug tu gtugs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la dzam+b+ha chu ba'i gsar las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis smras pa nam mkha'i
78a2(mdo sde): tshad tsam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snod so so nas thogs te/phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig tu blangs shing khyer yang ba spu'i
78a3(mdo sde): khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gong ba 'am 'bri bar mi mngon te/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni
78a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab po//de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /de ma med pa dang /'od
78a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang /'od 'phro ba can dang /shin tu dka' rgyal dang /mdun du gyur pa dang /ring du sadro ba dang /maM g.yo ba dang /legs pa'i blo gros dang /chos kyi
78a6(mdo sde): sprin dang /spangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'ong de/bcu gnyis po de ni de dag go/de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/'dri la byang chub sems
78a7(mdo sde): dpa' byis pa'i spyod pa dang /log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /
78b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten snang ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/rnam pa thams cad du dbul
78b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi rgyun gyi sgo brgyan pa/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/sgrib
78b3(mdo sde): pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba/'jig rten gyi khrims grangs med par skad cig r-i re la 'gro zhing 'ong na dri zhim po dang /'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gleng
78b4(mdo sde): chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyud dang
78b5(mdo sde): ldan pa chos thams cad shin tu rnam pa no ni pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgom pas thogs pa med cing yod du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan mchen po bcu la
78b6(mdo sde): sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/phyir mi ldog pa/phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs pa mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab
78b7(mdo sde): pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/'jig rten gyi kha mos brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan
79a1(mdo sde): gyis dbyung bskur ba/yang dag par mnon pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa/'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
79a2(mdo sde): rin po che'i chur gyi snang ba'i sgro dpag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sbyin gtong ba lhur byed pa/blta na
79a3(mdo sde): bzang zhing yid du 'di la mdzes shing dge lnga 'gro ba thams cad mi mthun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'jig rten gyi
79a4(mdo sde): khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas
79a5(mdo sde): mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mngon par shes po dang /rig pa grangs med pas rnam par
79a6(mdo sde): rolnga pa/chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zung zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga'
79a7(mdo sde): ba'i shugs kyi snang ba 'thob pa/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su
79b1(mdo sde): rdzogs la/gzhan gyi don gyi nan+na tAn char phyin pa'i bsod nams dang /ye shos kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs par grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mos
79b2(mdo sde): papo chen po'i yang chen pos spyad pa'i chos nyid kyis sra dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems me bskyed pa'i sa'o//
79b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las 'das la/lha'i kha dog ni mu thob pa yin te/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
79b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni mi thob pa yin no//sangs
79b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'o ni mtha' dang dpung med pa mA lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/kun tu shin tu lta ba/sems can thams cad kyi don thams
79b6(mdo sde): cod thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/bcu gang zhu
79b7(mdo sde): na/'di lta ste/rin chen kun tu 'phags dang /shin tu gnas pa dang /mi skul ba dang /phyir mi ldog pa dang /rin chen 'byung gnas dang /nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi
80a1(mdo sde): brjid dang /don thams cad grub pa dang /ye shes sgron ma dang /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
80a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin te/de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas so//gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
80a3(mdo sde): dbang skur ldan dang /ye shes ljon dang /sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang /mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang /'khyil pa mtha' yas dang /rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang /
80a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang /pad+ma bkod pa dang /chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang /so so yang dag par rig po rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang /sangs
80a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rgyun gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /kha dag mtha' yas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs te/de dag la sogs pa
80a6(mdo sde): sdo ma bzhin no//mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lha'i mig dang /lha'i rna ba dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas
80a7(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang /gang zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/dbang ni
80b1(mdo sde): bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshe'i tshad bskul pa grangs med pa dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang /ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
80b2(mdo sde): du med pa lnga nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa
80b3(mdo sde): bston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang /dus ji bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas las la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams
80b4(mdo sde): cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang /dus dang zhing gang
80b5(mdo sde): du 'dod pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pa'i smon lam la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas
80b6(mdo sde): pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbyung ba dang /chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang //
80b7(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang po dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /dus
81a1(mdo sde): thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyasakyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnams
81a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen po'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa smon pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/bcu po de dag ni byang chub
81a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so//de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe no/'di lta ste/bsam pa'i stobs dang /lhag pa'i bsam po'i stobs
81a4(mdo sde): dang /sbyor ba'i stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs dang /smon lam gyi stobs dang /spyod pa'i stobs dang /theg pa'i stobs dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs
81a5(mdo sde): dang /byang chub kyi stobs dang /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te/bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so//de la byang chub
81a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /bdag med pa khong du chud pas
81a7(mdo sde): gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyi spyod pas slad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi
81b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang /chos bzung ba yun du mi brjod pa dang /thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang /dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur dang
81b2(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /sems can gyi don rnam pa
81b3(mdo sde): thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so//de lta byang chub sems dpa'i chos
81b4(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams
81b5(mdo sde): dang /ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang /mo bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang /mi bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang /me bsnun pa'i shes
81b6(mdo sde): rab can rnams dang /bsdu ba'i drangos po sa sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang /yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang /thabs la mkhas pas
81b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gi theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang /theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang /mya ngan las 'das
82a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang /zung dang snrel gzhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang /ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na mtho
82a2(mdo sde): ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa rnams dang /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang /sdug bsngal
82a3(mdo sde): kyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems n+dan gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang /'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa
82a4(mdo sde): rnams dang /byis pa dang /nyan thos mi zad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na'ang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar bsten pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
82a5(mdo sde): kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang /chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan pa las mi
82a6(mdo sde): ldog pa rnams te/bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/'di
82a7(mdo sde): lte ste/gnas dang /gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /'das pa dang /me 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i
82b1(mdo sde): stobs dang /mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /thams
82b2(mdo sde): cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang //
82b3(mdo sde): rnam par byeng ba dang /rnam par ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i
82b4(mdo sde): stobs dang /zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi
82b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /bar du gcod
82b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lus bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du
82b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/bzhi po de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so//de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta
83a1(mdo sde): ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'phrul pa med pa dang /ca co med pa dang /bsnyel ba med pa dang /sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /tha dad
83a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /mos pa nyams pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /dran pa nyams
83a3(mdo sde): pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /shes rab nyams pa med pa dang /rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma
83a4(mdo sde): thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs
83a5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /ngag gi las thams cad ye shes
83a6(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/bco brgyad po de dag ni sangs
83a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa sum
83b1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyisu mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/
83b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/chos thams cad bdag med pa na sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po
83b3(mdo sde): skye'o//chos thums cad ni sems can med pa nA sems can rnams ni sems can du smra'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos
83b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni srog med pa na sems can rnams ni srog tu smra'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la dri bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni
83b5(mdo sde): gang zag med pa na sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas pa'o zhes sems can rnams la dri bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni med pa
83b6(mdo sde): na sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni gnas med pa na sems can
83b7(mdo sde): rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa na sems can rnams ni bzhi la
84a1(mdo sde): dga'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni nga yir bya ba med pa na sems can rnams
84a2(mdo sde): ning yir bya ba la brtan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni badrag po med pa na sems can rnams ni
84a3(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba la brtson no zhes sems can rnams lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa na sems can rnams
84a4(mdo sde): ni dngos po la brten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin grwa shegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ma skyes pa na sems can rnams ni skye ba la
84a5(mdo sde): brtan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//tshwas thams cad ni ma 'phos ma byung ba na sems can rnams ni 'chi 'opho dang //
84a6(mdo sde): skye ba la brtan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa na sems can rnams
84a7(mdo sde): ni kun nas nyon mongs so//zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba na sems
84b1(mdo sde): can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba na sems can
84b2(mdo sde): rnams zhe sdang bar byed do//zhus de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba na sems can rnams
84b3(mdo sde): ni gti mug par gyu to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la
84b4(mdo sde): gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa na sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas
84b5(mdo sde): so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med na sems can rnams ni mngon par
84b6(mdo sde): 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa na sems can rnams ni smyos pa
84b7(mdo sde): la dge'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni stong pa na sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhon to zhes de'i phyir
85a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa na sems can rnams ni mtshan
85a2(mdo sde): muma'i spyod yul can no zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa na sems can rnams
85a3(mdo sde): ni smon+do lAm la spyod do zhes dri'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//kye ma 'jig rten granas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs
85a4(mdo sde): su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha bo'i skyon la zhugs par gzigs nas/de dag la gnod sems kyi the bra'i skyon spong ba'i phyir ches bstan par bya'o zhes sems
85a5(mdo sde): can rnams la dri bzhin gshegs po'i snying rje chen po skye'o//kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log drang ldan zhing lam nyamya nga bar zhugs pa lam gol
85a6(mdo sde): ba la gnas pa yin gyis/de dag la yang dge pa'i lamo du gzung bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//kye ma 'jig
85a7(mdo sde): rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/cho ga mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang /tshul
85b1(mdo sde): khrims dang /thos pa dang /gtong ba dang /shes rab dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i nor la 'gyod do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
85b2(mdo sde): chen po skye'o//kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bu spyang dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru la sred pas 'khor ba ste/snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyis nga
85b3(mdo sde): ngag la shin tu mi rtag par bstan par bya'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mI rigs pas
85b4(mdo sde): 'tsho ba ste/gcig la gcig 'drid por gnas po yin gyis de dag la tshor ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bston to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
85b5(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/rnyed pa dang /bkur ste dang /tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni cho ga shes pa'o/
85b6(mdo sde): snyam du 'dzin gyis de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu chog par bya'o zhes sems cano rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
85b7(mdo sde): snying rje chen po skye'o//kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag las phyung zhing khams
86a1(mdo sde): gsum pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//chos thams
86a2(mdo sde): cad ni rgyus nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par gol ba lhur blang
86a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i
86a4(mdo sde): ye shos rnams khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg po dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol
86a5(mdo sde): ba yin gyis de dag la grang 'dri sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
86a6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po skye ste/rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ljon na soms can rnams la de bzhino gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//de bas na de
86a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam po sum cu rtsa gnyis po
86b1(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skyen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la
86b2(mdo sde): brtson par rig par bya'o//snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'dri bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag sumo cu rtsa gonyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
86b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//srog chags brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig
86b4(mdo sde): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go//rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang
86b5(mdo sde): sbyar gyi chos kyi rnam par 'god pa na dpag tu med grangs med de/de dag gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na
86b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
86b7(mdo sde): la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang /rngub po'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
87a1(mdo sde): chur sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la
87a2(mdo sde): brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/rgya mtsho dang /gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa/ri rab dang /ri bting gzung
87a3(mdo sde): dang /ri bting gzung chen po dang /grangs dang /'khor yug rI dang /khyor yug ri chen po dang /ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /grong rdal dang /'bab chu dang /
87a4(mdo sde): nags tshalnga dang /gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa drug yongs su 'dzin to//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po'ang gzungs kyi rlung
87a5(mdo sde): mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan po med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su
87a6(mdo sde): 'dzin to//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang /rgya mtsho dang /gling chen po bzhi pa dang /ri btang gzung dang /
87a7(mdo sde): btang gzung chen po dang /gangs dang /khor yug ri dang /khor yug ri chen po dang /ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang /grong rdal dang /'bab chu dang /nags tshal
87b1(mdo sde): dang /gzhal myed khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang /sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /mngon par shes dang /
87b2(mdo sde): dbang dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /mA 'dres pa dang /snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
87b3(mdo sde): dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to//'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu mod pa phun sumo tshogs pa thams
87b4(mdo sde): cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su 'dzin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin no//ji ltar na byung
87b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu
87b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/rnam par 'byed par byed de/nags
87b7(mdo sde): tshal dang /shing dang /yal ga dang /'dab ma dang /ldum bu dang /myu gu dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /lo ma dang /sdong po la sogs pa dang /sems can thams
88a1(mdo sde): kyi yan lag dang /nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems
88a2(mdo sde): dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa
88a3(mdo sde): thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog par byed/rnam par 'byed par byed/snang bar byed/yongs su ston par byed/thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/chos 'di dag ni
88a4(mdo sde): ngan song sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o//'di drag ni byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni gshin
88a5(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni lhar sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o//de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/'di dag ni brgya byin dang /tshangs
88a6(mdo sde): pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o//'di dag ni gzugs dang /g.yog dang /yid gzhungs pa dang /dpal chen po spyad pa'o//'di dag ni rig pa'o//'di dag ni sbyar rtsalA to//'di dag ni
88a7(mdo sde): bzo'i gnas so//'od dag ni gtsug lag sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o//'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o//'di dag ni rang sangs
88b1(mdo sde): rgyus kyi ga pa ste/rangs sa rgyas su 'gyur byag//'di dag ni theg pa rnon po//rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang /gzhan don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun tu
88b2(mdo sde): bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o//de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/'di dag ni sa rnams dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /rig pa rnams dang /dbang
88b3(mdo sde): rnams dang /gzungs rnams dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /ma 'dres
88b4(mdo sde): pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad+ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag byed de//
88b5(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems
88b6(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam kyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gadron mi za ba'i me tog yod du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/rigs
88b7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal dgra las gang gis lha dang /mi rnams shin tu dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan med par rnam par rtse ba dang /
89a1(mdo sde): nyams bde zhing yongs su spyod de/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kha dog dang /stobs dang /mthu dang /yid bde bas yongs su mnyam pa de lta bu'i spos dang /me tog dang /rgyan dang /gros/
89a2(mdo sde): dang /rnga dang /sil snyan la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i tsher mngon par 'bebs/yongs su spyod cing 'byin par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig
89a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang gis sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba
89a4(mdo sde): la mos shing 'dun pa dang /lus dang /dgra dang /yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /gzi dang ldan pa dang /yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa
89a5(mdo sde): thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang /mi nyam pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi snang bar 'dod par 'gyur ba'i mdo dang /dbyangs kyis
89a6(mdo sde): bskrad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /rtogs bya brjod pa dang /'di lta bu 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i ribs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /
89a7(mdo sde): chos rmad du byung ba dang /gtan la bab par bstan pa dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so//lugs dang mthun pa dang /lugs dang mi
89b1(mdo sde): mthun pa dang /snrel gzhi dang /spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub bo//tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brjod
89b2(mdo sde): cing ston la rnam par dag par byed do//chos thams cad ston//kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to//sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro//ye shes sgyu ma rnam
89b3(mdo sde): par rgyas par byed de/chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do//'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do//mtha'
89b4(mdo sde): da dbung med pa'i rdzu 'phrul pa mkhas par byed do//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i
89b5(mdo sde): me tog yid du 'ong ba'i cher rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par
89b6(mdo sde): thar pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang /ri rab dang /'od dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /chos kyi tshul dang /nags tshal dang /khang pa dang /dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i
89b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongasu gtong ba
90a1(mdo sde): yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
90a2(mdo sde): gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang /khor yu ga ra dang /rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa gun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang /rmeg med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa
90a3(mdo sde): de lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo //rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams dang /ye shes sna
90a4(mdo sde): tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo
90a5(mdo sde): thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dang ldan pa/bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du
90a6(mdo sde): byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa/tshul bzhin yid la byas nas/yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te/srid pa dang /phung po dang /khams
90a7(mdo sde): dang /skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/'jig rten thams cad las
90b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang /gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam par gzhig pas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i dru
90b2(mdo sde): thug par gnas pa/rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
90b3(mdo sde): yongs su bsags pa/ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang /ri rab dang /'od dang /zla ba dang /nyi ma dang /chos kyi tshul dang /nags tshal dang /khang pa dang /dge ba'i khor
90b4(mdo sde): yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho ba dang /'jig pa'i ye shes
90b5(mdo sde): kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
90b6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul bcu
90b7(mdo sde): po 'di bstan pa/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na de dag thams cad ji skad du gsungs
91a1(mdo sde): pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa yid bde ba dang bcas par thob par 'gyur te/brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na'ang gzhan gyi/
91a2(mdo sde): don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang /tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/sems/
91a3(mdo sde): can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan byed de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang /
91a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro//gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/sdug bsngal thams cad la rten pa'o///
91a5(mdo sde): lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o////'phags pa dkon mchog sprin//bam po bzhi pa//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
91a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dri ma med pa rnams yin/ma chags pa rnams yin/zhi ba rnams yin/shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ye shes
91a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa rnams yin/chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yin/chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/so sor mi rten pa rnams yin//
91b1(mdo sde): mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams
91b2(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//bcu grang zhe na/'di lta ste/yid du 'ong ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs
91b3(mdo sde): rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang /dri rnams dang /ro rnams dang /reg bya rnams dang /yid du 'ong ba
91b4(mdo sde): dedang yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /rnyed pa dang /ma rnyed pa dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /grags pa dang ma grags pa
91b5(mdo sde): dang /stod pa dang smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//rigs
91b6(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang /mthong na dga' ba rnams yin
91b7(mdo sde): chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang /chos nag po rnams bri bar byed pa dang /rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/rtag tu
92a1(mdo sde): brgyan pa rnams yin/chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
92a2(mdo sde): cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang /yid
92a3(mdo sde): du 'ong bas rab tu sim par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rangs pa dang /
92a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba shar na 'di lta ste/zhi ba dang /dang ba dang /sems shin tu dga' bar byed pas sems
92a5(mdo sde): can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang /sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang /spyod pa dang /spyod lam dang /
92a6(mdo sde): yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/rnam pa thams cad du rgyas kyi bar
92a7(mdo sde): du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo//yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re
92b1(mdo sde): zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/nam byang chub kyi snying po lnga 'dug pa de rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba mar
92b2(mdo sde): gyi ro la dkyil 'khor kha dog dang /snang ba dang /chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/bco lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla
92b3(mdo sde): ba'ang nam 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de ni/de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad du thams cad rab tu 'bri ste/ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad du thams cad med
92b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na zla ba shar na bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams kyis
92b5(mdo sde): rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar nA 'ang lha dang /mI dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no//
92b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag ste/rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang /gsal ba yin no//de bzhin du
92b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa/rdzus ste skyes pa/pha ma'i bcog pa dang /mer mer po las byung ba ma yin te/yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing
93a1(mdo sde): dang ba dang gsal ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dben lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te/gling bzhir snang bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba
93a2(mdo sde): 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma
93a3(mdo sde): rnyings pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba 'ang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun
93a4(mdo sde): mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba 'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi 'dod
93a5(mdo sde): pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper ni lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang
93a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste bsod nams chen po dang /ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par
93a7(mdo sde): byed pa nas 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
93b1(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin//
93b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan mor byed pa rnams yin de dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams yin/de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur ba rnams yin/snang bar byed pa rnams yin//
93b3(mdo sde): mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa rnams yin/chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar
93b4(mdo sde): byed pa rnams yin/skye bo dge ba dga' ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas/ji ltar skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe
93b5(mdo sde): na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par
93b6(mdo sde): sel to//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma shar na pad+ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shA ra na'ang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'bye bar
93b7(mdo sde): byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi
94a1(mdo sde): brjid dang /ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma'i
94a2(mdo sde): 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar ces bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba de'i tshe na dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o//rigs kyi
94a3(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/dper na dzem+bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad du thams cad nam
94a4(mdo sde): med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma shor na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi
94a5(mdo sde): ma shar na'ang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bar byed cing /gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma shar na 'od
94a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis 'od med par byed kyang nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub
94a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang /mu stegs cani ngan po'i lugs thams cad 'od med pa 'gyur mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med
94b1(mdo sde): par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma shar na dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
94b2(mdo sde): legs par ston to//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bas mnyam pa dang /mi mnyam pa legs par ston to//rigs
94b3(mdo sde): kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dag so//rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dgas so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na nyi ma
94b4(mdo sde): shar na rmo brko ba'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang dge ba'i chos las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
94b5(mdo sde): dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la/mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na'ang /skye bo dge ba rnams dang /
94b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams dang /shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur la/lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang /mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang /byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams
94b7(mdo sde): dang /shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang /'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu
95a1(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
95a2(mdo sde): dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bag mi che ba rnams yin/mi brtabs
95a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/mi zlogs pa rnams yin/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/nags tshal dang /nags tshal gyi 'dab na rgyu ba rnams yin/ri'i phug na gnas pa
95a4(mdo sde): rnams yin/len pa med pa rnams yin/bdag gis brtson 'grus dang /stobs dang /mthu thos pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba rnams yin no//
95a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par
95a6(mdo sde): mthong bas bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge 'ang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro bar bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o//rigs kyi bu 'di
95a7(mdo sde): lta ste/dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi brtabs pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal kyang mi brtabs shing rgod pa
95b1(mdo sde): dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge bstsags na phyir mi ldog pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis bsgrags na mi
95b2(mdo sde): zlogs shing mi zhum par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge ni sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byed par 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrog go/de bzhin du byang
95b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i gzhan mu stegs can gyi ri dgas rnams dang //gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs
95b4(mdo sde): bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang /sems can gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la
95b5(mdo sde): gnod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra mi sgrog go/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge ni kun du lta 'ang mi 'jigs pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang spyod pa
95b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta'ang mi 'jigs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang /nags tshal gyi 'dra ba na rgyu ba yin no//de bzhin du byang
95b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' seng ge 'ang rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon par phyogs shing nags tshal dang /nags tshal gyi 'dab na spyod pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge ni ri'i phug na
96a1(mdo sde): gnas pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang ye shes kyis brag ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng ge ni mi len
96a2(mdo sde): par 'gro ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na seng
96a3(mdo sde): ge ni gcig pu gnyis su med pa bdag gis brtson 'grus dang /stobs dang /mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'joms so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang gcig pu
96a4(mdo sde): gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang /stobs dang /mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na grong gi 'dab
96a5(mdo sde): gang na seng ge rgyu ba der ri dgras phra mo dag gis lo thog rnams chung mi gzon to//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'ang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs
96a6(mdo sde): can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog chung mi gzon te/rigs kyi bu de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin no//
96a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no//
96b1(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/byang chub kyi sems byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/lam du zhugs pa rnams yin//
96b2(mdo sde): khur chen po khyer phod pa rnams yin/sems can gyi don rnams la yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin/yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin/tshul 'chos pa dang /kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral
96b3(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/drang ba'i rang bzhin can pos drang ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba
96b4(mdo sde): rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa
96b5(mdo sde): nams yin/sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldar pa thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams
96b6(mdo sde): yin/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pase chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu ltar 'jig rten nu spyod pa rnams yin/
96b7(mdo sde): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar bzhag pas nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa dang bral ba rnam yin/'di ltar de mngon su du shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
96'a1(mdo sde): /cad la nam nur med pa rnams yin/chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tshom med pa rnams yin/rang gis lam mthong bas gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing pha ral gyi dring mi 'dzag pa
96'a2(mdo sde): rnams yin/rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no//rigs
96'a3(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i pad+ma lta bu dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mgros pa rnams yin/sdig pa chung ngu'ang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams
96'a4(mdo sde): yin/tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po rnams yin/gtsang ba rnams yin/bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/mi nub pa rnams yin/mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/blo rnam par bye ba rnams
96'a5(mdo sde): yin/blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgos pa yin pa nas ji ltar na shin tu yongs su
96'a6(mdo sde): bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni chu'i nang nas byang yang ma chags par skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du
96'a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i thabs dang /shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems
96'b1(mdo sde): dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/de'i thabs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na
96'b2(mdo sde): pad+ma la ni chu'i thigs pa chung ngu'ang mi tshogs so//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu'ang mi chags so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sa'i phyogs gang du pad+ma skyes par
96'b3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go/de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go//rigs kyi bu 'di lta
96'b4(mdo sde): ste/dper na pad+ma ni sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
96'b5(mdo sde): gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/tshul khrims dang /gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
96'b6(mdo sde): 'phye tshon po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'dra ba rnams yon/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no//rigs kyi hU~M
96'b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni kha 'byen/'di lta ste/sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snang ngo //de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer meng cing dbang po shin tu dang bas
97a1(mdo sde): bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rngub pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis
97a2(mdo sde): 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/mi brlang zhing mu cor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni rmi lam dang /ltas dang /yud tsam dag la mthong na'ang 'di lta
97a3(mdo sde): ste/don 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'ang 'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du'ang
97a4(mdo sde): bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab dang /byang
97a5(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag me tog rgyas pa de na blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de na bltas na mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/mnyan nA rna
97a6(mdo sde): ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/mnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/myangs na lce'i dbang po tshim par byed/reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim
97a7(mdo sde): par byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe na bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par
97b1(mdo sde): dag par byed/tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri mnams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/myangs pa na lce'i dbang pa rnam par dag par byed/reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na lus kyi dadang po
97b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag par byed/yon tan brjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na pad+ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/mA dang mi ma yin pa
97b3(mdo sde): dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang /tshangs pa
97b4(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no//rigs kyi bu de ltung na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/rigs kyi bu chos
97b5(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu dang 'dra ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/
97b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par sgrub po zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//sems
97b7(mdo sde): can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems
98a1(mdo sde): rgyu cher bskyed do//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge slong ngam/bram ze'am/wA 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang chos dang ldan
98a2(mdo sde): par sngon ma basbyor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis se
98a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//shes rab kyi gru sbyar te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//mgon med pa dang /skyabs
98a4(mdo sde): med pa dang /gnas med pa dang /rten med po dang /dpung gnyen med pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi gnyen bya'o zhes sems rgya tshor bskyed do//lha dang bcas/bdud dong
98a5(mdo sde): bcas/tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pas skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to//
98a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go//sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par ce'o//glang po chen po'i blta bas dalta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//sangs rgyas kyi che bas
