98a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/dka' bar spyod pas ma yin/zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do//
98b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no//
98b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/'di lta ste/bsam pa la skye mod pas bsam pa shin tu gnas pa rnams yin/'di lta ste/
98b3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /brtson pa chung bo'i yid la byed pa mi spyod pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la
98b4(mdo sde): byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/'di lta ste/nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dong bral ba rnams yin/'di lta ste/sgyu ma'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos
98b5(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//'di lta ste/lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang /ngag gis 'dod pa
98b6(mdo sde): chung ba dang /sems kyi smyon pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi tshul 'tshos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/cung zad byas pa'ang chung mi gzon ni mang po lta ci smos te/byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/byas pa
98b7(mdo sde): tshor ba rnams yin te/dgos pa byas pa la mi smod mi sbyang /yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/gzhan du na cung zad byas pa'ang tshor zhing de la bstod par byed/gzengs bstod par byed/yong dag
99a1(mdo sde): bar dga' bar byed /rab tu bsngags par byed/de la yon tan du lta ba yin no//ji ltar lta ba de ltar byung ba rnams yin te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag
99a2(mdo sde): gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis bstod cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/byang chub sems dpa'
99a3(mdo sde): rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shwar gnyer ba rnams ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa ston cing sems kyis 'khon gyi mdung par
99a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa rnams ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul mi 'chos/khagasag
99a5(mdo sde): mi byed/'jungs pa dang phrag dog gis kun tu glags pa ma yin/sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab spyan mi byed/phan tshun par 'jug pa ma yin gyi/byang
99a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo bskyed pa yin/ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra ba las su rung ba 'ang sgrub bo//byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
99a7(mdo sde): bstan pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa
99b1(mdo sde): yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/skra dang kha spu bregs/gos ngur smrig dag gyon nas yang dag par dad pas de bzhin
99b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo //de rab tu 'byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung //rkun pos gtse ba med pa dang /bu lon gyis gtse ba med pa dang /'jigs pas
99b3(mdo sde): gtse ba med pa dang /'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med pa rab tu 'byung ngo //de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin te/de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin pas dge
99b4(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/sten par byed/bsnyen bkur byed do//de dag las chos kyang nyan to//thos nas kyang nan tan byed/nga rgyal gyi zil gyis gnon pa yin te//
99b5(mdo sde): deng rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa thob po//de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid thob po//chos nyid thob pas bla na med
99b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
99b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems rnam pa dag pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lte ste/de bzhin
100a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang /byang chub sems
100a2(mdo sde): dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa dang /byang chub dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang /theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang /tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
100a3(mdo sde): gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang /sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par
100a4(mdo sde): dadang pa nas ji ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so//gang 'di
100a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang /zhi ba'i sku dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang /tshad med pa'i sku dang /phal la med pa'i sku dang /rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba thos pa 'di ni yang
100a6(mdo sde): dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/gnas 'di la nem nur med cing the tshom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par
100a7(mdo sde): dad do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/de 'di ltar sems so//gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de
100b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon sum du lung ston pa dang /gsang ste lung ston pa dang /ldem po dag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston spyod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa 'am
100b2(mdo sde): med de/de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes pa mi 'byung ngo //de cir phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/dri ma thams cad spangs pa/rdul thams cad spangs pa/
100b3(mdo sde): yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang du gyur pa/zhi ba dang ba/yongs su dog pa/rnyog pa med pa/rnam par gsal ba ste/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
100b4(mdo sde): la 'khrul pa 'am/ca co 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing bskabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/gnas pa 'di la nem nur med/the
100b5(mdo sde): tshom med de de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par drangad do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad ce na/de 'di
100b6(mdo sde): ltar sems so//gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
100b7(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyis shes par mi nus so//
101a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab ning gting dpag dka' ba/brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/rtog go'i spyod yul las shin tu 'dus pa/dpan/
101a2(mdo sde): tu med pa/rgya che ba/yangs pa/na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu
101a3(mdo sde): ba'o snyam ste/gnas 'di la nem nur med the tshom med pa yin te/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
101a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dang ba des na de 'di ltar sems so//gang 'di lta ste/byang chub kyi rgyu/byang chub kyi gzhi/byang chub kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag
101a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang /seMn gyi bya ba dang /seMn gyi byed pa dang yongs su mi skyo ba dang mi skrag pa dang /khur chen po khyer ba dang /mthu brtan pa dang /rtul ba brtan pa dang /
101a6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang /thogs pa med pa'i blo dang /mtha' yas pa'i blo dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
101a7(mdo sde): ba'i blo dang /phal la med pa'i blo dang /brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /cho ga brtan pa dang /dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang /dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang /dam bcas pa phal la
101b1(mdo sde): med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/gnas
101b2(mdo sde): 'di la de nem nur med/the tshom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba
101b3(mdo sde): la mngon par dad ce na/de 'di ltar sems so//gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'thob po//lha'i rna ba
101b4(mdo sde): dang /gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang /zag pa zad pa shes pa dang /dus gsum pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pas
101b5(mdo sde): shes pa chags pa med pa/thogs pa med pa/sgrib pa med pa thob bo//de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang
101b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/log par lta ba rnams te/log par lta ba'i las dang /chos yang dag par
101b7(mdo sde): blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o//sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan
102a1(mdo sde): par+Nangag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la sbyar ba mi 'debs pa/yang dag par lta ba rnams te/yang
102a2(mdo sde): dag par lta ba'i las dang /chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta
102a3(mdo sde): ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la lta ste/sems can gyi khams de nyid kyang dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par lta'o//de'ang 'od snyam du sems te/sngon bdag byung
102a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes du ma bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so//
102a5(mdo sde): bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu bo'o snyam ste/gnas 'di la nem nur med/the tshom med do//gang
102a6(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o//bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas des ni rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
102a7(mdo sde): byang chub dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/de 'di ltar sems so//
102b1(mdo sde): gang 'di na/ /9/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog pa'i zhes thos pa 'din yang dag pa//'don ldanan/ //na //
102b2(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na dzam+b+ha gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi 'on
102b3(mdo sde): kyang de dag ni dzam+bu'i gling du 'du'o//dzam+bu'i gling la brten to//dzam+bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o//de'i phyir gling gcig kho na ste/de ni dzam+bu'i gling ngo //de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin
102b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gan so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o//de'i phyir theg pa gcig kho na te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
102b5(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/gnas 'di la de nem nur med/the tshom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad do//ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa
102b6(mdo sde): la mngon par dad ts+tshe naM/de 'di ltar sem so//glang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dge ba'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu
102b7(mdo sde): 'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/gnas 'di la nem nur med/the tshom med de de ltar
103a1(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la
103a2(mdo sde): mngon par dad ce na/de 'di ltar semaso//gang de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'di ni mi slu ba'o//de ci'i
103a3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i lha'i bu rnaMs kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos
103a4(mdo sde): snyom ste/gnas 'di la nem nur med/the tshom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na
103a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/de 'di ltar semaso//gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa dang /brag la
103a6(mdo sde): nyal mkhyen te/sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang /'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas the tshom gcod cing yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du
103a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'dul lo//sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin
103b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go snyam thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o//'di ni de kho na'o//'dri ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/gnas 'di la de nem nur med/the tshom med de de ltar na
103b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams
103b3(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rin po che'i 'byung gnas gyur pa rnams yin//
103b4(mdo sde): zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/ro gcig pa rnams
103b5(mdo sde): yin/chu bo kun zer ba rnams yin/dus las mi yol ba rnams yin/'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/mi zad pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
103b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gan su gyur pa yin pa nas ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che'i thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin
103b7(mdo sde): te/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi zad do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/sems can thams cad
104a1(mdo sde): kyis yon tan rin po che blang bas mi zad do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
104a2(mdo sde): ye shes yang dag par grub pa'ang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/chu tshad med pas
104a3(mdo sde): na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni bgra
104a4(mdo sde): gyis gzhol/bags kyis 'bab/bags kyis bab po//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/thams cad
104a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid la bab po//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do//de bzhin du byang
104a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste//
104a7(mdo sde): dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/'di lta ste/lan tshwa'i ro'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa
104b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am gang bar
104b2(mdo sde): yang mi mngon no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am/gang bar mi mngon no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho chen po ni
104b3(mdo sde): dus las mi yol lo//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po
104b4(mdo sde): ni 'byung po mang po'i gnaso//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang /chos dkor po thams cad kyi gnaso//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po
104b5(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang
104b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin
104b7(mdo sde): no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/chos thams cad brtag
105a1(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams yin/chos
105a2(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas
105a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin smad pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
105a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa
105a5(mdo sde): 'di ni 'di lta ste/'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro//rab tu 'bar ro//kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ro//kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/zhe sdang gi du ba
105a6(mdo sde): 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongaso//kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo//de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ji
105a7(mdo sde): ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go/chos thams cad la rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud
105b1(mdo sde): bapar 'gyuraro//chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang
105b2(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung
105b3(mdo sde): ba zab mo la rnam par semaso//de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la
105b4(mdo sde): las snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du semaso//de ltar na blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so//des don
105b5(mdo sde): shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog so//don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo //de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas
105b6(mdo sde): thar bar byed do//rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas/de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
105b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams
106a1(mdo sde): cad bdag med par 'jog go/chos thams cad sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gasro ba med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /byed pa po dang tshor ba po
106a2(mdo sde): med pa dang /shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang /gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang /stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongasu brtag pa dang /rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/
106a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med ces bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o//'di ni chos nyid dang thun pa'o//chos thams cad sems can med pa srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o///
106a4(mdo sde): 'di ni chos nyid dang thun pa'o//de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po med pa dang /shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang /
106a5(mdo sde): gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang /stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang /rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o//'di ni chos nyid dang
106a6(mdo sde): mthun pa'o//rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni rigs pa'o//gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o//gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o//
106a7(mdo sde): gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o//gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o//de'ang de dag spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa rnams shes par bya'o//rigs kyi
106b1(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dag de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//
106b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/spobs pa mi brtabs pa rnams yin/
106b3(mdo sde): spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/spobs pa phal la med pa rnams yin/spobs pa zil gyis ma nor ba rnams yin/spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams
106b4(mdo sde): yin/so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//rigs
106b5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dar 'drar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/mi 'khrul
106b6(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/mi zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/yeng yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin tshig 'bru dang
106b7(mdo sde): bral ba ma yin/sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/dus dang bral ba ma yin/rtsub pa ma yin/mi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
107a1(mdo sde): kyi spobs pa ni 'dar 'dar po ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'khor gyis 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams
107a2(mdo sde): kyis spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo brtan zhing mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni zhon pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir
107a3(mdo sde): zhe na//'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngang ba yin no//
107a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni yang yeng po med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs
107a5(mdo sde): pa ni yang yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos nyid thob
107a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang
107a7(mdo sde): bral ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu gtsug lag gi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar
107b1(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyis na ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhen/sbyor
107b2(mdo sde): thams cad yang dge par sgrub pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma yin no//byang chub
107b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi skyobs pa ni gang phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra ba 'am/gang sngar smra bar bya bar phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
107b4(mdo sde): nidus shes pa yin/tshong shes pa yin/skabs shes pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rngub pa/yid du mi 'ong ba/mi snyam pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/drag
107b5(mdo sde): gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/gnas dran len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no//byang chub sems
107b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa mi gsal ba yin gyi/dbang po rnon po rnams kyi nim
107b7(mdo sde): yin te/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
108a1(mdo sde): thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dper na 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer
108a2(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin/don du smra ba rnams yin/chos su smra ba rnams yin/mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/mi ngom pa rnams yin/brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/nyon mongs par
108a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/'jam par smra bas
108a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems
108a5(mdo sde): dpa' don du smra ba ni tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems
108a6(mdo sde): dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' mi ngoms pa ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rgyag
108a7(mdo sde): ba dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral po ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar
108b1(mdo sde): byed do//byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni ngang tshul nges pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems
108b2(mdo sde): can rnams mgu bar byed do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
108b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar byed pa rnams yin no//
108b4(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston to//zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/mu stegs
108b5(mdo sde): can rnams la ma yin/ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/ma dad pa med pa rnams la ma yin/g.yo dang sgyus glags pa rnams la ma yin/'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/rnyed pa dang
108b6(mdo sde): bkur sti dang /phrag dog dang /ser snas glagus pa rnams la ma yin/sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston te/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe
108b7(mdo sde): nabyang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna'ang med/chos la slob dpon 'cheb pa'ang med sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa'ang med/sems can gyi don la rgyab kyi phyogs pa
109a1(mdo sde): 'ang med med ni/sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyon su gnas pa rnams yin no//byang chub sargyas
109a2(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/bcom ldan
109a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to//sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang /snod
109a4(mdo sde): dugyur pa rnams dang /sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang /g.yo med pa rnams dang /sgyu med pa rnams dang /spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la chags
109a5(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba rnams dang /bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa rnams dang /tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang /legs par ston
109a6(mdo sde): nus pa rnams dang /dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/brtson 'grus pa rnams par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin
109a7(mdo sde): byang bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
109b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang gang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs
109b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /yang dag par bsgrub pa'ang mi dmigaso//pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos
109b3(mdo sde): ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'ang mi dmig so//byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa 'di mi dmig so///
109b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa spang ba'ang mi dmigaso//skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral po dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
109b5(mdo sde): 'gog pa'ang mi dmigaso//rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i yang mi dmigs/lan
109b6(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs/phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mr-i dra mig so//dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang /dgra
109b7(mdo sde): bcom pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigaso//rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'ang mi dmigaso//bdag tu 'dzin
110a1(mdo sde): pa la mngon par zhon pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa'ang mi dmig so//las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang 'jog mod kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin
110a2(mdo sde): pa'ang mi dmig so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming de yod pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos ni yi ge'i rang bzhin
110a3(mdo sde): ma yin/yi ge rnams ni chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten/tha snyad la brten/brtag pa la brten te/ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/
110a4(mdo sde): ming de'ang gsog go/gsob bo//gang gsog dang gso ba de la don dam pa med do//gang la don dam pa med pa de brdzun te slu ba'i chos so//gang brdzun zhing slu ba'i chos de ni
110a5(mdo sde): byis pa skye bo slu ba'i rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no///'phags pa dkon mchog sprin//bam po
110a6(mdo sde): lnga pa//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
110a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs las kyang mi 'byung /chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung //
110b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'byung la 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung /chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'bring la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung /chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la gzugs med
110b2(mdo sde): pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung /chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la chos las kyang mi 'byung /chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la chos las 'dab par yang mi 'byung /chos kyi rjes su 'ang 'brang la
110b3(mdo sde): sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang /chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang ba chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang /chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/de ni thabs mkhas pa dang /
110b4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
110b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab can rnams yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba rnams yin/brtson 'grus
110b6(mdo sde): brtsams pa rnams yin/sgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/stong pa nyid la sgom pa
110b7(mdo sde): mang ba rnams yin/dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/de kho na mthong ba rnams yin//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni
111a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/des dge ba'i bshos gnyen/mthong nas dga' zhing rangs te/de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brten te gnaso//de la dge ba'i
111a2(mdo sde): bshes gnyen la brten pas na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no//brtson 'grus brtsams
111a3(mdo sde): pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyuraro//sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pas shin tu yongasu dag cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyuraro//de shin tu
111a4(mdo sde): yongasu dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no//de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no//stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs
111a5(mdo sde): pa'i lta bas mi 'gyur ro//de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go/de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
111a6(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla
111a7(mdo sde): dag so//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom
111b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid do//gsol pa/
111b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa yin te/'di ni yi ge dag gis gdams par
111b3(mdo sde): mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par
111b4(mdo sde): 'das pa/ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/spros pa thams cad dang bral ba blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/phye ba dang /btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/
111b5(mdo sde): rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/rtog go'i spyod yul ma yin pa/rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/
111b6(mdo sde): mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/byis pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/nyon mongs pa thams
111b7(mdo sde): cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/gnas ma yin pa/mi gnas pa/zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul
112a1(mdo sde): te/de dag nyid kyis so rang gis rig pa/dri ma med pa/ma gos pa dang rnam par dag pa/gya nom pa/mchog dam pa/phul brtan pa/ther zug mi 'jig par
112a2(mdo sde): chos can te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /ma byung yang rung ste/chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thob
112a3(mdo sde): nas sems can de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam ste/don gang gi phyir 'bad cing /rtsol ba dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /dka' ba brgya dag byed pa rigs kyi bu
112a4(mdo sde): de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//bsam gyis mi khyab pas dbyings
112a5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//gnyis su med pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/
112a6(mdo sde): ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o//rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o///
112a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyis pa de rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/
112b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo //lus kyis ni mngon du byed do///
112b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pas chos khong
112b3(mdo sde): du chud par gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ma yin te/thos pa tsam mam/bsams pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig pa'i
112b4(mdo sde): chos khong du chud par mi nus so//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na 'brog chen po'i dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la/mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub
112b5(mdo sde): phyogasu 'gro ba de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogasu 'ong ste/de'ang dpyid kyi tsha bas yongasu gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di skad
112b6(mdo sde): ces smras ste/kye skyes bu kho bo dpyid kyi tsho bas yongs su gdungs te/sgrom gyis nyen na/mtsho 'am/lteng ka 'am/rdzing gang chu bsil ba dang rnyog pa med pa/gsal bas gang ba
112b7(mdo sde): gang na yod/de gang du bdag tsha ba dang /skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de'ang lam shes pa/lam mkhas pa
113a1(mdo sde): lam mdzong ba/lam gyi mtshan ma mthong bzhig ldan te//dus de na chu'i nyes pa dang sprul ba'i rgyu sngon chad mamyong la/snron myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/
113a2(mdo sde): des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang /nag
113a3(mdo sde): tshal de'i dbus nas mtsho'am/lteng ka 'am/rdzing bu chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsol bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang /tsha ba med par
113a4(mdo sde): byos shig ces zer na/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/skom gyis nyen pa'i mi ngas chu thos ma thag dang /bsams pa tsam gyis tsha bu med
113a5(mdo sde): por 'gyur ram/skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ram/chu de'i bsrel ba'ang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lag so//bcom ldan 'das mi de nam
113a6(mdo sde): der byin nas/des chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i rgyu/mi de'i tsha bde ma mchis par 'gyuraro//skom pa dang yang bral ba gyur//des bsil bya'ang rang gis rig par 'gyur//
113a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos patsam dang /bsams patsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so//de la rigs kyi bu 'brog
113b1(mdo sde): ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i thog gi tshig blu dwags//me dpyid kyi tsha bas yongasu gdungs shing skam gyis nyan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa don nyan mongs pa'i gdung bas yongasu gdungs shing yul gyi
113b2(mdo sde): skyed pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dag so//lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa/chos myong ba chos rang gi
113b3(mdo sde): rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dag so//chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgaso//yang rigs kyi bu ba nyan cig/rigs kyis
113b4(mdo sde): de ji snyam du sems/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/dzA m+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim padud /gtsang ba dang /
113b5(mdo sde): nam pa dang /shin tu zhim pa dang /reg na bde ba las brtsams te/bsngags pa brjod na/rigs kyi bud ji snya mA du sam sa/ci sems can+d+ra de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi da'i/bsngags pa rang
113b6(mdo sde): gis rig par 'gyur ram/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnams grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam
113b7(mdo sde): mam/bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rigs pa'i chos khong du chud bar mi nus par rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu'ang dpe nyon cig/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na mi zhig gis shing zag
114a1(mdo sde): gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur la/des mi gzhan zhig gis mdun du shing thog gi rnams pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/kha dog
114a2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang /ro phun sum tshogs pa dang /dri zhim pa las brtsams te brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ci mi des shing thog gi ro des rang gi rig par 'gyur ram/
114a3(mdo sde): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de lta bas ni khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/bsams pa tsam
114a4(mdo sde): gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o//de nas sa byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
114a5(mdo sde): legs par gsungaso//bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsungaso//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos
114a6(mdo sde): 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//bcom
114a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin de/rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob pa bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyuraro//riT kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
114b1(mdo sde): ldan ma bya su sems dpa' chos kyi dbying sA la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no//bcu gang
114b2(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/tshul khrims kyi
114b3(mdo sde): phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang
114b4(mdo sde): rab tu shes/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/de'i rgyu de'i
114b5(mdo sde): rkyen de'i gzhis stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang /stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis med par yang mi
114b6(mdo sde): ltung ngo //rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med
114b7(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams
115a1(mdo sde): yin/rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/rgyu ba thams
115a2(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba rnams yin/dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa
115a3(mdo sde): rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
115a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa'ang de 'dra na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
115a5(mdo sde): kyi ci 'dra bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu de
115a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na/sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyang pha rol tam/tshur rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/mi
115a7(mdo sde): dmigs kyi tha mar na dub pa'i bskal pa can 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpag tu med pa/rgya che
115b1(mdo sde): ba'i dpag tu med pa/rgya che ba na mkha' dang 'dra ba/rtog ge ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/dmigs pa can thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/de ni brtag pa 'am/bsam pa'am//
115b2(mdo sde): gzhal ba 'am/tshad gzung bar mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
115b3(mdo sde): skabs phye na/bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
115b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bdag bstod pa ni bcom ldan
115b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsung na/de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la bstod pa mdzad pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//rigs kyi
115b6(mdo sde): bu leg so logs so//khyod kyi dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par shin tu dris la yid la gzung zhig dang /ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das legs
115b7(mdo sde): so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin
116a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang /bde ba dang /chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non
116a2(mdo sde): pa dang /rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang /bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang /grags pa 'dod pa dang /shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa'am/kha gsag byed cing yang dag
116a3(mdo sde): pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rangs pa nye bar bzhag pas chos bstan
116a4(mdo sde): pa'i skal pa yod par 'gyur/dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/de'ang de dag la yun ring por don dang /phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyu ro//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
116a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal tam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
116a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu mi shes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/dman tshogs la mos pa/shes rab chung
116a7(mdo sde): ba dad pa chung ba/dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus bstan pa dag ste/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag
116b1(mdo sde): gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/de'ang nan tan gyis sgrub bo//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la//sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par
116b2(mdo sde): gyur/sa'i phyogs de 'ang sman pa gcig pur zad de/gnyi su med la de'i yon tan gyi tsha ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang /de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni
116b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal po/nad kyis nyin pa/snyanA la mi mkhas pa/gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis/bdag gis de dag gso par bya'o snyam nas/sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du kyisam
116b4(mdo sde): tsan dag ni sman pa ste/nad la mkhas pa'o nad kyi gzhi la/mkhas pa'o//sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang /sems can de dag
116b5(mdo sde): 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya ba shes shing yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten te//de nas sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nad zhi bar byed na/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/sman
116b6(mdo sde): bde bdag la bstod par 'gyur ram/gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'ang snyan pa'i rgyal po chen pa
116b7(mdo sde): blan med pa ste/nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa/nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhil mkhas pa/nyon mongs pa'i ning gsob la mkhas pa/chos kyi spyan chen po bsgrubs pa yin yang /
117a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni shes te/nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/de dag
117a2(mdo sde): gi mdun du bdug gi yon tan dang /bsngags pa dag nyid brjod de/de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi
117a3(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i che ba thob nas/yid ches par gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la brten to//de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa la sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman de
117a4(mdo sde): dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nAd zhi bar mdzad//chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi sdug pa dang /byams pa dang /rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs
117a5(mdo sde): pa ste/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/bdag la bdag nyid bstod pa mdzad//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
117a6(mdo sde): smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
117a7(mdo sde): bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /khams gsum pa dang /byang chub dang /lam dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das
117b1(mdo sde): pA la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do//rigs//
117b2(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams byams
117b3(mdo sde): pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/chos kyi
117b4(mdo sde): byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/phan pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams
117b5(mdo sde): yin/sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams
117b6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag
117b7(mdo sde): nyid can rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can sdug bsngal ba
118a1(mdo sde): dang /skyabs med pa dang /mgon med pa dang /rten med pa dang /dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/byang chub tu sems bskyed do//byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/
118a2(mdo sde): chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing rtsol/brtson 'grus rtsom ste/dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang byed do//de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de//
118a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/tshul khrims ngan pa can tshul khrims la/gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/le lo can rnams
118a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus la sems 'khrugs pa rnams bosam gtan la/sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed cing /sems can gyi sdug
118a5(mdo sde): bsngal mi zad pa/brdzu pa/tsha ba dag gis nyen kyang byang chub la phyir ldog par mi 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid cin
118a6(mdo sde): rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag ni 'khor ba'i btsun ra rab
118a7(mdo sde): 'bar ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed de//bdag gis 'khor ba'i dpyang thag yun ring po nas thogs pa chad do zhes dga' ba skyed do//bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs ma
118b1(mdo sde): bopo'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal te zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do//bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bskul lo zhes rab tu dga' ba
118b2(mdo sde): bskyed do//bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang bdi ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do//bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa
118b3(mdo sde): yin gyis/da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do//bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa/yun ring po nas gnyid log pa/sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su
118b4(mdo sde): zin pa/mig gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang nas sad pa yin gyis/da ni gzhan yang sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do//bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang /ngan song dang /log par
118b5(mdo sde): lhultung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis/da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang /ngan 'gro dang /log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba
118b6(mdo sde): bskyed do//bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/grogs med cing gnyi su med par gar yang 'khyam zhing lam la mi mkhas la/lam+ba mi shes shing yul mi
118b7(mdo sde): shos pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed//bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
119a1(mdo sde): dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyom su la gnas pa rnams man//
119a2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mig gis rnam par shes bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyom su gnas pa rnams yin te/mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis
119a3(mdo sde): smras par mi 'gyur/gnod par mi 'gyur/rma byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang /de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams
119a4(mdo sde): dang /lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyomasu gnas pa
119a5(mdo sde): rnams yin te/yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/gnod par mi 'gyur/rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro//'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang /sdug bsngal
119a6(mdo sde): gyi sdug bsngal dang /'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyomasu gnas pa yin te/'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis
119a7(mdo sde): smras par mi 'gyur/gnod par mi 'gyur/rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro//bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyomasu gnas pa rnams yin te/de dag la dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /
119b1(mdo sde): rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal bar gyur to zhes btang snyomasu gnas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
119b2(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no///
119b3(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shi 'pho ba'ang ston/skye ba'ang ston/btsas pa dang /byis pa'i spyod pa dang /slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston/dka' ba spyod
119b4(mdo sde): paba'ang ston/byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston//bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston/yongasu mya dran
119b5(mdo sde): lasu 'angs pa chen po'ang ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i
119b6(mdo sde): rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston pa nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
119b7(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa/'jig
120a1(mdo sde): rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba/mi nyam pa/'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma tshugs pa shi 'pho bar
120a2(mdo sde): mthong na/rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho
120a3(mdo sde): brang dam pa na sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/dad pa yod rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas byang chub sems
120a4(mdo sde): dpa'i drung du mi 'dong /mi rten bsnyen bkur mi byed cing /de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/bdag cag kyang 'khod de/dus kyang ring du
120a5(mdo sde): yod kyis 'dod par bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho ston te/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas skye
120a6(mdo sde): ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing /de dag skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu sems
120a7(mdo sde): can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa de dag gi mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa
120b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems
120b2(mdo sde): dpa' btsas pa dang /byis pa'i spyod pa dang /slas kyi nang na 'dug pos yongasu smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongasu smin par bya ba dang /dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i
120b3(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang /byis pa'i spyod pa dang /slas kyi nang ni 'dug pa ston to//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang /rab
120b4(mdo sde): tu 'byung bas yongasu smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung //rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang //
120b5(mdo sde): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zo dang /lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongasu smin par bya ba yod pa/de dag yongasu smin
120b6(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /mu stegs can gzhan tshar bcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub
120b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byang chub kyi snying po'i 'gro ba'i tshe mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston la/de
121a1(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par
121a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pas rlom pa yod de de dag las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems
121a3(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul ba ston to//sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
121a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston te/gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
121a5(mdo sde): na sgra sna tshogs dang /ca co sna tshogs yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/de dag gis mthu de mthong na/bdag
121a6(mdo sde): cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya'o zhes smon lam 'deb so//rigs kyi bu sems can gang
121a7(mdo sde): ston par bkur ba dang /ston par dam bca' ba de dag gis 'byung ba dang /phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar bcad pa dang /sems can
121b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi'i grong rdal du song nas chos kyi
121b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems
121b3(mdo sde): dpa' yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston cing yongasu mya ngan las 'das
121b4(mdo sde): pa chen po'i bar du ston to//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu tshos bcu dang ldan
121b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi dge ba'i chos las phyir log pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs
121b6(mdo sde): pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/bsod nams bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin//
121b7(mdo sde): shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/brtson 'grus rtsams pa
122a1(mdo sde): rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang
122a2(mdo sde): tshor ba mi zad pa/rtsub pa/tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/sems can dmyal ba'i sems tson de dag la gnod pa'i
122a3(mdo sde): sems skyes par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam dang ldan pa yin te/de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal
122a4(mdo sde): bar skye bor mi 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis byol song gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ngo
122a5(mdo sde): dag tu skyes nas kyang byol song gi sdug bsngal mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang /rkyen de dang /gzhi des
122a6(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi nang du skyo zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dgos kyi sdug bsngal mi zad pa rtsub par myong bar 'gyur ba mang ngo //byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i
122a7(mdo sde): bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigasu mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/
122b1(mdo sde): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigasu skye ba yin te/de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang /
122b2(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang /yangs por 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang po mo tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par
122b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/chos sam/dge 'dun
122b4(mdo sde): la bya ba gang byas shing /bsnyen pa dang /bsten pa dang /bsgoms pa dang /mang du byas pas dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing /dbang po phun sum tshogs
122b5(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun pa/rmongs pa/lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul
122b6(mdo sde): can/skal ba med pa/legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/mar mi shes pa/phar mi
122b7(mdo sde): shes pa/dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gi nang du mi skye'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/dbang po gsal ba/
123a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa/mkhas par d+hAng/skal ba yod pa/rdzogs par bshad bla dang /sa par bshud ba don nga sa shes pa da ma sa nga /sangs d+d+ha NA/
123a2(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/phar shes pa/mar shes pa/dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni sngon gyi shes rab dang /ye shos kyi
123a3(mdo sde): stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang /sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur
123a4(mdo sde): ba lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o//
123a5(mdo sde): deci'i phyir zhe na/de ni thabs mkhas pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang /chos mi thos pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed med
123a6(mdo sde): paba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkon mchog sum/phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na//de ni
123a7(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mnga' ba dang /dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/byang chub sem
123b1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no//rigs kyi
123b2(mdo sde): bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba
123b3(mdo sde): rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/g.yo dang sgyu med de drang zhing sems gya gyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la
123b4(mdo sde): yid gnyis dang /nem nur dang /the tshom med pa rnams yin//chos la slob dpon 'chab pa dang bral ba rnams yin/chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/chos kyis phongs par
123b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/theg pa chen po yongasu 'dzin pa rnams yin/de yongasu 'dzin pa'i gang zag
123b6(mdo sde): rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/theg pa chen po la gzhol/theg pa chen po la gnas/theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams
123b7(mdo sde): yin/chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
124a1(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
124a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa rnams yin//tshul khrims yong su dag pa rnams yin/'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/sgrib pa
124a3(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin/dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin/rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/rnam par shes pa ma rmongs
124a4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing bkur ste yod pa yin/dam pa'i chos yongasu
124a5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin te/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang /srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin cing 'chang ngo //
124a6(mdo sde): klog go/kun chub par byed do//gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston to//de dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/lus dang /ngag dang sems kyi tshul khrims rnam
124a7(mdo sde): pa gsum gyis tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/tshul khrims yongasu dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/de'ang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/tshul khrims yongasu dag par phyir
124b1(mdo sde): 'gyod pa med pas slob pa med pa yin/sgrib pa med pas dga' ba mang ba yin/dga' ba med pas sgom pa mang ba yin/sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur//sems
124b2(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongasu dag par 'gyur/'gro ba yongasu dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no//rnam par shes pa ma rmongs
124b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir tshe rabs dran pa yin te tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no//gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu
124b4(mdo sde): nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs rjes su dran pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
124b5(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams
124b6(mdo sde): yin/chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/dge 'dun mchod cing snyen bkur ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang /
124b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba dang /ldang ba dang /thal mo sbyar ba dang /gdud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/mang du thos pa'i gang zag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/pha rol tu
125a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/byang chub kyi phyogs nA chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgra gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams
125a2(mdo sde): yin/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yino//rigs kyi bu tshes bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
125a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu spangs pa rnams yino//bcu
125a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu spangs par rig par bya'o//lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa
125a5(mdo sde): dang /cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /le lo can gyi
125a6(mdo sde): gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /byang chub la rgyab kyi phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /khyim pa dang sten pa rnam par
125a7(mdo sde): spangs pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di dag rnam par
125b1(mdo sde): spong ba'i tshe/gang zag de dag la'i sdang ba'i sems bskyod par mi bya'o//khyod khro ba'i sems dang /brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i//des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sum/
125b2(mdo sde): can rnams ni khams so sor bsten te/bsten par gyur nas chung za bar 'gyu ro zhes bka' stsal gyis/de bas na bdag gis bsten pa yongasu spang bar sems nye bar bzhag par bya'o//rigs
125b3(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu spangs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
125b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus mnyam pa rnams yin/lus yongasu dag pa rnams yin/lus rma med pa rnams yin/lus legs
125b5(mdo sde): par grub pa rnams yin/chos kyi lus rnams yin/lus brtags par bya ba ma yin zhing gti dpag dku' ba rnams yin/lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/lus zhi ba rnams
125b6(mdo sde): yin/lus na mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
125b7(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob pa rnams yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam
126a1(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus
126a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid thob po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir//sa gnyis pa la
126a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'i phyir lus yongasu dag pa 'thob po//sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba dang /gnod sems thams cad dang
126a4(mdo sde): bral ba'i phyir lus rma med pa 'thob bo//sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa thob po//sa lnga pa la byang chub
126a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus 'thob po//sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongasu grub pa'i phyir
126a6(mdo sde): lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob po//sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu grub pa dang /thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus
126a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob po//sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad bral ba dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob po//sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i
126b1(mdo sde): phyir lus na mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob po//sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob po//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyiraro//
126b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang /byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi chos
126b3(mdo sde): nyid tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu lus tha dad du bya ba med de/yon tan gyi mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do//byang chub sems dpa'
126b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa gang lags/bcom
126b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro//yon tan dang mthu'i
126b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ni tha dad par blta'o//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad
126b7(mdo sde): du blta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bas na don gyi dbang 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na
127a1(mdo sde): byi dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang /byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'di lta ste/nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i grangasu
127a2(mdo sde): 'gro mod kyi/ji ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che'i mthu dang /yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa de ltar ni byi dor ma byas pas ma yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus
127a3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangasu 'gro mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che
127a4(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongasu dag pa zhes mi brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad med
127a5(mdo sde): pa dang /nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni shin tu yong su dag pa dang /dri mi thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/byang chub sems
127a6(mdo sde): dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de tsam du khyab par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni de ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na tshes gnyis kyi zla/
127a7(mdo sde): ba ni zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ba nas//zla ba nye ba'i bar du zla ba'ang zla ba bya ba'i grangasu 'gro mod kyi/tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya ba la ma yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
127b1(mdo sde): de ni 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir tA/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas ta lus kyi grangasu 'gro mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa'i
127b2(mdo sde): lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lam mar mi 'gyur/lhan ner mi 'gyur/lhang nger mi 'gyuro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba nya ba'i drung na chos gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba
127b3(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no///
127b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sba ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa
127b5(mdo sde): rnams yin/khro ba dang /gnod sems kyi tha ba dang /dri ma dang /nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa dang /lta ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/'jig rten gyi
127b6(mdo sde): chos brgyad po de dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams
127b7(mdo sde): yin/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/mu stegs can dang pha rol po thams cad kyi mi tshugs pa rnams yin/bdud
