128a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin//
128a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu
128a3(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bkur ba rnams yin/mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/phyin par byed par rnams
128a4(mdo sde): yin//brten par bya ba rnams yin/nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/rgyags par shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/mi ngoms
128a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
128a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na dod dpon chen
128a7(mdo sde): po ni rgyal po dang /rgyal po chen po'i blon po dag gis bkur ba yino//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams
128b1(mdo sde): kyis bkur ba yin//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no//de
128b2(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang slob pa dang /mi slob pa dang /gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi
128b3(mdo sde): 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dag gis/mchod par 'os pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par lam grogs kyi tshogs 'chan pas gtses
128b4(mdo sde): pa dag legs par bde zhing yongasu mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin te/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang du sems can lam
128b5(mdo sde): grogs kyi tshogs nyon mongs pa'i 'tshan pas gtses pa legs par bde zhing yongasu mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po la brten na/
128b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang /phongs pa drug 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can+da dang /kun
128b7(mdo sde): tu rgyu dang /gcer bu pa rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang /las byed pa'i mi dang /zho
129a1(mdo sde): shas 'tsho ba dang /de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ded dpon chen po'ang 'khor ba la mngon par dga'
129a2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogasu chos te lam grogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par
129a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/grong khyer chen por byin gyi bar du rgyags phun sum tshogs pos 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongasu skyo ba med par 'byung bar
129a4(mdo sde): byed do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang nam sangs rgyas kyi brten pa'i phyogasu 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can lam grogs mang po ded de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon
129a5(mdo sde): pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o rigs
129a6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'od lta ste/gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru la sogs pa mang
129a7(mdo sde): po bsogs shing phyogs pas 'gro'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs
129b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rgyas kyi tshogs shin tu bsag shing 'grag/r-ir+b+hu kyi bu 'di lta steng per na ded dpon chen po na nar bsngags pas chog mi shes bya yin no//byang chub sems dpa' da dpon chan
129b2(mdo sde): 'ang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste/nor phun sum tshogs pa dang /gtso bo dang /dbang po yod pa dang /ngag
129b3(mdo sde): mnyan pas lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang 'di lta ste/yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /yongs
129b4(mdo sde): kyi gtso bo dang /chos la dbang ba dang /ma log par slabs sems can lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ded dpon chen po
129b5(mdo sde): nigrong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po 'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin
129b6(mdo sde): te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu pode
129b7(mdo sde): ngag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta
130a1(mdo sde): ste/lAm mnyam pa'ang rab tu shes lam nyam nga ba'adu rab tu shes/lam bde ba'ang rab tu shes/'tsham pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/lam chu che ba dang /chu med pa/
130a2(mdo sde): 'ang rab tu shes/lam gyi dgongs mal dag kyang rab tu shes/lam gyi tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes/lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/lam
130a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba'ang rab tu shes so//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
130a4(mdo sde): dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/byang chub sems dpa'i lam ston gyi nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to///
130a5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi ston to//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la
130a6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis lam ston gyi/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to//
130a7(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang /chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang /stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/bdag dang
130b1(mdo sde): sems can dang /srog dang /gsob dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag gi lam mi ston to//mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i snyoms can rnams lha mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi/mtha'
130b2(mdo sde): gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to//sems g.yongs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi ga nas dang /lhag mthong gi lam ston gyi g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to//spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i
130b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyi byis pa spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lam mi ston to//'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das
130b4(mdo sde): pa'i lam ston kyi 'khor ba'i lam mI ston to//lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam srol mdod pa ma yin pa dang /tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyis nyon mongs pa'i tshe rams
130b5(mdo sde): gang ba'i lam mi ston to//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
130b6(mdo sde): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//tshor ba rnams dang /sems rnams
130b7(mdo sde): dang /chos rnams dang /yul rnams dang /dgon pa rnams dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /gzhongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang /rnyed pa
131a1(mdo sde): dang /bkur sti dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa rnams dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
131a2(mdo sde): yongasu nyon mongs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar
131a3(mdo sde): bzhag cing gnas zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongasu spong ngo ///
131a4(mdo sde): de 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nus brtsams te/yar la glad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go/lus la bdag med par yang rtog go//lus mi brtan pa dang /'jig pa dang /chu rgyus
131a5(mdo sde): kyis glags pa dang /dri mi zhim pa dang /dring ba dang /kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang /lus la 'dod chags pa dang /lus la
131a6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /lus la zhen po de dag mi 'byung ste/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/
131a7(mdo sde): gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa'o//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams
131b1(mdo sde): la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing granas zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/tshor ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci
131b2(mdo sde): log tu gyur pa rnams ni bde bar 'dzin te/byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin gyis 'phags pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugasu chud do snyam nas de spang
131b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir nan tan du byed do//sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/de de ltar rtog pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye
131b4(mdo sde): bar bzhag cing gnas//de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang med/khong khro ba'ang med cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no//gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/de ltar na tshor ba rnams
131b5(mdo sde): tha dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/de 'di snyam du sems te/sems 'di ni mi rtag pa la rtag par
131b6(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba'o//sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o//bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'o//mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o//g.yo zhing mi brtan
131b7(mdo sde): pa la phyung du 'gro ba'o//nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o//ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o//nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o//bde 'gro rnams chud son pa'o//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang //
132a1(mdo sde): gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du gyur pa'o//chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o//chos thams cad kyi thog mar sems 'gro ste/sems yongasu shes na chos thams cad kyang
132a2(mdo sde): yongasu shes par 'gyuraro//gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bres pa ste/sems ni sems kyis mi mthong ngo //dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i/las ni sems kyis bsags pa'o//
132a3(mdo sde): sems ni mgal me lta bur 'khor/sems ni rta ltar 'khyam pa yin/sems ni nags kyi me ltar rnam par tshig/sems ni chu chen bzhin du skyed/de de ltar rtog pas sems la dran pa shin
132a4(mdo sde): tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro'i sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/sems nyid de'i dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub
132a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/'di la byang chub sems dpa'
132a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug la sogs pa dang /de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnamaso zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
132a7(mdo sde): te/de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten/zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin//chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas chos de dag
132b1(mdo sde): la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/chos de dag kyang yang dag par blangs shing gnas//gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa
132b2(mdo sde): shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gan so//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang /yid du mi 'ong
132b3(mdo sde): ba'i gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /raM dang /reg bya la chags par 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur/khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/de 'di snyam du sems te/de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i
132b4(mdo sde): chos rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni bdag mi cha ste/de ni bdag byis pa dang /rmongs pa dang /mi gsal ba dang /mi mkhas par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur nas zhen
132b5(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro//zhen nas rmongs par 'gyu ro//rmongs nas dge ba 'am/mi dge ba'i chos rnam par sgom par mi gyur te/de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro bar gsungaso zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag
132b6(mdo sde): chos gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/de ni bdag gi mi bzod pa dang /dang du mi len pa dang /khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/'phags pa rnams kyis
132b7(mdo sde): ni spyad par 'gyur/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni dbye bar 'gyuraro zhes de de ltar rtog pas yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/yul rnams kyis mi
133a1(mdo sde): rmas shing rma byung bar mi 'gyur la/gzhan yang bslab pa btsas pa de nyid la 'god te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing
133a2(mdo sde): gnaso//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams
133a3(mdo sde): kyi gnaso//zhi bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnaso//dgon pa la ni lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/de dag bdag gis sems
133a4(mdo sde): dang /sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa de ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/de tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la bya ba thams
133a5(mdo sde): cad dang bral nas tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa mang ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing
133a6(mdo sde): gnaso//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /gzhongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing
133a7(mdo sde): gnas zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /gzhongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod
133b1(mdo sde): pa na gnas gang tshul dang mi 'dra zhing yongasu spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi mthun pa de dag yongasu spong ngo //de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste chang ba'i khyim mam/smad 'tshong gi khyim mo//
133b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/brgyan po'i gnas sam/ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam/gar mkhan dang /glu gar gyi gnas dang /de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'dra ba
133b3(mdo sde): de dag yongasu spong zhing /de dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /gzhongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i
133b4(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin
133b5(mdo sde): tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ci nas kyang zhen
133b6(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur/sred pa mi skyed/chags pa mi skyed/bdag gir mi byed/nor du mi 'dzin pa dang /bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang /ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas shing
133b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba de ltar gtong ste/gal te de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad pa zhig byung yang des khengs par mi 'gyur//
134a1(mdo sde): nga rgyal mi skye/rgyags pa mi skye ste/de 'di snyam du semaso//ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gang las byung ba dang /gang gis byung ba
134a2(mdo sde): dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang med par 'gyur na/de la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa//
134a3(mdo sde): yid brtan du mi rung ba dag la dga' ba'i sems skyes pa 'am/khengs par 'gyur ba dang /nga rgyal dang /rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang /
134a4(mdo sde): bkur sti dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshig su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la
134a5(mdo sde): dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslab te/mngon par
134a6(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//yongasu
134a7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes de
134b1(mdo sde): de ltar yid ches pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa yin te/brtson par byed pa dang /legs par bya ba byed cing shin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
134b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /yongasu nyon mongs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs
134b3(mdo sde): ba thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/yongasu nyon mongs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa
134b4(mdo sde): rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/de dag gang las byung ba dang /rkyen gang gis byung ba'i gzhi 'ang rab tu shes te/des de ltar shes nas 'byung ba de dang /rkyen de dag yongasu spong ste/rigs kyi
134b5(mdo sde): bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /yongasu nyon mongs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa yin no//rigs kyi bu
134b6(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi ched par sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin no////'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/bam po drug pa/
134b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yang dag par blangs pa la bstan pa rnams yin/sems dma' ba
135a1(mdo sde): rnams yin/yongasu myi skyo ba rnams yin/de la ma zhen pa rnams yin/nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/bdag la mi bskyod pa
135a2(mdo sde): rnams yin/gzhan la mi spyod pa rnams yin//tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'dra ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi byed la ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rang
135a3(mdo sde): pal brten pa yin pa nas/ji ltar na lta 'dra ba'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'ad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
135a4(mdo sde): la dad cing yid ches pa yin/de srog gi phyir yang yang dag par blangs pa mi 'jig cing yang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas bsam pa phun sum
135a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang /de sems dma' zhing nga rgyal med pa yin/de nga rgyal med cing sems dma' bas phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongasu por ba skye bo thams cad dang mi mthun pa dag sdud do//de dag
135a6(mdo sde): bsdu nas 'khru bar byed do//de 'khru ba dang /kun pa dang /zo tsam pa dang /btso ba byed pa na sanA nas nyon mongs pa med cing yongs mi skye ste/yongasu mi skyo brkyen du byas nas ji tsam gyis
135a7(mdo sde): doni 'grub par 'gyur ba mi gtogs par de la zhen par yang mi 'gyur//kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni zhigs pa'o//kye ma phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag na rnam pa'o//kye ma'o phyag dang
135b1(mdo sde): khrod pa 'di dag ni shig mang ba s+ho/lus la mi bring zhing rdul 'byin to nas nyes par blta ba ma yin gyi/phyag darang khrod pa 'di dag na drang srong gis bgos pa'o//'dod chags dang bral bu dang mthun pa'o//
135b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rigs dang mthun pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pos bstod pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan tu lta ba yin te/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i
135b3(mdo sde): gzhis bdag la mi bstod//gzhan la mi smod do//de bdag la bstod cing gzhan smod pa dang bral bas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin te/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du
135b4(mdo sde): ba yin/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu btsa' ba yin/mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongasu bsrung ba yin/bram ze dang /rgyal
135b5(mdo sde): rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/tshangs pa mtshungs pa spyod pa rnams kyis gzeng bstod par bya ba yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
135b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yino//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la spyod pa
135b7(mdo sde): dman tshogs kyis ci zhig bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyor ba yin te/stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'jig
136a1(mdo sde): rten dang 'thun par spyod kyi stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu ma thob pas ni nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i gnyen po bsten
136a2(mdo sde): bapar bya'o//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de dzi snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos som/'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
136a3(mdo sde): sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/'a stsal pa'i lan gsol du bdag gis tshig mi byin to//de ci'i phyir na na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa la smos pa
136a4(mdo sde): ma lags kyi/bcom ldan 'das ni chos ni gzigs pa/bde bar gshegs pa ni chos gzigs pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang la'ang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis//bcom ldan
136a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za mos pa dman pa gzhan dag la spyad pa
136a6(mdo sde): dman tshogs ston cing de dag gi mdun du sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ni'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan
136a7(mdo sde): 'das sems can de dag de lta bus 'dul ba'i slad du ste/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gas du zhugs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa
136b1(mdo sde): ston pa mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyag dar khrod par 'gyur gyi/dman pa
136b2(mdo sde): la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yi no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no///
136b3(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste chog shes pa rnams yin/'dod pa chung ba rnams yin/kun tu btsal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/bsags pa chud zos pa dang
136b4(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/bsags pa chud zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba rnams yin/yid mi bde ba dang bral ba rnams yin/'khrug pa dang bral ba rnams yin/len pa med pa rnams yin/zag pa
136b5(mdo sde): zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gos ngan don gyis chog shes shing 'dod pa chung ba yin/de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba med pa yin/kun
136b6(mdo sde): tu tshol ba med pas na sogs pa med pa yin/sngogs pa med pas na bsags pa chud za ba med pa yin/bsags pa chud za ba med pas na bsngags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa yin//
136b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal med pas na yid mi bde ba med pa yin/yid mi bde ba med pas na 'khrug pa med pa yin/'khrug pa med pas na len pa med pa yin/len pa med pas na zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa
137a1(mdo sde): yin te//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phying
137a2(mdo sde): ba can rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod chags kyi bsam pas mi 'gro ste/de'i phyir phying ba can zhes bya'o//de bzhin du zhe sdang gi bsam pas mi 'gro/gti mug gi bsam
137a3(mdo sde): pabs mi 'gro/khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam pas mi 'gro/phrag dog dang /ser sna'i bsam pas mi 'gro/nga rgyal gyi bsam pas mi 'gro/grags pa 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/
137a4(mdo sde): shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/rnyed pa dang /bkur sti 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro zhing bdud la mi 'dud/dga' bar byas nas snyems pa ma yin te/de'i phyir phying pa can zhes
137a5(mdo sde): bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phying ba can rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no///
137a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams yin/mthar gyis bsod snyoms len pa rnams yin/yongasu yi 'chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin//
137a7(mdo sde): cho ga shes pa rnams yin/bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin/ma chags pa rnams yin/bsod snyoms bza' ba la tshod shes pa rnams yin/dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du
137b1(mdo sde): phyogs pa rnams yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu yongasu bsdus pa rnams yin/ril po'i 'du shes med pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan
137b2(mdo sde): par zhugs pa yin pa nas/ji ltar ril po'i 'du shes med pa'i bar du yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa
137b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na/sems can de dag la phan par bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms pa'i yi dam 'dzin te/de nam grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong 'dab du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe dran pa
137b4(mdo sde): shin tu nye bar bzhag pa dang /spyod lam mdzes pas dbang po mi g.yo ba dang dbang po mi rgod pa dang /dbang po dul ba dang /gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba dang /dge ba'i chos rnams la dran pa shin
137b5(mdo sde): tu nye bar bzhag cing bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o//de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro na de bsod snyoms mthar gyis len pa yin te/mgo 'phang bstod cing bram ze'i rigs shing sAl ltar che zhing mtho
137b6(mdo sde): ba'i grong ngam/rgyal rigs shing sAl ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong ngam/khyim bdag shing sA la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong 'byor pa 'byor pa dag tu mi 'jug gi mtha' gcig nas bzung ste/nam de'i
137b7(mdo sde): don grub par gyur kyi bar du bsod snyoms la spyod de/gzhan du na gnas gang na khyi za ba 'am/ba drus ma 'am/byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs pa rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul ngan pa'i srog chags
138a1(mdo sde): sama?/bud med dang /skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo kya la ka bya ba'i bsam pa can dag yod pa 'am/smad pa'i gnas thams cad du thams cad yongasu spong ste/de mthar gyis
138a2(mdo sde): bsod snyoms la 'gro na yongasu yi mi 'chad cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med la/sems can de dag la chags pa'ang mi skyed/khong khro ba'ang mi skyed de/yongasu yi 'chad po med pas so so ci
138a3(mdo sde): rigs pa'i bsod snyoms ngan don gyis chog shes pa yin te/des bsod snyoms de blangs nas bdag gi gnasu 'ongs s+ho/lhung bzed dang /chos gos bzhag/rkang lag bkrus te/de bzhin
138a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzugs sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la bkur sti dang /rim gro byas te/gnasu song nas/bsod snyoms de las cha gcig ni tshangs pa mtshungs par
138a5(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams kyi phyir gzhag go/gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi phyir gzhag/gsum pa ni sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi phyir gzhag/cha bzhi pa ni bdag za ste/de za ba na 'dod
138a6(mdo sde): tshogs med par zo ste/chags par ma yin/brkam par ma yin/zhen par ma yin gyi/gzhan du na ji tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba dang /'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir za ste/ji ltar ha cang yang
138a7(mdo sde): nyams dma' ba dang /ha cang yang lus lci bar mi 'gyur ba ltar za ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ha cang yang nyams dmas na ni dge ba'i phyogs la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyuraro//lus ha cang lcis
138b1(mdo sde): na ni gnyid kyis non par 'gyur ro//des bsod snyoms de zos nas dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /le lo med pa dang /snyom pa med pa dang /byang chub kyi
138b2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi chos yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongasu 'dus pas bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa yin/bdag tu 'dzin pa med pas bdag gi shes kyang sems can rnams
138b3(mdo sde): la phan 'dogs pa yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa
138b4(mdo sde): rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdud thams cad kyis sdigs kyang byang chub kyi snying po'i stan gcig las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las mi
138b5(mdo sde): g.yo ba rnams yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/stong pa nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams
138b6(mdo sde): yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/lam las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi g.yo ba rnams yin//
138b7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan las mi g.yo ba rnams yino//rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan no//rigs
139a1(mdo sde): kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/de ni chos kyi stan no//stan de las byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi g.yo ste/de bas na stan gcig pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu
139a2(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin//bcu gang zhe na/
139a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/mi brkam pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/mi chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/de dag gis na mchod bzung bar gyur pa de'i tshe nyi tshong yod dam med kyang rung ste/de dag gi
139a4(mdo sde): lus ston pa'i yo byad 'di lta ste/mar ram/'bru mar ram/sbrang rtsi 'am/bu ram mam/rtsa ba'i khu ba 'am/sdong po'i khu ba 'am/'bras bu'i khu ba de lta bu dag bzar mi rung //gzhan za
139a5(mdo sde): ba mthong na'ang khong khro ba'i sems dang /'jungs pa'i sems kyang mi skyed do//yang gal te zas phyis mi len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ji lta bu'i nad kyis srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba
139a6(mdo sde): 'am/dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du 'gyur te/nad tshabs chen des 'gyod pa med cing the tshom mod par byas la/smon yin par sems nye bar bzhag pas spyad par bya ste/rigs kyi bu de
139a7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos
139b1(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/'dul ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/dbang po
139b2(mdo sde): ma nyams pa rnams yin/mang du thos pa rnams yin/nus pa rnams yin/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ri dgas dang 'dra ba rnams yin/lus kyi mtha' bsrings pa rnams

140a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/gang dag tu mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/gang dag tu chen por 'gyur ba dang /gang dag tu 'bring dang /gang dag tu chung ngur 'gyur ba po

140a4(mdo sde): yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /gnas gang dag na chu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa/gtsang zhing dri ma med pa/tshigs chung ba yod pa dang /gnas gang na shing phun sum tshogs pa/me tog phun sum
140a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa/'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/gcan gzan khro bo med pa/phug dang ldan pa/sman gshod dang ldan pa/thag thug med pa/'gro na bde ba/zhi ba gnyis

140a7(mdo sde): dang /dbang po mi rgod cing phyir rol tu ma song ba'i sems kyis dad pas nye bar 'tsho zhing tshig nye bar bzung ste//mtshan ma 'dzin cing gnyid kyis ma log par kha ton byed do//gal te dge slong
140b1(mdo sde): dgon pa pa'i drung du rgyal po 'am/blon po chen po 'am de ma yin pa gzhan bram ze 'am/rgyal rigs sam/grong pa'am/yul gyi ming ga 'ongs na/de de dag la gus par legs par 'ongs zhes brjod
140b2(mdo sde): par bya ste/des rgyal po chen po ji ltar gdan bting ba la bzhugs shing /ces de skad byas nas gal te 'dug na gnyi ka'ang 'dug par bya'o//de ste mi 'dug na gnyi ka'ang mi 'dug par bya'o//gal te dbang
140b3(mdo sde): pobo rgod par gyur na rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis phyogs na dge slong dang /bram ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan pa/yon tan dang ldan pa/mang du thos pa dag mi rgod dang /spre'u rnams kyis ma gtses par
140b4(mdo sde): gnas pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bstod par bya'o//de ste brtan zhing dul la dbang mo rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te/chos bstan par rung na de la chos sna tshogs bstan par bya'o//de ste chos sna tshogs
140b5(mdo sde): bstan pa las mi dga' na de la skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan par bya'o//de ste skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa la mi dga' na de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe ba rgyas che ba/rgya che ba dag bstan par bya'o//

141a1(mdo sde): ba yin no//de bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar dgon pa de na mi 'jigs/mi skrag/mi dang babag tsha ba med cing /rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur te gnas//
141a2(mdo sde): de dgon pa de na dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing 'du 'dzi med par gnas pas ri dgas dang 'dra ba yin no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa ni ri dgas ltar rtog tu 'jig pa ma yin te//
141a3(mdo sde): dedag la ri dgas kyi nyes pa yang med mod kyi/ji ltar ri dgas dag pa dag 'di'i lan blon gyis srog gi bar chad du gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yul dang yul gyi phyogs ring po bas kyang ring por spong ba
141a4(mdo sde): 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdag 'didra'i lan blon gyis yi dam gyi bar chad dam/sems g.yengs par gyur na mi rung zhes bud med dang /skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams dang

143b7(mdo sde): rung /ro phun sum tshogs pa'ang rung /ro chung ba'ang rung ste/de thams cad du yug gyi mes reg pa dang /btsog par 'gyur te/rul cing dri nga ba dang /'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'phrod pa yin
144a1(mdo sde): naHde la byis pa 'di dag ni shin tu zhen cing rab tu chag so//bdag cag ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnas te/yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
144a2(mdo sde): du brtags te/'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhen ma chags par bya'o//de'i phyir skyo ba'i sems kyang mi bskyed do snyam ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no//

144a4(mdo sde): laM mngon du phyogs te/shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po drang ba dang /lus bags kyis glod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis
144a5(mdo sde): 'di snyam du semaso//sems can gang dag khro ba dang /gnod sems mang ba/mi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams dang /gang rnams bdag la rgol ba dang /dgro bo gcugs med par shar gnyer
144a6(mdo sde): ba rnams byung ba 'am/'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang rung ste/bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang /gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byas te/byang chub kyi snying po la 'grod par bya'o//de 'ang
144a7(mdo sde): ngag tsam gyis ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas sems te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba yin//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
144b1(mdo sde): bsgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags skyes pa dang /khro ba skyes pa/gnod sems kyi sems skyes na 'di snyam du sem so//chos 'di su la skye ba de yang rten cing 'brel
144b2(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'o//chos gang skye ba de'ang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o//rkyen gang dag gis skyo ba de dag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gsog de dag la
144b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag la rma 'byin snyam te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa mang ba yin//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon la mkhas pa
144b4(mdo sde): yin zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag gi rgyud la skyon yod pa de dag spang ba'i phyir nan tan byed gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa mi nus pa'i rang bzhin de dag la'ang btang snyom su gonas//skyon de
144b5(mdo sde): dadag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas la ri mo mi byed pa dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /bslab pa dang /'phags pa rnams dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rgan rabs dang /bar ma dong /
144b6(mdo sde): gsar bu rnams la ri mo mi byed pa ni skyon no//bdag la ri mo byed pa dang /gzhan la brnyas pa dang /yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang /mya ngan las 'das po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /bdag
144b7(mdo sde): tu lta ba dang /sems can du lta ba dang /srog tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu lta ba dang /chad par lta ba dang /rtag par lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du 'dzin po dang /rtag par 'dzin pa dang /mi rtag par 'dzin pa dang /
145a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams la mnyes par mi byed pa dang /byis pa pa'i skye bo dang sten pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongasu sbyong ba dang /sems can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can la bsnyen
145a2(mdo sde): bkur byed pa dang /sdig pa'i grogs po la sten pa dang /dge bo'i bshes gnyen yongasu spong ba dang /mdo sde zab mo sbyong ba dang /mdo sde zab mos skrag pa dang /snyoms las dang /le lo dang bdag la
145a3(mdo sde): brnyas pa dang /gzi brjid chung ba dang /spobs pa med pa dang /gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa dang /mi 'gyod pa la 'gyod pa dang /'gyod pa la mi 'gyod pa dang /sgrib pa kun nas ldang bas klags pa dang //
145a4(mdo sde): g.yo sgyus bcings pa dang /rmugs shing gnyid kyis non pa dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti 'dod pa dang /rus la 'dod chags pa dang /rigs la 'dod chags pa dang /lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang /
145a5(mdo sde): yul la 'dod chags pa dang /'khor la 'dod chags pa dang /'jig rten rgyang ban gyi gsang tshig la sten pa dang /dam pa'i chos las 'byol ba dang /yi dam 'dor ba dang /mi dge ba dang ldan pa
145a6(mdo sde): dag la rtsol ba dang /dge ba dang ldan pa dag la mi rtsol ba dang /rab tu byung ba dang sde dang /skyes pa dang sde pa dang /bud med dang sde pa dang /khye'u dang bu mo dang sde pa dang /mu stegs can dang sde pa
145a7(mdo sde): dang /dgon pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /zas kyi tshod mi shes pa dang /bla ma'i drung du mi 'gro ba dang /kha ton gyi dus mi shes pa dang /spyod yul gyi gnas mi shes pa dang /bslab pa phra mo
145b1(mdo sde): dag la gus par mi byed pa dang /sdig pa chung ngu rnams la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang /dbang po gti mug gis bsgribs pa dang ldan pa dang /g.yeng ba la dbang po grims pa dang /rgod par sbyor ba dang /bcos
145b2(mdo sde): dka' ba dang /bka' blo mi bde ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan ma dang /dpe byad du 'dzin pa dang /khro ba rnams la sems mi byams pa dang /sdug bsngal ba rnams
145b3(mdo sde): la snying mi brtse ba dang /na bas skyo bar mi byed pa dang /shi bas mi skrag pa dang /kun nas 'bar ba las mi 'byung ba dang /lus la so sor mi rtog pa dang /tshul khrims la so sor mi rtog pa dang /ci byas ci
145b4(mdo sde): byed ci bya zhes so sor mi rtog pa dang /mi bsam pa la sems pa dang /mi rtag pa la rtog pa dang /mi smon pa la smon pa dang /mi 'byung ba la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /mi dga' ba la dga' bar 'du
145b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang /lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes pa dang /ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang /'phral gyi byi ba la chags pa dang /byed pa ngan pas g.yengs pa dang /dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po
145b6(mdo sde): rnam par spong ba dang /theg pa chen po la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la mi bsngags pa brjod
145b7(mdo sde): pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /rtsod pa lhur byed pa dang /'thab pa'i ngang tshul can dang /brlang ba dang /rtsub pa dang /pho thag can dang /
146a1(mdo sde): dang /spyi rdol che ba dang /gtum pa dang /gdug pa dang /ngag mi snyan pa dang /mu cor smra ba dang /mi gtsigs par smra ba dang /ngan du smra bas smra ba dang /brdzun zer bas spros pa la
146a2(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba dang /spros pa la gzhol ba'i skyon no//de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid sgom pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//de stong pa nyid
146a3(mdo sde): la sgom pa mang bas gnas gang dang gang dag la sems 'jug cing sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ngo bo nyid yongasu btsal na stong par rtog so//sems de gang yin pa de'ang yongs
146a4(mdo sde): brtags na stong pa'o//gang gis brtags pa de yang stong par rtog so//de de ltar rtog pas mtshan ma med pa la rnal 'byor du byed do//de la nang gi mtshan ma gang dang /snang bar gyur pa de dang /de dag
146a5(mdo sde): mtshan ma med par byed do//ci nas kyang lus mi dmigs pa dang /lus la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang /lus la sems mi gtong ba dang /phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams mi dmigs pa dang /phyi
146a6(mdo sde): rol gyi mtshan ma rnams la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang /sems mi gtong ba de ltar na mtshan ma med par byed do//de phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral ba dang /lus kyi mtshan ma rnams dang
146a7(mdo sde): phul bas nang gi mtshan ma rnams spang ba'i phyir zhugs te/sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba skyed do//de sgom pa mang bas rtag tu sgom pa rtag tu sgom pa la brtson pa yin/rgyun mi chad par ni
146b1(mdo sde): gnas dang /lhag mthong la gnas pas gnas pa yin/de la zhi gnas ni sems rtse gcig pa'o//lhag mthong ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa'o//de sems mnyam par
146b2(mdo sde): bzhag pas 'gyod pa med cing rab tu dga' ba yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'i phyir//tshul khrims yong su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnal 'byor spyod pa yin
146b3(mdo sde): te/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams la ni rnal 'byor yang dag par 'grub//tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni rnal 'byor la spyod de/de bas na rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams shes bya'o///
146b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams yino//bcu gang zhe na/
146b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/dam pa'i chos kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi zang zing gi phyir ma yino//bstan pa kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin//dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi
146b6(mdo sde): 'chad pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi bkur sti'i phyir ma yin//theg pa chen po lnga yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams rjesu gzung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi grags pa dang /sgra dang /tshigasu bcad
146b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ma yin no//mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to//sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to//shes rab kyi mig
147a1(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i sems can rnams shes rab kyi mig 'thob par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to//nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos rgya
147a2(mdo sde): theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to//theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to//bdag nyid kyang bla na med
147a3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi theg pa chung ngu la ni mi smon to//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams yin to//rigs kyi bu
147a4(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dul ba 'ang rab tu shes/'dul ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes/'dul ba zab pa'ang rab tu
147a5(mdo sde): shes/'dul ba zhib pa'ang rab tu shes/rung ba dang mi rung ba'ang rab tu shes/rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba'ang rab tu shes/bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba 'ang rab tu shes/so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i gleng
147a6(mdo sde): gzhi dang 'byung ba 'ang rab tu shes/nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'ang rab tu shes/byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'ang rab tu shes so//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul
147a7(mdo sde): baba'adzin pa rnams yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang /spyod yul dang /spyod pa dang /spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di
147b1(mdo sde): lta ste/nyan thos kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslab pa rnams yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin//
147b2(mdo sde): dodag shin tu bslabs pas na/cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin//cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pas dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa'i spyod yul rnams yongasu spong //de dag
147b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir gnas ma yin par mi spyod/yul ma yin pa dang /dus ma yin par mi spyod/de dag dge sbyong gi spyod yul la spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/dge sbyong ngam/bram zes 'di lta ste/don dang
147b4(mdo sde): mi ldan pa de dang /des mtshang brur med la gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de snyed la 'jog par byed do//de dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs pas spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/spyod lam rab tu zhi bas
147b5(mdo sde): spyod lam bcos pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chog dang /spyod yul dang /spyod pa dang /spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no///
147b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag
147b7(mdo sde): par 'dzud/sbyin pa'i bsngags po sme ba rnams yin/gzhan dag gis sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/sbyin pa'i bdag po gzhan dag la'ang gzing stod cing rab tu dga' bar byed/gzhan dag la
148a1(mdo sde): byin yang 'di snyam du bdag cag byin cig gzhan la ni ma yin//bdag cag gir gyur la/gzhan dag gir ma gyur cig ces sems mi bskyed/'di snyam du 'di lta ste/sems
148a2(mdo sde): can thams cad 'tsho ba'i yo byad de dang de dag thob par gyur cig/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang ldan te bde bar gyur cig/bdag cog gis kyang de nyid kyi don du 'bad par
148a3(mdo sde): bya/btsal bar bya'i/bdag cag gis der ser sna dang /phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes sems bskyed do//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser
148a4(mdo sde): sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yinano//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
148a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snyoms par spyod pa rnams yin/sems can thams cad la sems khong khro ba'i sems med pa rnams yin/sems can thams cad la gnod sems med pa
148a6(mdo sde): rnams yin/sems can thams cad kyi don kho nar sbyin pa dgra sbyin/tshul khrims srung /bzod pa sgom/brtson 'grus rtsom/bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed/shes rab sgom/
148a7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par sgrub mod kyi/gnyis la gnas pa'i sems kyis sgrub pa ma yin gyi/sems can thams cad la mthun mong gi sems dang /sems can thams
148b1(mdo sde): cad la dmigs par sgrub ste/ci nas kyang chos nyid myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba de ltar sgrubo//de dag 'khor ba rab tu 'bad pa nas bdag nyid byung nas gzhan dag kyang 'byin te/de'ang mnyam pa nyid kyi
148b2(mdo sde): sems nye bar bzhag cing 'byin gyi sdug pa'i sems kyis ma yin te/khong khro bas ma yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag la bu sdug pa phangs pa byams pa yid du
148b3(mdo sde): 'ong ba drug cig yod la/bu de dag la tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de mtshungs par byams shing /mtshungs par sbyor bar gyur pa las de'i bu de dag byis pa yin te/gag pa mi shes pa mi mkhas pa dag
148b4(mdo sde): cig yod la/de nas tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de'i khyim de mi thar te/de'i bu de dag kyang so so na 'khor bar gyur nas/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de 'di ni sngar je
148b5(mdo sde): dbyung ngo //de nas phyis 'di dbyung snyam du de ltar sems sam/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lag so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
148b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de bu rnams la sems/snyoms pas de gang dang gang dag ji ltar mjal ba de dang de dag de bzhin du 'byin to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs
148b7(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin du byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i bu dang 'dra ste/'phags pa rnams ni ma yin te/byang chub sems dpa' de byis pa/mi gsal ba/mi mkhas pa/
149a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba drug so so na gnas pa de dag 'khor ba'i khyim me thar pa nas gang dag gang ji ltar yongasu smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid de ltar 'byin to//phyung nas kyang mya ngan las
149a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dbyings zhi bar rab tu gzhog go//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos
149a3(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs
149a4(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi zang zing gi mchod pas ni ma yin//nan tan gyis mchod pa dag sems can rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang /sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par
149a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang /sems can rnams kyi don la zhugs pa dang /yid dam mi gtong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i las mi gtong ba dang /ji ltar smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang /yid yongasu mi skyo ba dang /byang
149a6(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi gtong bas rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi/zang zing gi mchod pas ni ma yin no//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe no//de bzhin gshe/
149a7(mdo sde): pa rnams ni chos kyi sku ste/chos la mchod na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nan tan gyis yang dag par grub pa yin te/sems
149b1(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang /sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang /sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir skye'o//rigs kyi bu sems can gyi don de'ang yi dam btang ba dang /byang chub sems
149b2(mdo sde): dpa'i las la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /smras pa las nyams pa dang /dam bcas pa las nyamos po dang /yid yongasu skyo bas byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas yang dag par 'thob
149b3(mdo sde): par mi nus so//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni sems can gyi don la rag las pa ste/gal te sems can rnams
149b4(mdo sde): med na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//de bas na rigs kyi bu chos la mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa yin gyi zang zing
149b5(mdo sde): gi mchod pa'i ma yin pa de ltar blta'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin//rigs
149b6(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste rab tu byung
149b7(mdo sde): nas bdag ni grogs pa dang /blon po dang /gnyen bshes dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams shi ba dang 'dra'o zhes nga rgyal ba com pa yin/bdag gis gzugs mi sdug par khas blangs shing bdag gis
150a1(mdo sde): gos kha dog mi sdug pa bgos te/tshul gzhan du bsgyur to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/spong ba'i rgyu spyong ba'i phyir mgo bregs shing lag na lhung bzed thogs te grong nas grong du 'gro
150a2(mdo sde): zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/gdol bu dang 'dra bar dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/bdag ni bsod snyoms pa ste/bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan la rag
150a3(mdo sde): lus so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/brnyas pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon len to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/bdag gis slob dpon dang /bla ma dang /sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos
150a4(mdo sde): sozhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/bdag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste/cho ga dang /spyod yul dang /kun spyod pa de dang de des mgu bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/sangs
150a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom po yin/sems can khros pa dang /gnod sems can rnams kyi nang na bzod pa mang bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin//rigs kyi bu
150a6(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/
150a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas brten pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyis brten pa rnams yin/gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog/gzhan gyis mi bkri/ston pa gzhan med pas yang
150b1(mdo sde): dag par lta bu rnams yin/g.yo dang rgyus spyod pa dang bral bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/gya gyu med pa'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin/dbang po rno bas shes rab phun sum tshogs
150b2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/rgyu dang bas sgrib pa dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa rnams yin/legs par bshad pa tshol bas mngon
150b3(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams yin/chos bstan pa la log par mi 'dzin pa rnams yin/rgya chen po la mos pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rab tu shes pa yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
150b4(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i
150b5(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig nyan par gsol lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig ngas bstan gyis legs par shin
150b6(mdo sde): tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnams pa she lnga ba/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
150b7(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad le mthun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la khyab
151a1(mdo sde): /pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la'ang khyab ste/sems can gyi khams thams cad la khyab nas na mkha'i dbyings la khyab kyang /de bzhin gshegs
151a2(mdo sde): ba'i byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang mu shes pa'ang mad do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mthun mong ma yin
151a3(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan te/des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la snying rje ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus thams cad la snying rje zhing de la phan par mdzad do//
151a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos ston pa mi zad pa dang ldan te/des de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa du ma nas bskal pa brgya stong tshad med/grangs med pa du ma'i bar du rnam grangs
151a5(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /tshul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sems can thams cad la dus gcig tu chos ston kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa zad par mi 'gyur//rigs
151a6(mdo sde): kyibu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dI ba la lung bstan pa shin tu ston pa tshad med pa dang ldan te/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can ji snyed sems can gyi grang su gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis de
151a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la dus gcig tu tshig dang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan dag gis dri ba the dad du dris kyang /de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la dris pa lung
151b1(mdo sde): bstan pa'i skyon pa bstan kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ba la lung bstan pa'i ston pa zad par mi 'gyur//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi spyod yul ba yin
151b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas par gyur la/de dag thams cad dus gcig tu ti nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma lnga snyom par zhugs te//de bzhin du
151b3(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs nas/bskal pa brgya stong du mar ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin tam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
151b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi mtha' 'am mu mi rnyed do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med pa'i gzugs kyi sku mngon par sgrub pa dang ldan te/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad
151b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyur na/de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nye bar
151b6(mdo sde): ston to//gal te gzugs gzhan dang gzhan la mos par gyur na/de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis sems can re re'i mdun du gzugs gzhan dang gzhan
151b7(mdo sde): nye bar ston to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi spyan gyi yul tshad med de rigs kyi bu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis gzigs kyi mi'i mig gis ma yin pa'i sems can yod pa gal te rigs
152a1(mdo sde): kyi bu grangs dang bsam pa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ma lus pa kun de 'dra bar gyur kyang /de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gi mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras
152a2(mdo sde): bu ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzig so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi snyan gyi yul tshad med de/rigs kyi bu gal te de lta bu nyid kyi sems can gyis mtha' yas
152a3(mdo sde): mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu gang bar gyur la/de dag thams cad kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sgra dbyangs brjod pa'i sgra lhan cig tu phyung ste/brjod kyang de bzhin
152a4(mdo sde): gshegs pas de dag bdag cag gi sgra rnams kyang so sor gsan to//so sor rab tu mkhyen to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes tshad med pa/mi zad pa/mu med pa/na mkha'
152a5(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba dang ldan te/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can gyi khams ma lus pa so sor rnam par rtog pa rjes su rnam par rtog cing /bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la/so so na wa
152a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can 'di ni 'di la rnam par rtog go//sems can 'di ni 'di la semaso//sems can 'di ni las
152a7(mdo sde): 'di byed do//de'i 'bras bu ni 'dir 'gyuraro zhes rab tu mkhyen to//de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum char la'ang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen
152b1(mdo sde): to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/rgyun mi chad par mnyam par bzhag pa'o//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ngas pa med/dbang po bslang
152b2(mdo sde): pa med/sems 'khrug pa med do//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bgra chags dang bcas pa thams cad sbyangs pa ste zhi ba/rab tu zhi ba/nye bar zhi ba'o//rigs kyi
152b3(mdo sde): bu gang la nyon mongs pa yod pa de'i sems ni bskrad par 'gyur te/sems bslad pas mnyam par 'jog par mi 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa/rdul med pa/zag pa med pa/nyon
152b4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa/chos thams cad la dbang ba/mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod yul thams cad las byung ba yin te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin
152b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa spyod lam re re la'ang ting 'dzin re res spyod pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du spyod cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus kyi tshe'i bar du spyod na gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag
152b6(mdo sde): pa lta ci smos/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa du mas yang dag par grub pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag pa dang /bsam pa dang /brtag par mi nus so//byang
152b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par 'grub pa ma lags sam/
153a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/de ni bskal pa gras//
153a2(mdo sde): med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par mi nus kyi/nam byang chub sems dpa' chos mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe nas brnams te/bskal pa bsrang bar bya'i thog ma'i sems nas bcwam
153a3(mdo sde): te ni ma yino//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /rangs pa rnyed pa'i
153a4(mdo sde): sems can de dag ni skyid de lags pas bgyi ba'i las bgyid pa/las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/dad pa dang /mos pa mang zhing byang chub tu nye ba lags na/su dag thos nas 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog
153a5(mdo sde): pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa rnams lce ci smos te/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ring por mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di 'dra bdag nyid kyi
153a6(mdo sde): snod du gyur par mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag sangs
153a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyis yongasu bzung ba yino//dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis the tshom dang /yid gnyis dang /
153b1(mdo sde): nem nur mi bskyed par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis nub bdun du yid la bya ba gzhan med cing sems ma 'khrugs par bsam pa drag po dang /dad pa drag por zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
153b2(mdo sde): che ba 'di rjes su sems la zhag bdun 'das pa dang des mchod pa'i cho ga nye bar bzhag nas/gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgros te/dad pa mngon du byas la 'dug par byas ste/des de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs
153b3(mdo sde): pa mthong bar 'gyuraro//de ste mi byed dam chog ma chad par byed na/de sems rtse gcig par 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
153b4(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/sems can gang la la ma dad par 'gyur ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
153b5(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/sems can gang mi zad pa rtsub pa'i bsam pa'i gnod sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /chos smra ba de la yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ba
153b6(mdo sde): dag yod do//de dag de'i phyir lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//yang rigs kyi bu sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bshad pa 'di la dad pa rnyed par
153b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /chos smra ba de la'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang //ston par 'du shes skyed na/rigs kyi bu sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di tshe rabs de dang de dag gzhan la'ang
154a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de dag gis thos par nges par bya'o//de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i sems can kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i chos
154a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di sngon bdag cag gis kyang thos pa lta ci zhig snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ljags kyi dbang pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkas
154a3(mdo sde): po/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkab nas/dbu mngon par bkab po//dbu mngon par bkab nas/sku mngon par gago//sku mngon par bkab nas/steng ge'i khri mngon par bka'o//seng ge'i
154a4(mdo sde): khri mngon par bkab nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo//de nas nyan thos kyi 'khor de nas brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i 'khor/de nas thams cad yod pa'i
154a5(mdo sde): 'khor mngon par bkab po//de nas stong gsum gyi skyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab po//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyir bsdus te/thams cad yod pa'i
154a6(mdo sde): 'khor la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di 'dra ba'i ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur gyis/rigs kyi bu khyod rnams dad par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyed nam/
154a7(mdo sde): mngon par dad par gyis shig de ni khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgya/
154b1(mdo sde): cortsa bzhis mi skyo ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo//srog chags brgya stong du ma na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go//sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can du
154b2(mdo sde): mas ni byang chub tu sems bskyod///'phags pa dkon mchog sprin//bam po bdun pa ste tha ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka'
154b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzug su 'ang 'dogs la don dam par na gzugasa'ang mi dmigs
154b4(mdo sde): shing mngon par mi chag so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang 'dogs la don dam par na rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//
154b5(mdo sde): sa'i khamasu 'ang 'dogs la/don dam par na sa'i kham su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam
154b6(mdo sde): par shes pa'i khams 'ang 'dogs la don dam par na rnam par shes pa'i khamasa'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//mig gi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la/don dam par na mig gi skye mched du'ang
154b7(mdo sde): midamigs shing mngon par mi chag so//de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang /sna'i skye mched dang /lce'i skye mched dang /lus kyi skye mched dang /yid kyi skye mched du'ang 'dogs pa don dam par na
155a1(mdo sde): yid kyi skye mched du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mchags//bdag du'ang 'dogs ladon dam par na bdag tu'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par ma chags//sems can du'ang 'dogs
155a2(mdo sde): la don dam par na sems can du'ang me dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//srog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed bur yang 'dogs la/don dam par
155a3(mdo sde): nasrog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed bur yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//'jig rten du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na 'jig rten du'ang
155a4(mdo sde): mi 'jigs shing mngon par mi chag so//'jig rten gyi chos rnams mang 'dogs la/don dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnamasa'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
155a5(mdo sde): 'ang 'dogs la don dam par na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamasa'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chag so//byang chub tu 'ang 'dogs la don dam par na byang chub dang byang chub par byed pa'ang mi dmigs shing
155a6(mdo sde): de la mngon par mi chag so//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gang ming dang /'dogs pa dang tha snyad de ni kun rdzob ces bya ste/kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ni don dam pa med mod kyi kun rdzob kyi chos rnams med par
155a7(mdo sde): ya don dam pa bstan par yang mi nus so//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas de dag la kun rdzob tu mkhas shing don dam par ma yin pa de ni kun rdzob la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu
155b1(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yino//bcu gang zhe na/'ad sgyu
155b2(mdo sde): ste/mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin mi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang /mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang /mi len mi 'dor ba'i chos nyid dang /tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos nyid
155b3(mdo sde): dang /smrar med pa'i chos nyid dang /spros pa med pa'i chos nyid dang /brjod du med pa'i chos nyid dang /zhi ba'i chos nyid dang /'phags pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir na
155b4(mdo sde): na/don dam pa ni skye'o//mi 'gago/mi 'jig go//mi len to//mi 'dor ro//yi ge dag gis smra bar bya ba ma yino//yi ge rnams kyis mi brjod do//spros pas mi rtog so//rigs kyi don dam par ni brjod du
155b5(mdo sde): med pa ste zhi ba'o//'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa'o//rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung ma skyes kyang rung mi 'jig pa ste/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
155b6(mdo sde): rnams sgra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig gyon la yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung //rab tu byung nas kyang chos 'di kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir mgo'i thod la mi 'bar ba bzhin du brtson
155b7(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams shing gnaso//rigs kyi bu gal te don dam pa med du zin na tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyuro//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba'ang don med par 'gyuro//gang gi phyir don dam pa yod
156a1(mdo sde): pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin//rigs
156a2(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos rnams gsog nyid du rab tu shes/gso ba nyid dang /snying po med
156a3(mdo sde): pa nyid dang /mi g.yor lta bu nyid dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid dang /sgra brnyan lta bu nyid dang /sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang /mi gnas pa nyid dang /g.yo ba nyid dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid du'ang rab
156a4(mdo sde): tu shes so//de dag 'di snyam du sems te/chos 'di dag ni 'di ltar gsog/'di ltar gsob/'di ltar snying po med pa/'di ltar mig yor lta bu/'di ltar gzugs brnyan lta bu/'di ltar sgra brnyan lta
156a5(mdo sde): bu/'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu/'di ltar mi gnas pa/'di ltar g.yo ba/'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin yang 'di dag skye bar snang //gnas pa dang 'jigs par yang snang ngo snyam//de dag 'di ltar
156a6(mdo sde): sems te/yang chos 'di rnams skye ba'i rkyen ni gang rnams yin/chos 'di rnams 'gag pa'i rkyen ni gang rnams yin snyam mo//de dag 'di ltar sems te/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis chos 'di dag skyes te/ma
156a7(mdo sde): rig pa las byung ba'o//ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'o//ma rig pa la rten pa'o//ma rig pa la brten nas 'du byed rnams 'byung ba yin/'du byed la brten nas rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyuraro//rnam par shes
156b1(mdo sde): yod na ming dang gzugasu 'dogs par 'gyuraro//ming dang gzugasu btags na skye mched drug rnamasu 'dogs par 'gyu ro//skye mched rnams yod na reg par 'gyuraro//reg pa yod na tshor ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
156b2(mdo sde): te/tshor ba'i rgyus byis pa rnams sred pas nyen par 'gyur ro//sred pas nyin na len pa 'dzin to//len pa bzung na sred pa'i mtsham su sbyor bar 'gyuraro//sred pa yod na skye bar 'gyuraro//skye ba yod na rga bar
156b3(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//skyes bu gang zag rga ba'i chos ni 'chi bar 'gyuraro//shi ba la gnas pa'i mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /yi mug pa dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste 'di lta ste/'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung
156b4(mdo sde): po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de lta bas na/mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spang bar nan tan bya'o//ma rig pa gzhig pa dang /ma rig pa rtsa ba nas dbyung ba dang /ma rig pa dgag pa'i
156b5(mdo sde): phyir nan tan bya'o//ma rig pa 'gags pas ma rig pa'i rkyen las skyes pa/ma rig pa las byung ba dang /ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba/ma rig pa la rten pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta
156b6(mdo sde): ste/dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na/dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags na mi shes pa la brten pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro//mi shes pa spangs
156b7(mdo sde): pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'byung //'gro ba rnams kyang mi 'byung //'khor ba'i rgyu rnams kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro//mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang nye bar 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
157a1(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin/
157a2(mdo sde): no//bcu gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ci bdag bram ze'i rigs sam/'on te rgyal rigs sam/'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ci mtho zhing phyug
157a3(mdo sde): po 'am/'on te dma' zhing dbul po'i rigs skyes sam/gang du skyes snyam du yongasu rtog ste/de gal te rigs mtho zhing phyug par skyes na yang /de la rigs kyis dregs par mi byed//'on te dam
157a4(mdo sde): zhing dbul ba'i rigasu skyes par gyur na yang /bdag 'di lta bu'i rog su skyes pa las bdag gis sngon las 'dren mar byas zhes de snyam du sems skyed cing /de de'i rgyus skyo ba mang ba yin te/skyo ba
157a5(mdo sde): mang ba gyur nas rab tu 'byung //rab tu byung nas kyang bdag ci'i phyir rab tu byung zhes yongasu rtog ste/bdag ni rang rgal nas gzhan dag kyang bskal bar bya/rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang dgrol por
157a6(mdo sde): bya'o zhes rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/de de'i phyir le lo la ma rten cing snyom las mi byed de/de bdag rab tu byung nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dang gang nub cing yongasu zad de kun byang bar gyur
157a7(mdo sde): ces de snyam du yongasu rtog ste/de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos shig spangs par gyur na/de la dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do//grang ma spangs pa de dag ni spang ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do//de
157b1(mdo sde): bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang drung gang 'phel ba dang /rgyas pa dang /rgya cher gyur ces de snyam du yongasu nog ste//de'i dge ba'i chos gang dag 'dil ba dang /rgyas pa dang /rgyu rjer gyur
157b2(mdo sde): del dga' bo dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do//gang de ltar ma gyur pa de dag 'phel po dang /rgyas pa dang /rgya cher bya ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do//de bla ma la rten na dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'phel bar
157b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur snyam du yongasu rtog ste/de de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis mkhan po nyung ngu thos pa 'am/mang du thos pa 'am/shes pa 'am/mi shes pa 'am/tshul khrims
157b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa 'am/tshul khrims ngan pa can yang rung ste/de la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed do//de ji ltar ston pa la dga' zhing dang ba nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la'ang byed do//de slob dpon rnams
157b5(mdo sde): la rim gro yod cing rjes yod pa yin te/de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brten na bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs yongasu ma rdzogs pa rnams ni yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa rnaMs
157b6(mdo sde): nispangs par 'gyuraro snyam du yongasu rtog ste/de de dag la mkhan por 'du shes smad cing /dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa 'thob pa dang /dge ba'i chos rnams la de dag dang mthun par spyod pa yin/
157b7(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mi mthun par spyod pa yin te/de 'di snyam du bdag gi ston pa gang zhes yongasu rtog cing /de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/thams cad
158a1(mdo sde): thug su chud pa/'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
158a2(mdo sde): ston pa'o snyam ste/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa skyed de/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das/yin pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do///
158a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lam gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis srog gi phyir yang 'da' bar mi bya ste/de ltar na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro dang /rjes su 'brang bar
158a4(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bstod snyoms la yongs spyod ces sems shing de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag ni bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi rnams kyi bsod
158a5(mdo sde): snyoms la yongasu spyod kyis/bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag go bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang /don che ba dang mthu che ba dang /bdag gis kyang yul 'khor gyis bsod snyoms 'bras bu
158a6(mdo sde): yod par yongasu spyod pa de ltar bya'o snyam mo//de 'di snyam du bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms gtang snyam
158a7(mdo sde): zhing /de 'di ltar rjes su sems te/bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong pa dang /yul gyi mi 'di dag ni bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan/dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan/sbyin
158b1(mdo sde): ba'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis//ci nas kyang bdag gis dge sbyong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang /dge slong gi yon tan dang /sbyin
158b2(mdo sde): pa'i gnas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba de ltar spyod do snyam mo//de 'di snyam du bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur tam zhes sems shing /
158b3(mdo sde): de'adi snyam bdag gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni rgal ba dang po'o//bdag dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni rgyal ba gnyis pa'o//bdag le lo med cing chos thob pa'i phyir ci nas kyang thog mang
158b4(mdo sde): tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/rigs kyi bu de ltar yongasu rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag shes pa
158b5(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no///
158b6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/khengs pa dag la dma' ba rnams yin/nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal med pa rnams yin/gya gyu can dag la drang po rnams yin/brdzun du smra ba dag la bden par smra ba rnams
158b7(mdo sde): yin/kha mi mkhas par smra ba dag la snyan par smra ba rnams yin/rtsub pa dag la 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/khro ba dag la bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can
159a1(mdo sde): oM yin/sdug bsngal bdu//'a spyod rje'i 'a dag can rnams yin/sor snunan dag la 'gro ba shA byed pa'i dang tshul can r+m+ma su sbyin no//dges smos ngag
159a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dag tu skye'o//bcu gang
159a3(mdo sde): na/'di lta ste/skyon med pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /ma 'bags pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas tshul khrims yongasu dag padang ldan pa rnams yin/sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam
159a4(mdo sde): papas sems snyoms pa rnams yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba mi chung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/gos pa med pa sa rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /grags pa dang /sgra dang //tshigs su
159a5(mdo sde): bcad pa'i sems yongasu spangs pa rnams yin/nem nur med pa'i sems dang ldan pas dang po rnams yin/sems le lo med pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus parnams pa rnams yin/sems
159a6(mdo sde): g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/shes rab rnobs dbang po mi rtul bu rnams yin/
