159a7(mdo sde): gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci chos de dag
159b1(mdo sde): tshogs pasu skye bar 'gyur mya/'on tol la ma tshang yang skye bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gang la chas tshogs blang dag lus chos gcig kyang skyon mod pA/myu
159b2(mdo sde): pa/mA 'bags pa/yongasu dag pa/byang ba yong du rdzogs por gyur pa de la rigs kyi bu chos de dag thams cid yong su rdzogs par 'gyur bas rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'i mtshogs
159b3(mdo sde): pas ni ma yin te/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag pa dag tu skye'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
159b4(mdo sde): mngal gyi dri mas mgos par skye'o//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang /mchod rten zhig po 'chos pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spros
159b5(mdo sde): byug pa 'bral ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spros chu 'bul ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang /brkyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang /pha ma dag
159b6(mdo sde): la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed cing /do'ang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/
159b7(mdo sde): zang zing dang bcas pa ma yin la/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'ang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongasu sngo zhing /de'ang bsam pa thag
160a1(mdo sde): pa nas sems pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal gyi dri mas mgos par skye'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldanan bya rgyu
160a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/'du 'je med par spyod pa rnams yin/yul la rgyab kyis phyog
160a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yin/yul gyi nyes pas mi tshugs pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim gro byed cing brtson pa dang /shin tu
160a4(mdo sde): bslabs pa rnams yin/gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal chang ngan don dang /nad kyi rkyen ci dang /yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /yo byad
160a5(mdo sde): sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams las skye ba rnams yin/dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu
160a6(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yong su dag pa rnams yin//
160a7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul 'chos pa dang /kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin//gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/'thob kyis
160b1(mdo sde): 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/yongasu ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/rnyed pa
160b2(mdo sde): la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/rnyed pa la chags pa med pa rnams yin/yongasu yi 'chad pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byed
160b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang /kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir lus kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed/ngag gis tshul
160b4(mdo sde): 'chos par mi byed/sems kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed do//ji ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos par mi byed pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang /sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong na/spyod lam
160b5(mdo sde): mi 'chos so//ji ltar na spyod lam mi 'chos she na/gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang /skyo bar lta ba dang /sgrib pa med par lta bas gom pa bgos kyis dal ngal nas 'dor zhing 'degs pa ma yin//de ltar
160b6(mdo sde): na lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do//ji ltar na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir bcom bskyangs shing smra ba ma yin/'jam por smra ba ma yin//dga'
160b7(mdo sde): par smra ba ma yin/rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin te/de ltar na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do//ji ltar na sems kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa
161a1(mdo sde): 'am/sbyin pa'i bdagu pos rnyed pa bltabs na/tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar skyon cing sems kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/tshig gis 'dod pa chung
161a2(mdo sde): la sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod po 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yin te/de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed do//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang /kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba
161a3(mdo sde): yin no//ji ltar na brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gos kyis phongaso//bdag lhung bzed kyis phongaso//bdag nad kyi
161a4(mdo sde): rkyen rtsis phongaso zhes brda mi byed cing /sbyin pa byed pa 'am/sbyin bdag la mi slong zhing tshig tu mi brjod de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no//ji ltar na gzhog
161a5(mdo sde): slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i ni sbyin pa byed pa dang /sbyin bdag mthong na bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/de la bdag gis
161a6(mdo sde): kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas so//des kyang bdag la 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan par rig ste/mang du thos pa'o//'dod pa chung ba'o zhes 'di dang 'di byin no//bdag gis kyang de la snying rje ba'i
161a7(mdo sde): sems nye bar bzhag ste blangaso zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod do//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par
161b1(mdo sde): btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byung ba dang /sems la rma byung byar rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin te/de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed
161b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang /kun tu rgyug pa dang /tshul khrims 'chal par spyod pa'o//sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/rnyed pa la smon pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la de ni
161b3(mdo sde): sems mang ba ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs pa btsal po'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed po dang bral ba yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu
161b4(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spang la sgyu med pa dang /gzhal ba la sgyu med pa dang /yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang /g.yos rnyed pa mi sgrub pa ste/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos
161b5(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongasu ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa 'am/chos
161b6(mdo sde): kyi dang 'dres pa 'am/dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa'am/ma byin pa 'am/ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongasu
161b7(mdo sde): ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yino//ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang bdag gir mi byed nor du
162a1(mdo sde): mi rtse tshogasu mi byed cing /dus dus su dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /pha ma dang /mdza' ba dang /blon po dang /gnyen bshes dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong
162a2(mdo sde): zhing /dus dus su bdag kyang yongasu spyod la/yongasu spyod pa'i tshe chags pa med pa dang /zhen pa med par yongasu spyod do//rnyed pa ma rnyed na'ang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongasu yi mi 'chad
162a3(mdo sde): de/sbyin pa byed pa dang /sbyin bdag rnams la ma dad par mi 'dzin pa yin pa ste/de chos dang mthun par rnyed po/dge 'dun gyir gtogs po/de bzhin gshogs pas bsngags pa/byang
162a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas ma smad pa/lhas bstod pa/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dbye bas chog shes pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho/
162a5(mdo sde): ba yong su dag pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yid yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can gyi rgyu sems
162a6(mdo sde): can gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas pas yongasu mi skyo'o//sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongasu mi skye'o//sems can gyi don rnams la yongasu mi skyo'o///
162a7(mdo sde): sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongasu mi skyo'o//sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongasu mi skyo'o//gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam ston pas yongasu mi skyo'o//de dag
162b1(mdo sde): la ma dag par yang mi byed do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongasu bsdu bas kyang yongasu mi skyo'o//byang chub kyi tshogs yong su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongasu mi skyo'o//bsam pa mya ngan las
162b2(mdo sde): 'das par gyur kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi lha'i/byang chub la gzhol/byang chub la 'bab/byang chub la bab pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
162b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yod yongasu mi skyo ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no//bcu gang
162b4(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/bag med pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/lus kyis shin tu bsdams shing lus kyi ngan du spyod pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ngag gis shin tu
162b5(mdo sde): bsdams shing ngag gi ngan du spyod pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/yid kyis shin tu bsdams shing yid kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs shing mi dge
162b6(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spongs pa rnams yin/rigs par smra zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/chos skyo zhing chos ma yin pa la smod pa rnams yin/smad pa'i las rnam par
162b7(mdo sde): spangs shing dge ba'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun 'byin cing nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs
163a1(mdo sde): ba'i chos nyid yongasu skyong zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la srung ba rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
163a2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dbang
163a3(mdo sde): po shin tu dang ba rnams yin/dbang po yongasu dag pa rnams yin/dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/dbang po yongasu byung ba rnams yin/gnod sems dang
163a4(mdo sde): blabral ba rnams yin/bag la nyal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/zab dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams yin/khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no//
163a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/
163a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yong su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa lags nyon mongs pa rnams
163a7(mdo sde): dang bral bas na khro gnyer ma mchis pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongasu dag
163b1(mdo sde): sa na bzhin 'dzum pa yod/nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na lkog nyer med pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bad+ma dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no//bcu gang
163b2(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/'khor ba ni 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang gi sems rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
163b3(mdo sde): rab tu shes so//gti mug gi sems rab tu dkrugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'du byas ni mi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
163b4(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'jig rten ni stong pa'o zhes yang drag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso//chos thams cad ni bdag med
163b5(mdo sde): pa'i zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'jig rten na spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes yang drug pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//chos thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o
163b6(mdo sde): zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de yang thos pa dang /bsam pa dang /bsgom pas shes
163b7(mdo sde): kyisgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin te/de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje'i sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste/sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtse mo//rigs
164a1(mdo sde): /ba chos bcu pa dag dang ldan+dan byung chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams na//rigs kyi rjes bcu dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa'adam pa sa yo su napa
164a2(mdo sde): rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha mu la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig cing bstan pa 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /sems can rnams lam
164a3(mdo sde): don par zhugs pa dang /ye shes kyi sgron ma mya ngan las 'das te/ston pa med pa'i tshe/mdo sde rgya chen po don che zhing mthu che ba/dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin
164a4(mdo sde): cing klog la kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan la brjod cing ston la yang dag par ston cing gusal bar byed pa dang /de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang /
164a5(mdo sde): da pa dang /rangs par byed cing de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang /zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed
164a6(mdo sde): pa dang /dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang /bcud kyis len du 'du shes skyed pa dang /ci'i 'du shes skyed pa dang /lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongasu
164a7(mdo sde): tshol ba dang /btsal nas kyang nan gyis sgrub bo'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ljon na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi
164b1(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus mtshan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin/lus dpe byad bzang
164b2(mdo sde): ba'i ma ga rgyas pa rnams yin/dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi me ga dang ldan zhi shin tu yu~M su rdzogs pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pasu bsten pa'i gnas la rjes sgra snyan pa
164b3(mdo sde): rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin/de bzhin gshegs pas thugs chud pa'i gnas khong du chud par byed pa rnams yin/'jig
164b4(mdo sde): rten sdug bsngal ba yongasu skyob pa rnams yin/'phags pa'i tshul la shin du bsgrubs pa rnams yin/tshangs pa'i gnas rnams la shin tu mthar phyin pa rnams yin/de bzhin
164b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa zhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams
164b6(mdo sde): yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong bas bsu be rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub
164b7(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin/bdud thams cad kyis mi skul po rnams yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhug
165a1(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chung ba rnams yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/shin tu rtog pa'o
165a2(mdo sde): ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams yin/'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams
165a3(mdo sde): yin/mi skye bo'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa rnams yi no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong bas
165a4(mdo sde): bsu ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can
165a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes//zhe sdang gi bsam pa n+dan dang /gti mug gi bsam pa can dang /dma' ba'i bsam pa can dang /bar
165a6(mdo sde): ma'i bsam pa can dang /zhen pa'i bsam pa can dang /dge ba'i bsam pa can dang /brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang /yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang /sems can gtum
165a7(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa can dag kyang yang dag pa ji bzhin du rab tu shes shing /de'ang sems can gcig la ji ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la'ang yang dag pa ji/
165b1(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang /bag la nyal shes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
165b2(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnam
165b3(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston to//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis
165b4(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs/brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'dul
165b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi gzugs/bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyi gzugs/tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
165b6(mdo sde): la tshangs pa'i gzugs/bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bram ze'i gzugs rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyal rigs
165b7(mdo sde): kyi gzugs/khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston to//rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can
166a1(mdo sde): rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang byung chub sems dpa' rnams te ba nA rmA//rigs kyi bu rgyas bad+ma po dadag dang ldanan
166a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no//
166a3(mdo sde): grong zhe na/'di lta ste/drang ba rnams yon/'jam pa rnams yin/gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yon/gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams smin/
166a4(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/mo brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/
166a5(mdo sde): bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/nges pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po d+ma dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi
166a6(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lte bo yongasu dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//
166a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/cho ga yongasu dag pa rnams yin/tshul dang cha mthun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa med
166b1(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams yin//khong yangs pa rnams yin//chungs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa rnams yin//sprul pa mnyam pa rnams yin/ldum gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/
166b2(mdo sde): ston pa gzhan med pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na byang chub
166b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do//bde ba'i sbyin pa dang /mi zad pa'i sbyin pa
166b4(mdo sde): dang /phan pa smra ba dang /don du smra ba dang /chos su smra ba dang /rigs par smra ba dang /dron bya ba dang /zong zing gris don mthun pa dang /'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pas sems
166b5(mdo sde): can rnams sdud do//rigs kyi blo phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos sbyin pa'o//bde ba'i sbyin pa ni gang zang zing sbyin pa'o//mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lom gyi lung sbyin pa'o//phan par sgra
166b6(mdo sde): ba ni gang dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa'o//don du smra ba ni gang yang dog pa'i bstan pa'o//chos su smra ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang mthun par chos bstan pa'o//rigs
166b7(mdo sde): par smra ba ni gang don yang dag par chud mi son pa'o//don bya ba ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslangs te dge ba'i gnasu gzhog pa'o//zang zing gis don mthun pa ni gang bza' ba dang
167a1(mdo sde): bca' ba dang /bldag pa dang /btung ba dang gzhib pa dang /gos la sogs pa thun mong du yongasu spyod pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun
167a2(mdo sde): pa ni gang gser dang /nor bu dang /me tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /sa le skam dang /dngul dang /rta dang /glang po che dang /shing rta dang /bzhon
167a3(mdo sde): pa thun mongs du spyod pa yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
167a4(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/spyod lam sgyu med pa rnams yin/spyod lam
167a5(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa rnams yin/blta na dga' ba rnams yin/blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/lta bos chog mi shes pa rnams yin/blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/bolta na
167a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/blta na sems can thams cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/blta na sems can thams cad kyi
167a7(mdo sde): sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yino//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na
167b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongasu srung ba rnams yin/'khor ba'i 'brog
167b2(mdo sde): dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin/mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa rnams la sman par
167b3(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin/rten med pa dag la rten pa rnams yin/gnas med bdag la gnas pa rnams yin/skyabs med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/gling med pa dag la gling rnams yin/dpung
167b4(mdo sde): gnyen med pa dag la dpung gnyen rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
167b5(mdo sde): dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na ci'i rgyal po shing chen po blta na bzang ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsabs kyang sems can nang
167b6(mdo sde): pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o//sdong po dang /yal ga rnams dang /lo ma rnams dang /me tog rnams dang /'bras bu rnams dang /mthong ba dang /mnams pa dang /myangs pa dang /reg pas kyang nye
167b7(mdo sde): bar 'tsho ba yin te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang
168a1(mdo sde): nye bar 'tsho ba yin/tshul khrims drung /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /yon tan gyi rlo myangs pa dang /
168a2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas pas kyang nye bar 'tshe ba yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu
168a3(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang /sems can nad pa rnams
168a4(mdo sde): rtsi sbyin pa dang /sems can bkres pa dang /skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa dang /rlung dang lhags pa dang nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dga' ba sbyin pa dang /mkha
168a5(mdo sde): po dang /slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra phyag 'tshal/ldang thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par byed pa dang /kun dga'
168a6(mdo sde): ra ba dang /gtsug lag khang dang /skyed mos tshal bya ba dang /dus dus su nor dang /'bru dang /mdzod dang /bong ba gtong ba dang /bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las mi dang /zho shas
168a7(mdo sde): 'tsho ba la bgo ba shas yongasu skyong ba dang /dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
168b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no//bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs
168b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mig yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongasu 'dri'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
168b3(mdo sde): mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur
168b4(mdo sde): byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon
168b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim grong byed/bkur sti byed/bsti stang byed/mchod pa byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang
168b6(mdo sde): chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang snang ngo //sangs rgyas
168b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang
169a1(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ji snyed pa la de snyed kyi sprul
169a2(mdo sde): pa 'gyed kyang de dag sbrul po 'gyed pa'i tshe/rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
169a3(mdo sde): gang lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe nyon cig/rigs kyi bu 'di lta
169a4(mdo sde): ste/dper na nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhir snang bar byed cing sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang /nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag cag gis snang bar bya'o//bdag cag ni sems can la
169a5(mdo sde): phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du byed pas zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung //rigs kyi bu de
169a6(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/bsgrim pa 'am/mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni sngon gyi rnam par smin pas
169a7(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba rnams la mngon par grub pa'i phyir te//sngon gyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul
169b1(mdo sde): pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon lam btab/de lta de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la yang
169b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no//bcu
169b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa shin tu grub pas sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/tshul khrims shin tu grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /ma 'bags
169b4(mdo sde): pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/yongasu dag pa/yongasu byang ba dang ldan pas tshul khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/bzod pa shin tu phun
169b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams dang /brtson 'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /thabs
169b6(mdo sde): shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i ye
169b7(mdo sde): shes nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pas dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad/sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las
170a1(mdo sde): 'das pa dang ldan pas ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin no//rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myung du blan med pa yang dag par//
170a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
170a3(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/rab tu g.yos par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab ri'i rgyal po dag gam/ri btang gzung ngam/ri btang
170a4(mdo sde): bzung chen po dag gam/'khor yug gi ri 'am/khyor yug gi ri chen po dag gam/de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang /ri nag po de dag thams cad kyang yul gA ya gang na ba dang /ga
170a5(mdo sde): ya mgo'i ri gang na ba de logasu bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to//glang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing
170a6(mdo sde): ngam/'bras bu'i shing ngam/spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir g.ya mgo'i ri gang na bde log su 'dud par gyur to//
170a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang /rgyan gyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam
170b1(mdo sde): byas par gyur to//brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong pa brgya stong du ma'ang mgo bas phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te 'dud cing /bcom ldan 'das la me tog mAn+dA ra ba
170b2(mdo sde): dong /man+ta ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to//lha'i bu brgya stong du ma'ang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas te/gos g.yob cing tsa tso dang /gzha brgya stong du ma byed par gyur te/lha rdzas kyi me
170b3(mdo sde): tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur cing /kye ma'o dang ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis pa skyes par gyur te/kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to//sems
170b4(mdo sde): can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing dge ba'i las byed pa ste/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu
170b5(mdo sde): bsags pa yin na/gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos shes de skad ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la
170b6(mdo sde): chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'brug ltar sgro 'ur ru ru 'byin/sgrogs par byed shin tu sgrogs par byed cing /spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te/steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
170b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dang /g.ya mgo'i ril spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo //klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu'i
171a1(mdo sde): nga ro'i sgra 'byin par gyur to//dri za dang mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma'ang snyan cing zab pa'i dbyangs kyis glu len cing ga ya mgo'i ri dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
171a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams la skor ba byed par gyur to//gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'ang pad+ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to//bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /grong rdal gyi mi dang /
171a3(mdo sde): yul gyi mi brgya stong du mo 'ang me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bcom
171a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir so so'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu
171a5(mdo sde): nas 'od zer mang po bkye bar gyur to//'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs/gzugs sna tshogs snang ba sna tshogs can sha stag ste/'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po
171a6(mdo sde): dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog ste/de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la skor ba byed cing mun pa thams cad rnam par sel
171a7(mdo sde): bar gyur te/'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la bskor ba byas/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to//rlung yang bde bar
171b1(mdo sde): langs par gyur to//chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri bshad pa dang /mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'di ni byung ba'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la
171b2(mdo sde): bzod pa thob bo//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'ang chos rnams la rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang
171b3(mdo sde): sngon chad ma bskyod pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//de nas ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te 'khor 'dus pa de
171b4(mdo sde): nyid du 'dus shing 'dus 'dug pa las de stan las longs nas bdag gi gnas song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas/phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/bcom ldan 'das la
171b5(mdo sde): bkur stir byas/brdzun par byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas/bsti stang byas/rim grir byas so//bkur sti dang /btsun pa dang /ri maM dang /mchod pa dang /bsti stang dang /rim gro byas
171b6(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la gA ye mgo'i ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa
171b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis don 'di nyid dag dang /tshul 'di nyid dag dang /tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi 'chi ba de ltar
172a1(mdo sde): khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa ni khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo//de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du
172a2(mdo sde): sems par gyur to//lha mo 'dis ji srid cig nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang /'di bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur
172a3(mdo sde): snyam pa dang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongasu shes nas/bcom ldan 'das
172a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thob la/de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang ba zhig bsnyen bkur bgyis
172a5(mdo sde): na/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis bud med gyi lus ma bsgyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don ni rgyu'o//sems can gyi don ni rkyen to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
172a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba ste/rigs kyi bu lha mo mo 'chi bas gang drug par len du bcud pa dang /
172a7(mdo sde): gzengs bstod pa dang /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te//rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi
172b1(mdo sde): ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba ste/rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
172b2(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan
172b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis lha mo mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa/mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig/de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongasu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
172b4(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongasu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
172b5(mdo sde): 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing bai DUr+ya'i gzhir snang bar gyur te/ri nag po med cing shing tha mal pa med la/gnas gnas dag na yang dpag bsam gyi shing shwa stag snang bar gyur to//gnas
172b6(mdo sde): gnas dag na chu mig dang /mtshe'u dang /lteng ka dang /rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang ba dag snang bar gyur to//mi phal ba med par snang bar gyur to//de na bud med kyi sgra
172b7(mdo sde): 'ang mi grag par gyur to//gnas dang gnas dag na pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsa me dag snang bar gyur te/pad+ma de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang
173a1(mdo sde): bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi bde'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par

173a3(mdo sde): chos nyid 'di kho na brtsams nas chos ston par snang por gyur to//de nas lha mo mi 'cha ba 'ang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas
173a4(mdo sde): nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /
173a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par bgyid dam//kha ton bgyid dam/gzhan dag la 'ang rgya cher
173a6(mdo sde): yang dag par smyon par bgyid na/de bsod nams ji tsamra zhig skyed par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo ga la la zhig gis stong gsum
173a7(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa lhag par byin te/de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa pas/rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi du
173b1(mdo sde): mo gang gis chos kyu rnam grangs 'di logs par bris legs par zhus te/sems dad pas sems can dad pal byin na/de bas kyang 'di bsod nams chos mang du bskyed do//rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/
173b2(mdo sde): za zing gi sbyin pa ni phran tshogs te/chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni rnam pa du mar myong gi/'jig rten
173b3(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yang ma myong ste/'jig rten pa ni ma yin no//rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge
173b4(mdo sde): babacu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod pa bas/gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tan//'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston na/

173b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan
173b7(mdo sde): tam/'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston na/de bas 'di bsod nams ched mang du skyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu chos 'di nyid la
174a1(mdo sde): brtan na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro//chos 'di nyid la brten na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur//chos 'di nyid la brten na

174a5(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lhung sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyang ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis

174a7(mdo sde): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po dag la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dgas phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad pa dang /ston pa'i sa'i phyogs de byang chub sems kyi snying por
174b1(mdo sde): gzung bar bya'o//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o//mchod rten chen por gzung bar bya'o//bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs par gzung bar byang//rigs kyi bu dag

174b7(mdo sde): zad do//rigs kyi bu dag gal te chos 'di 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam bdag gi khrag gis chog chag byas nas kyang chos smra ba de la phan pa cung
175a1(mdo sde): zad kyang byas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul gzung ba 'di ni dka' ba'o//rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des kyang
175a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshod pa dang /bstan pa dang /yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/'jigs pa med par bya'o//ma zhum pa dang /spra ma gong ba dang /zhem 'grus pa'i sems dang /gos gtsang
175a3(mdo sde): ma bgos te dad pa bskyed par bya'o//bdag gi bsngags pa brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang /nga rgyal du mi gzung bar bya ste/bdag mi bstod/gzhan mi smod cing /des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis

175a5(mdo sde): bshad pa 'am/bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o//

175b1(mdo sde): 'das kyus bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis rgyas kyi rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog sbyin ces bya bar gzung zhig/yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang
175b2(mdo sde): gzung shig/ye shos sgron ma zhes bya bar ming go zung zhig/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas na rnaMs pa thos bya byar yang ga zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de nas skal pa dang /byang chub
175b3(mdo sde): skyenas dang sgrib pa thams cad nam por snrel ba 'di dga' tha~M /byung chub sems dpa de dag dang /nyin chen po de dag da /sbyin du/chongs pa drung /'dig na drung ba dang /dbang

175b6(mdo sde): lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchod /chos nyid tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/rgya gar skad du/An mahA me g+ha nA ma ma hA yAn sA \u0f7f/bod skad

176a1(mdo sde): /phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong
176a2(mdo sde): sa ya phrag dgu dang brgyad 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang /dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/cang shes pa/glang po chen
176a3(mdo sde): go//sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa//khur bo dag/bdag gi don dus su thob pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam

176a6(mdo sde): 'bum po de dag phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan
176a7(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bsko ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das gal bde log suM bral mo sbyar ba bdud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod de//yang de'i cha skye gu'i bdag mchen mo ga ta mi la sogs pa
176b1(mdo sde): dge slong ma sa ya phrag drug dang lnga 'bum yang phye ma rad kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
176b2(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor po byas nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe sprin chen snying po la sogs pa byang chub
176b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gtso bo chen po sa ya phrag drug dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
176b4(mdo sde): sprin chen srung zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen glog gi 'od ces bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen 'brug bsgrags dbyangs zhes bya

189b1(mdo sde): rid kyi dus kyi tshwa rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der dong ste lhags nas rang rang gi 'dab ma thal mo'i thabs sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhang su la mgo bos phyug
189b2(mdo sde): btsal nas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste/shang shang te'u yi tshigs kyis bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+tiM ka
189b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo //yang de'i tshe bya'i tshogs thams cad phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rang rang
189b4(mdo sde): gi 'dab ma thal mo'i thabasu sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'bum phyug du ma phyung ste/na mkha'i dkyil yongasu gang bar byas nas/

189b6(mdo sde): lha ri bting gzung dang btang gzung chen po'i lha 'bum phrag du ma dang /lha'i bu 'od chen dang lhan cig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong

190a1(mdo sde): ngo/yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri la gnas pa'i spyan gyi tshogs kyi lha mo rnams phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste lhag
190a2(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te ri'i mtshig bya rgod kyi phung po la mdzes par 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs thal mo sbyar ba btud de/rgyal po'i
190a3(mdo sde): khab bya rgod phung po'i ri dang bcas pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe rnga dang /rnga bo che dang /cang te'u dang /dung dang /lcags kyi sil krol dang /tan rim
190a4(mdo sde): dang /'khar rnga dang /rdza rnga chen po dang /bal bis dang /pi wang dang /rdzu rnga kha gcig pa dang /dril bu dang /gling bu dang /shu ka dang /kan la la sogs pa ma brdungs/ma bcos/

190a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang /lcug phran dang /dog pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la shin tu bkram mo//yang de'i tshe gangs kyi ri la gnas pa'i seng ge'i rgyal po rin chen pad+ma zhes
190a7(mdo sde): bya ba seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan gcig tu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhan

190b4(mdo sde): po bzhin du sgrogs shing skad byung nas/bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung //de bzhin du gcan
190b5(mdo sde): gzan dang ri dgas thams cad kyi bar dag gis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ra'i phyogs gcig tu go bzung ngo //yang de'i tshe sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /chu srin dang /nya dang /rus sbrul dang /sdig pa dang /srin
190b6(mdo sde): gyi me dang /bar su mi ka dang /tsun tsu ka dang /sa ri ka dang /srog chags gdug pa'i rigs rnams kyis dug rnam par spangs nas dug gi rang bzhin dang bral bar gyur te 'khod do//yang de'i tshe sbrul dang /
190b7(mdo sde): myur du gdug pa dang /sbrul gzi gu dang /chu sbrul dang /gdug pa mi zad pa chen po'i rigs rnams kyis dug rnam par spangs nas dug gi rang bzhin dang bral bar gyur te 'khod do//yang de'i tshe nad bzhi brgya
191a1(mdo sde): rtsa bzhis thebs pa'i sems can gang su'ang rung ba dag dang /yi dag su gyur pa gang yin padag dang /sems can dmyal ba'i skye gnasu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad zas dang /

191a6(mdo sde): ba dang /sha za dang /byi bo byed pa dang /ma byin par len pa la zhugs pa'i sems can de dag gis rang rang gi sems rjes su dran nas gar byed cing glu len te sri zhu bya bar brtsams//yang de'i tshe
191a7(mdo sde): de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /namakha'i lding dang /mi 'am chi dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /srin po dang /grul bum dang /'byung po dang /gcad/

193a4(mdo sde): du lta ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku yin no zhes de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i sku ni mi phyed
193a5(mdo sde): pa'i sku yin no zhes yang dag par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rus pa ma yin zhing sha ma yin la khrag ma yin te rgyas pa ma yin no zhes stong pa nyid du smra

193b1(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'i sems can rnams la ni tshul khrims nyams pa med do zhes tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin

194a1(mdo sde): ba dang /'khor ba la mos par yang 'gyur ba dang /bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes rtag tu dad pa'i semasu 'ang 'gyur ba dang /bdag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

195a1(mdo sde): /kar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs par byas pas phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /gti mug gi mun pa snrel ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /nyan mos pas 'khor ba

195a7(mdo sde): ba thos na mi g.yo ba'i phyir sgo'i them pa lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /yang dag pa mthong ba'i phyir sems brtan zhing gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang /sems mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang
195b1(mdo sde): mngon sum du yon tan mang po 'thob pa mang bar yang 'gyur ba dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /mdzes par yang 'gyur ba dang /blta na sdug par yang 'gyur/

195b3(mdo sde): ba dang /rigs chen por skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang /'khor mang bar yang 'gyur ba dang /'khor mi phyed par yang 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi

195b5(mdo sde): skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing tshor bkur bar yang 'gyur ba dang /dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /gzi byin dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /shes rab dang yang ldan par 'gyur
195b6(mdo sde): bo dang /dga' ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten la phan par 'dod par yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten la bde bar
195b7(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi thu bor yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi gtso bor yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi rab tu'ang 'gyur ba
196a1(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os byar yang 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnasu'ang 'gyur ba dang /sbyin bdag chen por yang /
196a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /stobs chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /dpa' bo chen por yang 'gyur ba dang /brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /byams pa'i sems dang yang
196a3(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba dang /bden par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /brtul zhugs brtan par yang 'gyur ba dang /brtson 'grus brtsams par yang 'gyur ba dang /byams pa la gnas par yang
196a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /snying rje la gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang /dga' ba la yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang /gtang snyoms la yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang /stong po'i chos rnams la stong par
196a5(mdo sde): smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /stong pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la stong pa ma lags par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don rtogs par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
196a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi de kho na'i chos kyi lta ba smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /gtsang bar yang 'gyur ba dang /gtsang mas phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang /yon tan gyis phyug par yang
196a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang tshul khrims kyis phyag par yang 'gyur ba dang /chos kyis phyug por yang 'gyur ba dang /dbrog tu ma mchis pa'i rdzas kyis phyug par yang 'gyur/
196b1(mdo sde): ba dang /skye bo dbul po slong ba la sogs pa la gter lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams ston pa na mi sgrog mi dang zhing dngang bar
196b2(mdo sde): yang mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar bgyi bas sems bskyed pa de dang der skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshig su bcad pa don du mi gnyer
196b3(mdo sde): bar yang 'gyur ba dang /tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams bsdus nas dam pa'i chos la 'god par yang 'gyur ba dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa rnams la thog tog lta bur yang
196b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mi gzo ba la yang dag par sbyor bar yang 'gyur ba dang /mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad du mi 'phrogs par yang 'gyur zhing slar de la thabs dang
196b5(mdo sde): ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /mu stegs can phos kyi rgol ba mang po dag gis phug rdugasu mi chud cing slar de la thabs kyis rton par yang 'gyur ba dang /mu stegs
196b6(mdo sde): can gyi gnas thams cad kyi gsang tshog rnams la 'dun par mi 'gyur zhing slar de la thabs kyis 'dun par bgyid par yang 'gyur ba dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za'i gnas thams
196b7(mdo sde): cad la rten par mi 'gyur zhing /slar de la thabs kyis yang dag par rten pa lta bus yang 'gyur ba dang /las su rton par 'gyur gyi bkra shis dang /dge mtshan la rton par yang mi 'gyur ba dang //
197a1(mdo sde): srog gcod pa bgyid kyang srog gcod pa spangs par yang 'gyur ba dang /me tog phyung dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye mas gdab pa dang /khyim pa'i longs spyod dang /
197a2(mdo sde): yongasu spyad pa rnam pa du ma dag dang /chung ma dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan spyad kyang shin tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang /srog gcod pa dang /rku 'brog bgyid pa dang /brdzun gyi tshig
197a3(mdo sde): dang /skye mos 'tshal ba la sogs pa la rten cing las rnams bgyid pa lta bu dang /chung ma rnams sten kyang shin tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
197a4(mdo sde): mchod par yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjod par yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis cher bkur bar yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
197a5(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi sdug par bya ba'i sras su'ang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byas pa gzo ba'i bgo skal la spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
197a6(mdo sde): phrin las mtshungs pa'i chos kyi de khor mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yang dag par rtog po mtshungs par yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
197a7(mdo sde): chos gsang ba rnam pa mang po lung bstan pa'i yul la spyis btsan pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos ston pa rnam pa du ma brjod par yang 'gyur
197b1(mdo sde): ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa'i yul la mkhas par yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang /dri ma mchis pa dang /
197b2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa ma mchis pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po'i chos ston pa'i rang bzhin dag la rin po che lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis 'dod chags
197b3(mdo sde): dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /'jigs pa'i chos kyi phyogs thams cad la 'jug pa yang dag par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad yun ring po bskal pa bye ba bgrangs
197b4(mdo sde): ba mang po nas rgal nas nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las grol bar mdzad pa'i gsang ba thams cad kyi de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis
197b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtshor skye ba bstan to//rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o//grol nas dgral bar bya'o//snyam nas bstan pa'i gsang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo'i rang bzhin dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
197b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yun ring po bsgralnga pa bye ba bgrangs pa mang po 'das pa nas bdud bye ba rab tu bcom pa'i rnam pa gsang ba'i de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
197b7(mdo sde): sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo'i rang bzhin ston pa lta bur bcos pa legs par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /thabs kyis chos kyi
198a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ba dang /thabs kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa lta bur bcos pa'odang kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad rol pa'i gsang pa rgyal
198a2(mdo sde): po'i mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/dpe ma mchis pa/grangs ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa/
198a3(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das pa la bgrang ba'i rgyal por yang 'gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdo gang lags/de skad ces gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying
198a4(mdo sde): po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sprin chen snying po legaso legs so//sprin chen snying po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /sems can dmus long du gyur pa rnams
198a5(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yon tan gyi che ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i de kho na shes pa'i mig gi rgyu'i don dang /rtag tu mig mthong bar bya ba'i don dang /'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i
198a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu nges par bsgral ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i don dang /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i nyon mongs pa'i
198a7(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sbubs yongasu brtol te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su yang dag par bslabs nas phyir yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i nyon mongs pa'i sgo nga'i sbubasu thabs kyis 'jug par bya ba'i
198b1(mdo sde): don dang /mi rtag pa dang /stong pa dang /yongasu mya ngan lngas 'da' ba dang /bdag med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid yongasu mya ngan las
198b2(mdo sde): 'das partag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid du gnas par yongasu brten pa'i don dang /chos nub par 'gyur bar smra ba'i sems can rnams la ngam pa'i chos
198b3(mdo sde): bstan pa'i rang bzhin gyi mig rnam par snang ba'i don dang /lha'i gnas kyi gzugs thams cad la log par lta ba'i dug gis phog pa'i sems can rnams la phyir gso ba'i las chen po'i cho ga
198b4(mdo sde): sgyug sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag la sems yongs rmongs shing rnam par 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i rig sngags brjod cing rgyul
198b5(mdo sde): bum pa thogs pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga'i sman gnod sel le mkhas pa'i sman pa chen po yongasu gzung ba'i don dang /spyod pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /gcer bu pa la sogs pa 'os ma yin
198b6(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i gzugs rnams la rtag pa dang /'os pa'i ring bzhin du 'dzin pa'i dug gis bag pa'i sems can rtag pa dang /'os par smra ba rnams la dug ha la ha la'i zug rngung dbyung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa
198b7(mdo sde): dang /'os ma yin pa dang /lha ma yin pa'i lta ba mi ston par bya ba'i don dang /mi rtag pa dang /'os ma yin pa dang /lha ma yin pa'i lte ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'i don dang /mi rtog pa dang /
199a1(mdo sde): 'as ma yin pa dang /lha ma yin pa'i lta bas bcings pa lnga dgrol ba'i don dang /myi rtag pa dang /'os ma yin pa dang /lha ma yin pa'i lta ba'i na dag zhi stug pa dang bsrung
199a2(mdo sde): don dang /mi rtag pa dang /'os ma yin pa dang /lha ma yin pa'i lta ba'i dug gis skrangs pa gtor ba'i don dang /mi rtag pa dang /'os ma yin pa dang /lha ma yin pa'i lta ba'i drug gis rnam pa
199a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i mig gi sha 'dzer gcad pa'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa'i gnas dang /spyod yul dang /gdung dang /mtshon dang /zhing
199a4(mdo sde): dang /de kho na nyid mkhyen pa dang /ro dang /kha zas zhim po dang /bde bar byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ba dang /che ba la 'os pa'i mal stan bde ba dang /btung ba dang /khrus dang /spos dang /me tog phreng
199a5(mdo sde): dang /phye mas bsgo ba dang /bdug pa dang gos kyi mchog phra zhing shin tu phra ba dang /rab tu mdzes pa yang dag par bstan pa'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi sku yin par yang dag
199a6(mdo sde): par bstan pa'i don du khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras pa ni 'ang leg so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'ang shin tu zab pa'i mtshan te/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin/mtshan gyi
199a7(mdo sde): gzhi med pa'ang ma yin/mtshan gyi gzhi mngon pa'ang ma yin/rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/tshur rol na'ang ma yin/pha rol na'ang ma yin/bar
199b1(mdo sde): no'ang ma yin/thog ma'ang ma yin/thog ma med pa na'ang ma yin/'di na'ang ma yin/gzhan nu'ang ma yin//rtag pa 'ang ma yin/mi rtag pa'ang ma yin/chad mar bya ba'ang ma yin/tshad mang
199b2(mdo sde): mi bya'ang ma yin/mtshan mo'ang ma yin/mtshan mo ma yin pa'ang ma yin/chung ngu'ang ma yin/chung ngu ma yin pa'ang ma yin/yang ba'ang ma yin/yang ba ma yin pa'ang ma yin/rnam
199b3(mdo sde): par shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/rnam par shes par mi bya ba'ang ma yin/rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/rnam par shes pas shes par mi bya ba'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa
199b4(mdo sde): 'angam yin/mi gnas pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin/mun pa'ang ma yin/snang ba'ang ma yin/ming 'ang ma yin/mtshan ma'ang ma yin/mthu chung ba'ang ma yin stobs dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/yul
199b5(mdo sde): na gnas pa'ang ma yin/phyogs na gnas pa'ang ma yin/dge ba'ang ma yin/mi dge ba'ang ma yin/'dus byas kyang ma yin/'dus ma byas kyang ma yin gzhig na yod do zhes brjod du rung ba 'ang
199b6(mdo sde): ma yin/sbyin para'ang ma yin/len para'ang ma yin/tshig tu brjod du rung ba 'ang ma yin/tshig tu brjod du ma rung ba 'ang ma yin/bden par 'ang ma yin/brdzun par 'ang ma yin/yang dag pa nyid
199b7(mdo sde): du'ang ma yin/lta bar 'ang ma yin/nges par 'byung bar yang ma yin/nges par mi 'byung bar yang ma yin/zhing du'ang ma yin/zhing ma yin par yang ma yin/dus kyang ma yin/dus ma yin pa'ang
200a1(mdo sde): ma yin/spyad par bya ba 'ang ma yin/spyad par mi bya ba'ang ma yin/gtsang ba'ang ma yin/mi gtsang ba'ang ma yin/byas pa 'ang ma yin/ma byas pa'ang ma yin/skyes pa'ang
200a2(mdo sde): ma yin/'gag pa'ang ma yin/zhi ga/rab tu zhi ba/nye bar zhi ba ste/khams kyang ma yin/phung po'ang ma yin/skye mched kyang ma yin/khams kyis bskyed pa'ang ma yin/phung pos bskyed pa dang
200a3(mdo sde): ma yin/skyes ched kyis bskyed pa'ang ma yin/nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'ang ma yin/las kyi rgyu las byung ba'ang ma yin/bsags pa'ang ma yin/mi bsags pa'ang ma yin/'chi 'pho
200a4(mdo sde): med par 'chi 'pho ba/mu med pa/'gro ba med par 'gro ba/dpung gnyen du gyur pa/phyi ma'i mtha' med pa/'pho ba med pa/da ltar gyi dus na mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin can/gzugs med pa/tshor
200a5(mdo sde): ba med pa/'du shes med pa/'du byed med pa/rnam par shes pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin mi zad pa/zad par byar mi rung ba/zad pa dang bral ba dang mi mnyam pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
200a6(mdo sde): pa/rnam par shes pa ma yin pa/khams bzhi las yang dag par 'das pa/chos thams cad la ma chags pa'i mthar phyin pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa ste/
200a7(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yon tan dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dang ldan pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phel ba'i gtam gyi tshan nyid ni 'di lta bu yin te/phra ba'i tshe dang /
200b1(mdo sde): shAn tu rtogs par dka' ba dang /shin tu byung ba dang /shin tu zab pa ste/phyi rol pa zlas dang /nyan thos dang /sangs rgyas de dag gis sngon tshig dang yi ge gcig kyang ma thos to dmus long du gyur
200b2(mdo sde): ci drug gi mngon du gyur pa dang /grum por gyur cing rgas par gyur pa/srid pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyis g.yogs pa/glu rtogs pa/drug gis phog pa'i zug rngus yongasu myos par byas pa/mkhris
200b3(mdo sde): pas brgyal zhing sems rnam par 'khrul par byas pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cad gas pa'i chog chen po sgrug pa dang bkru ba'i sbyor bdong //gsang sngags
200b4(mdo sde): dang /yang dag pa'i rig sngags brjod cing chu'i bum pa thogs te ha la ha la'i dug gi zug rngu dbyung ba'i don dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra'i bad kin dang mkhris pa snying la zhugs pa bcad pa'i
200b5(mdo sde): don dang /de dag gi lto rnam par sbyang ba'i don dang /de dag gi dug gis skrangs par gyur pa gtar ba'i don dang /phye ma leb dang /sbur bu lta bur gyur pa de dag dug gis phog pa dang 'chi ba yongasu shes par
200b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba'i ye shes snang ba'i mar me gsal bar bya ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang /brtan pa
200b7(mdo sde): dang /ther zug pa'i de kho na mkhyen pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od bskyod pa'i don dang /shes rab kyi rtag pa'i mig spel bar bya ba'i don dang /mtshungs pa med pa'i tshul thob par bya ba'i don dang /gzungs dang /
201a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzas kyi ltad mo bstan pa'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi 'phags pa'i nor thob par bya ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yang dag pa'i
201a2(mdo sde): me long gi dkyil 'khor legs par mthong bar bya ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o snyam pa'i ma rig pa'i dra ba'i sgo nga'i sbubs brtol ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs
201a3(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa nub par 'gyuraro snyam pa'i ma rig pa'i rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig sems can rnams kyi gru bcos pa'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtag go//ther zug ma yin no//mi brtan no///
201a4(mdo sde): zhi ba ma yin no snyam pa'i dug gis phog pa'i lta ba'i zug rngu dbyung zhing gso ba'i cho ga chen po yongasu gzung ba'i don dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug ma yin/zhi ba ma yin/brtan pa ma yin//rtag
201a5(mdo sde): pa ma yin no snyam pas sems yongasu rmongs par byas shing rnam par 'khrul par byas pa'i mkhris pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs
201a6(mdo sde): pab thams cad kyi 'bel ba'i gtam bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i gsang ba'i chos ston pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rtser mos rnam pa rol te/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyis mngon
201a7(mdo sde): par gnas shing yang dag par zhugs te 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad do//'bel ba'i gtam ni mtshan nyid de lta bur phra ba'i tshig dang /shin tu rtogs par dka' ba dang /shin tu byung ba dang /shin tu
201b1(mdo sde): zab pas brgyan pa yin te/sprin chen snying po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sngon tshig dang /yi ge gcig kyang ma thos shing yul du ma gyur pa zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir dam bcas
201b2(mdo sde): shing smon lam btab pa legaso legs so//sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i bdud rtsi mi zad pa'i rin po che'i gter de bzhin gshegs pa la dris pa shin tu logs pa byas so//
201b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bdud rtsi mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo'i rgyal po'i gter dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gter dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi
201b4(mdo sde): che ba nyid kyi gter dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lta ba bzang po'i gter dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
201b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi yon tan rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi gter btsugs te shin tu brtan par byas pa yin no//sprin chen snying po khyod dang 'tsham zhing rkyen tu bab par dam bcas shing smon lam
201b6(mdo sde): btab pa ni legs te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang deng rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do//de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen sprin chen snying pos bcom
201b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la zhu ba lung bsten pa'i slad du dam bcas
202a1(mdo sde): shing smon lam btab pa ma lags kyi/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus sems can thams cad bsod nams sogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/de bzhin///
202a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i mdo'i rgyal po'i gter dang /sems can thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i
202a3(mdo sde): gter gyi dam bcas shing smon lam btab pa lag so//dmus long lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi ye shes kyi mig gi mar me bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/sems can thams cad
202a4(mdo sde): kyi shes rab kyi gter bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rtag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba dang /dam
202a5(mdo sde): ba'i chos brtan pa'i gter gnas par mdzad du gsol////'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo//bam po gsum pa//de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
202a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sprin chen snying po legs so leg so//sprin chen snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
202a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyod dang 'tsham pa'i tshig gi don phra zhing zab mo'i tshig dang /yi ge spel ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshe
202b1(mdo sde): ba nyid rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang /dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gter dang /khyod dang 'dra ba dag gis mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo'i rgyal po'i gter dang /dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gter dang /sems can
202b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bdud rtsi mi zad pa'i gter de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa legs te/sems can thams cad kyi gter brtan par bzhag pa/ngas bshad par bya'o//sprin chen snying po de bzhin
202b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gtor gyi tshul de legs par rab tu
202b4(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang /bstan par bya ste/sprin chen snying po gzhan yid la ma sems shig dang bshad par bya'o//sprin chen snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang /snying
202b5(mdo sde): rtse ba'i phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis zung shig/sems can thams cad nges par bsgral ba'i sems kyi yid la zung shig/sprin chen snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
202b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid kyi chos brtan pa'i gter gyi tshul gang gis/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gter gyi tshul dang /de kho na shes pa'i chus yod
202b7(mdo sde): su smin par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bdud rtsi'i ro zhim po thob pa yod de/dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdud rtsi'i ro zhim po yongasu spyad nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mdzad pa thams cad mdzad do//yongs
203a1(mdo sde): su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas mngon par rol pa bdud rtsi'i ro zhim po de'ang yongasu spyod cig/sems can thams cad la'ang ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ri zhim po byin
203a2(mdo sde): cig/sprin chen snying po'i mdo//mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo'i rgyal po//chos kyi rnam grangs chen po tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ga tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshi 'bru bzang po
203a3(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa/yongasu dag pa/yongasu byang bzung shig/sprin chen snying po sprin po'i mdo//mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo' rgyal po chos kyi rnam grangs chen po de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul dam pa'i
203a4(mdo sde): chos brtan pa'i gter shod cig/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo kun chub par gyis shig/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i gzungs kyi rgya mtsho chen po//ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs
203a5(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid yon tan gyi 'byung gnas kyi tshong rdal/skyes bu dam pa'i tshong pa'i gnas chen por rgyas par gyis shig/sprin chen snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid ting nge
203a6(mdo sde): 'dzin dang /gzungs thams cad kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'byung gnas/zab mo'i tshig gi don rtog pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /
203a7(mdo sde): zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid brtan pa'i mngon mtshan gyis btab pa/sprin chen po'i mdo//mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo'i rgyal po'i chos kyi tshul zung shig/sprin chen snying po shin tu byang
203b1(mdo sde): zhing shin tu rtog par dka' ba/rtag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgyu ba nyid kyi sbyin chen po'i mad//mtshungs pa med pa'i mda' rgyal po dam pa'i
203b2(mdo sde): chos brtan pa'i gter la yid ches par gyis shig/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo//sems can thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gter dang /mu ge byung ba'i tshe longs spyod mi zad
203b3(mdo sde): par byed pa'i ting 'dzin dang gzungs kyi gter dang /char mo 'bab pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gter mi zad pa'i bdud rtsi'i char gyi chus gang ba'i sbyin chen po'i yon tan gyi rnam par 'phrul
203b4(mdo sde): pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid rtag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyi char chen po dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gter dang /nang byung ba'i tshe bde zhing bsil
203b5(mdo sde): ba'i spyan sbyar bas dug gi mthu thams cad med par byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag pa dang /ther zug pa dang /brtan pa dang /zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs
203b6(mdo sde): pa'i dri bo nyid kyi yon tan gyi tshogs la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i gnas dang /me tog phreng dang /phye ma'i bsgo bas bsgos pa sprin chen po'i mdond med par brten pa'i gter sri ger bris shig/sprin chen
203b7(mdo sde): snying po sems yongasu rmongs shing rnam par 'khrul pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag cing ther zug pa ma yin la mo brtan zhing nub par 'gyuraro zhes log par smra ba rnams mkhris pas brgyal
204a1(mdo sde): zhing drug gzug rngus rnam par bsregs pa'i lta ba'i gnyid kyi mun pas gnod par byas pa'i khyim du nyal nas gnyid ldog ste/rmi lam mi zad pa'i lta bas bsregs nas myos sa/
204a2(mdo sde): shing rmis te skrag pa'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /brgan grum mo dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid rtag pa'i rang bzhin shes pa'i 'bru
204a3(mdo sde): mar dang de kho na rig pa'i snying po rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin rtag pa'i mar me la 'jug pa spangs nas shAkya'i rigs la bsngags pa ma yin brjod pa'i
204a4(mdo sde): sems can mi shes pa'i lta ba mang ba de dag la de kho na shes pa'i ka ta ka'i 'bras bu'i mig sman gyis phyi bar gyis shig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi che ba nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes spangs
204a5(mdo sde): la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu rab tu byung ste nyes pa brjod par byed pa de dag gi lce tshed de'i cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag shes rab kyis rtog par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
204a6(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ste sangs rgyas kyi sras su gyur pa de dag la lta ba thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa 'di gtad par gyis shig/sprin chen snying po de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa la
204a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu med do zhes zer ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa la 'bras bu yod par mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'phrul par gyis shig/sprin chen snying po
204b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis mngon par dad par gyis shig/sgron chen snying po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyi lta ba thams cad skyug pa dang /bkru ba dang /
204b2(mdo sde): sman sbyar blugs pa'i cho ga chen po thams cad kyis nad chen po rnams gzhom pa'i phyir mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo'i rgyal po chen po/mdo thams cad kyi bdag pa 'khor lo thams cad bskor ba/dam
204b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos rin po che'i mchog brtan pa'i gter/sems can thams cad kyi yul ma yin pa/zab mo'i tshig gi don de bzhin gshegs pa la dris la/dam pa'i chos brtan pa'i gter rab tu gnas
204b4(mdo sde): pApar gyis shig/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ltos/sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
204b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa rin po che'i mdzod kyi 'byung gnas kyi chos kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bzhi brgya yod do//sprin chen snying po
204b6(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mad+mo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi zlogs pa'i ye shes mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas la mngon par 'jug pa zhes
204b7(mdo sde): bye ba'i gzungs kyi sgo sum cu rtsa drug yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ldem
205a1(mdo sde): po dgra gi bzhi'i bye brag la 'jug pa la rmongs pa'i tshul can gyi chos kyi thabs kyi rgyun gyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa gsum yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo
205a2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid par skye bas rtse ba'i rnam po la 'jug cing gnas pa bgrod pa'i gsang ba bkod pa'i
205a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i zhing gi las
205a4(mdo sde): kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir sems kyis yang dag phyir len pa'i rnam par grol ba'i smon lam gsang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs
205a5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes la rmongs pa'i snying po bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen
205a6(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes zab mo brtan pa 'thob pa la 'jug pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//
205a7(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprin chen po'i snying po'i char gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi mdzod
205b1(mdo sde): ces bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//spri rten snying po sgron chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprin chen po'i char gyi rgyun bsam gyis ma khyab par/
205b2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi rnam pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprin chen po'i
205b3(mdo sde): tshogs na mkha' las 'byung zhing 'du ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub
205b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi sprin chen po'i glog gi 'od snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems
205b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sprin chen po'i glog 'gye ba dang ldan pa la 'jug pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /

205b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i sgron ma ston pa zhes bye ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mad la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi thog
206a1(mdo sde): tog gi 'phel ba'i gtam la 'jug pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yad do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang
206a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes rdo rje'i rnam pa la 'jug pa'i mdzod srung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /byang chub
206a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi longs spyod mi zad pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bcu yod do//sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
