385b5(mdo sde): mdog dang bzla ba'i gzo brjid dang /dpal gyi blo gros dang /zla mthong dang /klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /shin tu brtan dang /mgul na nor bu dang /sprin byung dang /char rgyun dang
385b6(mdo sde): rab 'jom dang /rnam par 'jo ma dang /mthu bsgyings dang /gdengs ka chen po dang /dbyangs zab dang /klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang /rnam par sgra 'byin dang /ut+pa la dang /rtsal
385b7(mdo sde): chen dang /gshol mda' 'dzin dang /sna tshogos sde dang /zhags pa chen po dang /klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /kun tu snang dang /rna rtsub dang /dung dang /der da ra dang /
386a1(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po u pa dU ra dang /bde byed dang /lag 'gro dang /lag 'gro chen po dang /dri ma chen po dang /'phur ldid dang /sogs ma med dang /'byed pa dang /smin
386a2(mdo sde): bu gnas dang /nag po dang //klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang /'dam bu dang /nye ba'i 'dum bu dang /dung thogs dang /'gro lding dang /rab mdzes dang /glang chen rna dang /rnon po dang /sor
386a3(mdo sde): sgyu dang /phyog 'bar dang /glog khyod chen po dang /stobs lha dang /chu stobs dang /klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gengs dang /bdud rtsi can dang /mu stegs can dang /bai DUn 'od can dang /
386a4(mdo sde): gser mdog sgra dang /gser 'od dang /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang /nyi 'od dang /'tshor pa dang /bal glang mgo dang /klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang /nug po dang /gau shrin rje dang /dge
386a5(mdo sde): tshul dang /sbal pa dang /dad pa'i gzi brjid dang /mu khyud 'dzin dang /sa 'dzin dang /mgo stong can dang /gtsug na nor bu dang /klu'i rgyal po dron yod mthong dang /sprin chen dang /
386a6(mdo sde): sde bzangs dang /sa skyong dang /mis byin dang /rnam par dul dang /rga bA 'byung dang /chu srin kun b+hI ra dang /chu srin kun b+hi ri'i gdong dang /dug 'dzin dang /klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang /
386a7(mdo sde): ped+me ka dang /'jug mo dang /rab 'phyang dang /'jigs byed dang /gzi brjid mdzes dang /mgo lnga pa dang /bal li ra dang /shing rtas rgyal dang /klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang /klu'i
386b1(mdo sde): rgyal po mjug rings dang /mgo bo che dang /bim bri ka dang /bi te ra dang /mgyogs 'gro dang /klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum dang /klu sde dang /gzi chen dang /'dam bu byin dang /klu'i rgyal po skrag
386b2(mdo sde): byed dang /'od 'bar rang mgo bdun pa dang /stong tshan dang /mthong dga' dang /rab tu cher gtums dang /dri med gzi brjid dang /mig bzangs dang /drag po chen po dang /'od 'phro phung po
386b3(mdo sde): dang /klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang /khro bo drag shul can dang /rin chen chu sbyin dang /chu sprini sprin chen dang /dbang po'i 'od dang /rkang pas 'thung dang /sprin zla dang /rgya mtsho'i sprin dang /me
386b4(mdo sde): tog dri chen dang /ku mu da'i 'byung gnas drang /klu'i rgyal po rin chen migo dang /tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang /sprin chen snying po dang /kha ba can dang /dpal gyi snying po dang /sbyin
386b5(mdo sde): mthu can dang /mtshan mo 'dzin dang /chu sbyin dang /chu sbyin chen po dang /klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid med 'dra dang /sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /khro med dang /sa'i bum pa dang /klu dpa'
386b6(mdo sde): dang /chu 'dzin dang /sprin gdugs dang /eng gi ri'o gdong dang /gzi brjid can dang /sprin las mngon byung dang /klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang /chu byed mdzes dang /
386b7(mdo sde): lus chen dang /spyang lho dang /zhi ba dang /dpa' ba dang /gser ngan can dang /mchog tu brtson dang /dug drag dang /dbyangs snyan dang /klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi'i snying po dang /rab
387a1(mdo sde): /tu char 'babs chen po dang /rnam par g.yo dang /'khrugs sgra dang /rnga sgra dang /bdud rtsi rgyun dang /dga' bar byed pa dang /'brug sgrogs dang /dpa' ste dang /srung
387a2(mdo sde): med kyi bu dang /rgya mtsho'i glong dang /klu'i rgyal po yon po dang /klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi drug 'dus te 'khod pa
387a3(mdo sde): dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzor to/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nge sa la gtsugs
387a4(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bla ma la gus pa dang /phu dung chen po byed pas me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug
387a5(mdo sde): pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bden dang /dar gyi lda ldi dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyangs dang //
387a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i me tog dang /rin po che'i lda ldi dang /mu tig gi phreng ba dang /klu'i me tog dang /mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med glengs med pa
387a7(mdo sde): ngag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
387b1(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mche
387b2(mdo sde): thams cad dang /sa dang /chu dang /me dang /rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang /gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'ang
387b3(mdo sde): lus kyi sbyin/rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dgu par langs te grangs med/dpag tu med/bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/brjod du med pa las
387b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa dag dang /lus re re la'ang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu mang grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/rdul phra rab kyi
387b5(mdo sde): rdul gyi rgya re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sbyin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyus par 'gengs pa/ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
387b6(mdo sde): lce mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med grangs med/bsam+bi gyis mi khyab/gzhal du med/tshad med/brjod du med pa dag
387b7(mdo sde): gis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang /'od
388a1(mdo sde): zer stug po dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang /me tog gi rgya mtsho
388a2(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /phye ma dang /shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams
388a3(mdo sde): dang /spos dang /bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sku rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos thams cad
388a4(mdo sde): kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/grangs med/bsam
388a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab/gzhal du med/tshad med/brjod du med pa/ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o///
388a6(mdo sde): ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par
388a7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bista stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//thams cad kun tu
388b1(mdo sde): snang ba'i rin po che'i char dbab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor
388b2(mdo sde): bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang kun tu sgras 'gengs po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis
388b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin
388b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rje su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnamasu de bzhin
388b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam
388b6(mdo sde): par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprani thams
388b7(mdo sde): cad la bsti stang du bya'o//blo mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//rin po che dang /spos dang /me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho'i
389a1(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang /nor bu rin po che rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i sgron ma dang /
389a2(mdo sde): spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog thams cad kyi
389a3(mdo sde): ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis
389a4(mdo sde): brlabs nas/phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can/bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang po brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis
389a5(mdo sde): rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya
389a6(mdo sde): mtsho sprin rnams dang /sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dro ba sbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyi na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
389a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//gser dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang /phreng ba dang /rin po
389b1(mdo sde): che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sneng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /an+da rnyil dang /dzam+bu'i chu bo'i
389b2(mdo sde): gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sdong ge'i khru rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang nor bu rin po che snang
389b3(mdo sde): gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sang+ge'i khru rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po ches brgyan pa pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /an+da
389b4(mdo sde): rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'di gser ldan gyi pad+ma'i snying po can gyi sing+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /'od zer 'bar ba bzang mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po
389b5(mdo sde): can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad
389b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po con gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsung /sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi sing+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
389b7(mdo sde): na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//bla mor bya'o//mi mor bya'o//mchod par
390a1(mdo sde): bya'o//spos dang /nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa
390a2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i
390a3(mdo sde): sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil
390a4(mdo sde): 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
390a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bris ma gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po rgya gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan po'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho
390a6(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang /sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sbyin rnams drang /rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi
390a7(mdo sde): ng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal ba snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi sing+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis
390b1(mdo sde): rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che sna tshogs 'ad 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /kun nas sgra rin po che'i
390b2(mdo sde): shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying ba can gyi sa khyi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos dang me tog dang /pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi sad+mo'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas
390b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi gang na bkang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po chu'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bgrod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu sbyangs pa'i rta babs stegs
390b4(mdo sde): bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khro rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu rin po che'i yol ga dang /phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sring ge'i
390b5(mdo sde): khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka 'dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun
390b6(mdo sde): tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//yid bzhin
390b7(mdo sde): gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /an+da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tig bkod pa thams cad kyi bla bri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /spos dang /nor bu
391a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bla bre rgyu mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i skyon ma'i gzugs kyi bla bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyirdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par
391a2(mdo sde): snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla blo rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /me tog thams
391a3(mdo sde): cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla bre rgyo mtsho sprin rnams dang /dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog
391a4(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa sna tshog su snang ba'i nor bu'i snang po'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dri ba'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /gser gyi zo ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla bre rgya mtsho
391a5(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang /bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis na mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin
391a6(mdo sde): gyis brlabs te/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//bla mor bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//nor bu rin po che sna
391a7(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya
391b1(mdo sde): sprin rnams dang /mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs
391b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che'i rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i gdugs
391b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nor bu thams cad kyi sdong po'i yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang /spos dang /
391b4(mdo sde): gdugs pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar
391b5(mdo sde): byed pa kun tu bkod pas rgyas par 'grengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin mo 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//bla mar bya'o//
391b6(mdo sde): ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o//rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sgron ma 'dres pa rnams
391b7(mdo sde): dang /me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil
392a1(mdo sde): //'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sbyin rnams dang /kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul
392a2(mdo sde): rtogs pa rin po che'i yal ge'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /bai DUr+ya dang /rin po che'i rigs dang /nor bu rin po che'i ri rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil
392a3(mdo sde): 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /sangs rgyas thams
